T02D2501:1b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2501:1b-5: rnam snang mdzad chen ye shes ni //
T02D2501:1b-6: bde [dd] bar gshegs pa'i thugs la gnas //
T02D2501:1b-7: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i gzugs //
T02D2501:1b-8: sangs rgyas la sogs 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2501:1b-9: de ltar chos kyi sku dang ni //
T02D2501:1b-10: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku //
T02D2501:1b-11: rnam snang mdzad dang thub pa yang //
T02D2501:1b-12: rgyud 'di ston pa dag bstod nas //
T02D2501:1b-13: de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las ni //
T02D2501:1b-14: de nyid rnam sgrub rim pa zhig / mkhas pa dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:1b-15: legs par bsdus te bshad par bya'o //
T02D2501:1b-16: rgyud 'di shin tu zab ces la //
T02D2501:1b-17: mtshan ma tha dad rab tu bstan //
T02D2501:1b-18: de bas de la 'jug pa tsam //
T02D2501:1b-19: bdag gis su ni 'di bgyis so //
T02D2501:1b-20: mi gnyis ye shes spyod yul ba //
T02D2501:1b-21: tshig gi spros pa ma lus grol //
T02D2501:1b-22: dus kun du ni de bzhin pas //
T02D2501:1b-23: de nyid ces ni bcom ldan gsungs //
T02D2501:1b-24: de phyir ye shes gang 'jug pa //
T02D2501:1b-25: de la'ang de nyid ces su bsgrags //
T02D2501:1b-26: gang phyir de nyid spyod yul bar //
T02D2501:2a-0: @2a * // nam yang slu bar mi 'gyur phyir //
T02D2501:2a-1: de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las ni //
T02D2501:2a-2: kun rdzob bden pa la gnas nas //
T02D2501:2a-3: de nyid mtshan nyid gzhan bstan pa //
T02D2501:2a-4: de dag mnyan pa nyid du gyis //
T02D2501:2a-5: rang gi ye shes mthu yi mtshan //
T02D2501:2a-6: rdo rje dbyings la sogs mtshan nyid //
T02D2501:2a-7: 'gro ba'i don la mi slu bas //
T02D2501:2a-8: de nyid ces ni rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2501:2a-10: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis sngags kyi spyod
T02D2501:2a-11: pa la mos pa'i sems can gyi tshogs rnams kyi
T02D2501:2a-12: don rnam pa mang po gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2501:2a-13: zhing stug po na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2501:2a-14: chen po don thams cad grub pa sprul pa byang
T02D2501:2a-15: chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa la mngon par
T02D2501:2a-16: byang chub pa la rnam pa lnga bstan te //
T02D2501:2a-17: rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas //
T02D2501:2a-18: rang gi ye shes rtogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad
T02D2501:2a-19: par byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D2501:2a-20: kyi tshogs ma lus pa dpag bsam gyi shing dang
T02D2501:2a-21: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu
T02D2501:2a-22: 'bras bu'i ngo bo bla na med pa /
T02D2501:2a-23: kun du bzang po'i sems zhes bya ba rdo rje
T02D2501:2a-24: ltar mi shigs pa de'i rgyu'i gnas skabs na gnas
T02D2501:2a-25: pa de'i rigs kyi bdag nyid dang bcas par 'jig
T02D2501:2b-0: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams @2b cad
T02D2501:2b-1: kyi sems kyi rgyal po lta bur rang gi sems
T02D2501:2b-3: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po
T02D2501:2b-4: de nyid rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag gis mi
T02D2501:2b-5: bskyod pa dang / rin chen dbang dang /
T02D2501:2b-7: don yod par grub pa'i bde bar gshegs pa zhes
T02D2501:2b-8: bya ba rnams su kha dog dang dbyibs ji ltar
T02D2501:2b-10: de rnams las kyang ji ltar gnas pa'i rim pa
T02D2501:2b-11: bzhin du rang gis rtogs pa'i mthu'i khyad par gyi
T02D2501:2b-12: ngo bo de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D2501:2b-16: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba rnams
T02D2501:2b-17: su rang gi ngo bo tha dad par bstan to
T02D2501:2b-18: // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:2b-19: pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi bdag nyid kun
T02D2501:2b-20: du bzang po'i sems bskyed pa de nyid de bzhin
T02D2501:2b-21: gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying ga na gnas par
T02D2501:2b-22: brtag pa sngon du byas te /
T02D2501:2b-23: ji ltar 'dod pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams bskyed
T02D2501:2b-24: pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i
T02D2501:2b-25: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis de las byung nas
T02D2501:2b-26: rim pa bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2501:2b-29: rdo rje dga' ba la sogs pa phal cher rang gi ming dang sngags kyi tshig dang /
T02D2501:2b-30: de dag rjes su mthun pa'i phyag rgyas phyag gnyis mtshan pa /
T02D2501:2b-31: dpe med pa'i sku'i cha lugs 'dzin pa rang gi
T02D2501:2b-32: ngo bo'i bye brag tu byin gyis brlabs te gnas
T02D2501:2b-33: so // de rnams las kyang bcom ldan 'das kun
T02D2501:2b-34: du bzang po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
T02D2501:2b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi
T02D2501:2b-36: sems chen po dus gsum du 'jug pa de nyid
T02D2501:2b-37: bde bar gshegs pa 'gugs pa dang /
T02D2501:2b-39: mnyes pa la sogs pa mthu'i bye brag ngo mtshar rnams su bstan to //
T02D2501:2b-40: de nas yang de dag dang po nyid du de
T02D2501:2b-41: bzhin gshegs pa nyid las byung ba'i phyir rgyal ba'i
T02D2501:2b-43: yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' skye dgu'i
T02D2501:2b-44: bdag po de nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D2501:2b-45: rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2501:3a-0: nam mkha'i snying po rnams rang gis brtags pa'i sku la snying @3a * //
T02D2501:3a-2: de'i rjes su mthun par sku'i tshogs du mar gyur te /
T02D2501:3a-3: de dag nyid kyi phyag na gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D2501:3a-4: mtshan ma rdo rje dang padma la sogs pa las
T02D2501:3a-5: byung nas rnam pa mang por gnas par brtags so
T02D2501:3a-6: // de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin
T02D2501:3a-7: thams cad kyi dbang phyug de nyid rang gis byas
T02D2501:3a-8: pa'i sku'i tshogs kyi bye brag gdug pa mang po
T02D2501:3a-9: // 'dul ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos la gzigs pa dang /
T02D2501:3a-10: skye bo phongs pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su
T02D2501:3a-11: rdzogs par mdzad pa la sogs pa bde bar gshegs
T02D2501:3a-12: pa mtha' dag gi yon tan gyi khyad par mtha'
T02D2501:3a-13: yas pa'i rang bzhin rnams khyad par med par yang
T02D2501:3a-17: rin po che'i rigs la sogs pa yang rdo rje
T02D2501:3a-18: la sogs pa las byung ba'i phyir de dag rnam
T02D2501:3a-19: par bkod do // de dag kyang rgyas par rgyud
T02D2501:3a-20: 'di nyid du rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D2501:3a-21: sems dpa' 'byung ba las bstan te /
T02D2501:3a-22: de bzhin du rgyud 'dir gtogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i dkyil
T02D2501:3a-23: 'khor gyi lha dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2501:3a-24: pa ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan nyid de rnams phyag
T02D2501:3a-28: las kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa las bshad pa /
T02D2501:3a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen
T02D2501:3a-30: po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i nam mkha'i
T02D2501:3a-31: dbyings thams cad na rtag tu khyab par gnas pa
T02D2501:3a-32: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam par
T02D2501:3a-33: 'jug pas rdo rje dbyings rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2501:3a-34: sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa
T02D2501:3a-35: nas kun du bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chen
T02D2501:3a-36: po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
T02D2501:3a-37: rdo rje la gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du
T02D2501:3a-38: de ltar gsal bar bstan mod kyi /
T02D2501:3a-41: bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni //
T02D2501:3a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid gtso //
T02D2501:3a-43: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje //
T02D2501:3a-44: sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung ba //
T02D2501:3a-45: sems dpa' rnams kyi sems dpa' mchog / thugs kar rdo rje bsgoms pas ni //
T02D2501:3a-46: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba //
T02D2501:3b-0: rdo rje la rab tu @3b gnas //
T02D2501:3b-1: de nyid ye shes tshul gyis su //
T02D2501:3b-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od mnyam med //
T02D2501:3b-3: thugs las sna tshogs byung nas ni //
T02D2501:3b-4: sna tshogs gzugs su gyur pa yang //
T02D2501:3b-5: sems can kun gyi rdul snyed kyi //
T02D2501:3b-6: rgyal ba dag tu de nyid gyur //
T02D2501:3b-7: rdo rje sku ni de rnams las //
T02D2501:3b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung //
T02D2501:3b-9: de las dang po'i sems dpa' yi //
T02D2501:3b-10: mtshan ma thams cad rab tu byung //
T02D2501:3b-11: mtshan ma las kyang sems dpa' che //
T02D2501:3b-12: de rnams las kyang tshul 'di kun //
T02D2501:3b-14: de nyid bsdus pa chen po las kyang //
T02D2501:3b-15: bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni //
T02D2501:3b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' don chen stsol //
T02D2501:3b-17: rigs lnga yi ni khyad par gyis //
T02D2501:3b-18: spyod dang mi spyod bcas par rol //
T02D2501:3b-20: dpal mchog dang po las kyang don 'di nyid gzhung 'dis bstan te /
T02D2501:3b-21: sngon mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2501:3b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2501:3b-23: kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag / rdo rje
T02D2501:3b-24: snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / sems can kun gyi
T02D2501:3b-25: sems gang yin // brtan pa'i phyir ni dpa' zhes bya //
T02D2501:3b-26: mnyam par gzhag pas ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2501:3b-27: nges pa las ni rdo rjer gyur //
T02D2501:3b-28: sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni //
T02D2501:3b-29: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar gyur //
T02D2501:3b-30: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
T02D2501:3b-31: byang chub spyod pa'i rjes mthun pa //
T02D2501:3b-32: bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid //
T02D2501:3b-33: byang chub sangs rgyas de nyid de //
T02D2501:3b-34: rdo rje drag po mthar byed pa //
T02D2501:3b-35: phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang de //
T02D2501:3b-36: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
T02D2501:3b-37: nges par rdo rje rigs chen po //
T02D2501:3b-38: de nyid padma'i rigs dag pa //
T02D2501:3b-39: de nyid nor bu'i rigs bzang bshad //
T02D2501:3b-40: de nyid chags pa'i sgo ru bstan //
T02D2501:3b-41: 'dod dang grol ba de nyid de //
T02D2501:3b-42: dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste //
T02D2501:3b-43: 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa //
T02D2501:3b-44: de nyid gnas pa kun gyi mchog / brtan la
T02D2501:3b-45: sra ba che zhing stug /'gro ba'i sems ni 'dus
T02D2501:3b-46: byas pas // thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid //
T02D2501:4a-0: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs so zhes kyang @4a * //
T02D2501:4a-1: rnal 'byor gyi tshul las bstan to //
T02D2501:4a-2: de nyid las rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:4a-3: pa thams cad kyi gtso bo yin par yang bsgags
T02D2501:4a-4: te / 'di skad du theg pa chen po mngon
T02D2501:4a-5: par rtogs pa chung du las kyang de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:4a-6: pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D2501:4a-7: dpa' bdag nyid che ba bstan pa las bshad pa
T02D2501:4a-8: te / // de bzhin gshegs pas phyag bya zhing //
T02D2501:4a-9: mchod cing bstod de bkur bar 'os //
T02D2501:4a-10: gang phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems //
T02D2501:4a-11: byang chub sems ni khyod la bya //
T02D2501:4a-12: rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod la brten //
T02D2501:4a-13: khyod ni thams cad gzigs pa'i yab //
T02D2501:4a-15: de bzhin gshegs rnams khyod la brten //
T02D2501:4a-16: sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad mkhyen //
T02D2501:4a-17: brtan pas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
T02D2501:4a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' bshad pa ste //
T02D2501:4a-19: thams cad gzigs pa'i snying po yin //
T02D2501:4a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa kun de nyid //
T02D2501:4a-21: sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med //
T02D2501:4a-22: dad pas gang zhig dad de yang //
T02D2501:4a-23: de bzhin gshegs pas phyag byar 'os //
T02D2501:4a-25: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnam pa du
T02D2501:4a-26: mar de kho na nyid ces bya bar 'gro ba'i
T02D2501:4a-27: don mdzad pa'i phyir bzhugs par blo gros rab tu
T02D2501:4a-28: dri ma med pa rnal 'byor gyi bdud rtsi'i bcud
T02D2501:4a-29: len 'dod pa'i sems can dam pa rnams kyis shes
T02D2501:4a-30: par bya'o // gang gi phyir dngos grub khyad par
T02D2501:4a-31: can ji ltar 'dod pa'i bde ba 'byung ba rnams
T02D2501:4a-32: kyang de dag dang mnyam par ldan na bde ba
T02D2501:4a-33: nyid kyis de'i go 'phang myur du thob ste /
T02D2501:4a-34: bdag nyid chen po sras dang bcas pa de dag
T02D2501:4a-35: mnyes par byas nas sems can thams cad la phan
T02D2501:4a-36: 'dogs nus pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub stsol
T02D2501:4a-37: bar mdzad do // de bas na gang bdag nyid che ba rang bzhin gyis rlabs che bas /
T02D2501:4a-38: de sems can gyi tshogs chen po la rnam pa
T02D2501:4a-39: thams cad kyis phan 'dogs par bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D2501:4a-40: phyir yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs
T02D2501:4a-41: la gnas pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi
T02D2501:4a-42: dbang phyug chen po rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba
T02D2501:4b-0: mtha' dag gi don mdzad @4b pa'i bde ba rin
T02D2501:4b-1: por mi thogs par thob par 'dod pa de la
T02D2501:4b-2: de'i phyir sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pas de dag
T02D2501:4b-3: thob par byar rung ba nyid du dgongs pa chen
T02D2501:4b-4: po mdzad do // de rnams kyis kyang de'i phyir
T02D2501:4b-5: sgrub pa'i thabs su rang gis brtags pa'i lha'i ngo
T02D2501:4b-6: bo nyid kyi bye brag tu gyur pa phyag rgya
T02D2501:4b-7: chen po la sogs pa bzhi 'dir bstan te /
T02D2501:4b-10: de ltar dngos grub myur du bstan //
T02D2501:4b-11: de la thabs ni phyag rgya che //
T02D2501:4b-12: dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa //
T02D2501:4b-14: de ltar byang chub spyod la sogs //
T02D2501:4b-15: thabs kun cho ga'i rim pas kyang //
T02D2501:4b-16: sangs rgyas sems can don mi 'grub //
T02D2501:4b-18: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa mnyes par bya
T02D2501:4b-19: ba de rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la
T02D2501:4b-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du gtogs par gsungs
T02D2501:4b-21: pa nyi tshe skabs 'dir gleng bar rig par bya
T02D2501:4b-22: ste / gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D2501:4b-23: de dag nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bsdus pa yin te /
T02D2501:4b-24: de bas na phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2501:4b-27: las kyi phyag rgya'i sgra rnams spyi'i rgyud nas bshad par bya'o //
T02D2501:4b-28: de la lha nyid kyis de'i bdag nyid dam /
T02D2501:4b-29: de'i cha shas kyis gang khyad par med pa bstan
T02D2501:4b-30: pa de dag ni phyag rgya zhes bya ste mtshan
T02D2501:4b-31: ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2501:4b-32: phyag rgya dang mtshan ma dang /
T02D2501:4b-34: nye ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba rnams ni don tha dad par ma yin te /
T02D2501:4b-37: de'i cha shas kyis bye brag med par brtags te
T02D2501:4b-38: sgrub pa pos lha gang rjes su dran par 'dod
T02D2501:4b-39: pa de la dmigs nas dran pa skye bar 'gyur

T02D2501:5a-1: brnyan gyi ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:5a-2: phyag rgya thams cad khyad par 'di //
T02D2501:5a-3: bskyed par rab tu bsgrags pa yin //

T02D2501:5a-7: su bshad pas na mtshan nyid ma rdzogs pa la

T02D2501:5a-10: dang chos la bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid yin par

T02D2501:5a-12: lha'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid phyag rgya yin par bstan
T02D2501:5a-14: chos kyi dbyings ni mdo ru na //
T02D2501:5a-15: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya che zhes bya //

T02D2501:5a-21: chos kyi dbyings dang 'brel par brjod pa de yang gang yin zhe na /
T02D2501:5a-22: gang dag gis de rtogs nas rnam par dag ste /
T02D2501:5a-23: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa ji ltar rigs par 'byung ba ste de bas na /
T02D2501:5a-24: 'dus ma byas las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i gang
T02D2501:5a-25: zag go zhes bya ba yang de nyid la bya'o
T02D2501:5a-26: // yongs su ma dag pa'i lhar snang ba rnams
T02D2501:5a-27: kyang yang na ni de lta bus 'dul ba'i skye
T02D2501:5a-28: bo rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:5a-29: pas byin gyis brlabs pa nyid dam /
T02D2501:5a-30: yang na ni chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs la goms
T02D2501:5a-31: par byas pa las bsod nams bskyed pa'i skye bo
T02D2501:5a-32: thob pa dag de lta bur snang ngo //
T02D2501:5a-33: yang ye de rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings dang 'brel pa nyid du shes par bya ste /
T02D2501:5a-34: de bas na thams cad du phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:5a-35: phyag rgya de yang 'dir sku la sogs pa'i bye
T02D2501:5a-36: brag gis phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba dang
T02D2501:5a-39: las kyi phyag rgya dang rnam pa bzhir bstan te /
T02D2501:5a-40: de la lha'i sku'i gzugs brnyan ni phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D2501:5a-41: ji ltar zhe na 'dra ba'i phyir lha de dran
T02D2501:5b-0: @5b pa'i rgyur che bas na phyag rgya chen po
T02D2501:5b-1: zhes bya ba'o // de'i mtshan nyid kyang rgyud 'di
T02D2501:5b-2: dang gzhan las kyang phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga
T02D2501:5b-3: las kyang bstan te ji skad du rgyud 'di las
T02D2501:5b-4: zhes bya ba'o // / sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi //
T02D2501:5b-5: gzugs brnyan gyi ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:5b-6: bdag nyid chen po phyag rgya che //
T02D2501:5b-9: de bzhin du rgyud gzhan dag las kyang /
T02D2501:5b-10: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje dag / ji ltar bris pa'i tshul bzhin du //
T02D2501:5b-11: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang ldan na //
T02D2501:5b-12: sems dpa' chen po nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2501:5b-14: de la bris pa'i tshul bzhin du zhes bya ba
T02D2501:5b-15: ni lha'i sku'i gzugs brnyan ji ltar bris pa mtshan
T02D2501:5b-16: mar brtag pa sngon du byas te /
T02D2501:5b-17: de'i rjes su mthun par yid kyis lha'i sku'i gzugs brnyan nyid ji ltar rigs par bdag dang /
T02D2501:5b-18: lha de bye brag med par bsam mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2501:5b-19: lha'i sku'i gzugs kyang 'dir rnam pa gnyis te gcig
T02D2501:5b-20: ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i sku'o
T02D2501:5b-21: // de las gzhan pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D2501:5b-22: dbang phyug ma la sogs pa ste phyag rgya lha'i
T02D2501:5b-23: // sku'o // de gnyis las gzugs kyi lha mo
T02D2501:5b-24: rnams ni de lta bus 'dul ba'i 'gro ba'i dbang
T02D2501:5b-25: gis phyag rgya la sogs pa yan lag mang po'i
T02D2501:5b-26: mtshan nyid du bud med kyi gzugs sbas nas /
T02D2501:5b-27: de'i brdar gyur pa mchod rten khro la bzhugs pa
T02D2501:5b-28: la sogs pa phyag rgya'i gzugs su 'dir bstan to
T02D2501:5b-29: // de bas na rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
T02D2501:5b-30: ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba bris
T02D2501:5b-32: ngo bo gzugs sam de bsgoms pa las byung ba
T02D2501:5b-33: ni gzungs kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya chen po zhes
T02D2501:5b-34: bya'o // yang na rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
T02D2501:5b-35: ma la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi phyag rgya
T02D2501:5b-36: lag par bkod cing bcings pa dag kyang gzungs kyi
T02D2501:5b-37: lha mo de dag nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D2501:5b-38: rang gi ngo bo ston par byed pa yin te
T02D2501:5b-39: bya'o // / de'i rjes su mthun par lha mo
T02D2501:5b-40: de rnams kyi sku dran par bskyed pa'i phyir bstan
T02D2501:5b-42: phyag rgya chen po de dag thams cad kyang phyi
T02D2501:5b-43: nang gi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su rig
T02D2501:5b-44: par bya ste / de la bris pa la sogs pa'i gzugs ni phyi rol gyi'o //
T02D2501:6a-1: gzhan pa lha'i sku'i gzugs brnyan yid kyis bsams pa ni nang gi yin te /
T02D2501:6a-2: 'di ni phyag rgya chen po'i don bstan pa'o //
T02D2501:6a-3: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02D2501:6a-4: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya mtshan ma sor
T02D2501:6a-5: mo bkod pa'i bdag nyid ni dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2501:6a-6: rgya ste ; bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi thugs
T02D2501:6a-7: gsang ba ni dam tshig ces bya ba'i sgrar brjod
T02D2501:6a-8: rgya ste ; de / rgyud nas bshad pa ni yang dag par 'thob pa'am /
T02D2501:6a-9: rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ram /
T02D2501:6a-10: mi 'da' ba'i don du dam tshig ces bya'o //
T02D2501:6a-12: de rang gi yul gyi de kho na nyid ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2501:6a-13: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mi 'da' ba'i ngo bo zhes sngar bshad pa yin no //
T02D2501:6a-14: de lta bas na lha'i thugs gsang ba'i mtshan ma ni dam tshig ces bshad pa'i don te /
T02D2501:6a-15: de bas na rgyud 'di nyid dang gzhan las kyang
T02D2501:6a-16: dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub pa na bsgrub par
T02D2501:6a-17: bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te snying
T02D2501:6a-18: ga'i phyogs su bzhag la rang gi snying gar sems
T02D2501:6a-19: rdo rjer bsam mo zhes bshad do //
T02D2501:6a-20: de'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhung chen po las bshad pa /
T02D2501:6a-21: rang gi sems ni rab rtogs pas //
T02D2501:6a-22: zla ba las ni rdo rje bsgom //
T02D2501:6a-23: rnam gsum gcig tu bsgom pa ni //
T02D2501:6a-24: thugs kyi gsang ba 'di yin no //
T02D2501:6a-26: thugs kyi mtshan ma gang yin pa de ni de'i
T02D2501:6a-27: don du na de'i gnas kyi mtshan ma yang yin
T02D2501:6a-29: shes pa dang shes pa po tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:6a-30: de bzhin du gzhan dag las kyang /
T02D2501:6a-31: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje rnams //
T02D2501:6a-32: sor mo sbrel bas brtan pa ste /
T02D2501:6a-33: dam tshig sems las shes par bya //
T02D2501:6a-34: las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya //
T02D2501:6a-36: sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba rnam par dbye
T02D2501:6a-37: ba ni de'i mtshan ma dang brdas gzhung 'di nyid
T02D2501:6a-38: du de rnam par bkod pas 'dul ba'i sems can
T02D2501:6a-39: rnams la gzigs nas bstan to //
T02D2501:6a-40: rgyud gzhan dag las ni sku la sogs pa bsdus
T02D2501:6a-41: pa nyid la phal cher dam tshig gi phyag rgyar
T02D2501:6a-43: yang na sems dpa' chen po rnams de las mi
T02D2501:6a-44: 'da' bas na lha mi 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi
T02D2501:6b-0: dam tshig dang @6b ldan pa'i phyir dam tshig dang
T02D2501:6b-1: ldan pa'i phyag rgya la dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2501:6b-2: zhes bya'o // yang na de dag nyid mi 'da'
T02D2501:6b-3: ba yin pas na de nyid la dam tshig gi
T02D2501:6b-4: phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod de /
T02D2501:6b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
T02D2501:6b-7: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
T02D2501:6b-8: phyag rgya dam tshig ces su bshad //
T02D2501:6b-9: sku gsung thugs ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:6b-11: phyogs 'di la ni dam tshig nyid phyag rgya yin
T02D2501:6b-12: pas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o zhes rgyud nas
T02D2501:6b-13: bshad par bya'o // grags pa'i sgra ni yul so sor nges par shes par bya ste /
T02D2501:6b-14: de bas na phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa
T02D2501:6b-15: la dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes gdags pa'i rgyu
T02D2501:6b-16: srid du zin kyang de ltar mi brjod do //
T02D2501:6b-17: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de dag kyang rdo rje dang /
T02D2501:6b-20: mnyes pa la sogs par 'du shes pa ste /
T02D2501:6b-21: rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgra de rnams kyi dgongs pa bshad pa rgyud 'di las bshad de /
T02D2501:6b-23: bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni //
T02D2501:6b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar gnas //
T02D2501:6b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin ni //
T02D2501:6b-26: sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa'o //
T02D2501:6b-28: mchog tu sbyor bas lcags kyu'o //
T02D2501:6b-29: phra mor 'bigs pas mda' yin no //
T02D2501:6b-30: mgu bas dge ba byed pa ste //
T02D2501:6b-31: spras pas rin po che ru bshad //
T02D2501:6b-32: nyi ma gzi brjid ces su brjod //
T02D2501:6b-33: bsgreng bas rgyal mtshan zhes bstan te //
T02D2501:6b-34: bzhad pas gad mo zhes su grags //
T02D2501:6b-36: nyon mongs dgra gcod ral gri'o //
T02D2501:6b-38: tshig tu brjod pas smra zhes bya //
T02D2501:6b-39: sna tshogs thams cad rdo rje'i phyir //
T02D2501:6b-40: mi tshugs sbyor bas go cha'o //
T02D2501:6b-41: 'jigs pas sbyor ba mche ba ste //
T02D2501:6b-42: bcings pa'i tshul gyis khu tshur ro ;
T02D2501:6b-43: / ji ltar bcom ldan sems dpa' ni //
T02D2501:6b-44: rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad du //
T02D2501:6b-45: de bzhin rdo rje la sogs mtshan //
T02D2501:6b-46: bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:6b-48: chos kyi tshig gi rang bzhin gyi mtshan ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2501:7a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2501:7a-3: chos zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'dir gsung gi bdag
T02D2501:7a-4: nyid kyi lha ni bshad pa'i chos nyid la bya'o
T02D2501:7a-5: // gang gi phyir de bdag nyid chen po rnams
T02D2501:7a-6: kyi gsung thams cad ni don dam pa'i chos ston
T02D2501:7a-7: // pa dang / gzhan la phan pa ston pa'i
T02D2501:7a-8: ngo bo yin pas ni bshad pa'i chos kyi bdag
T02D2501:7a-9: // pa dang / nyid yin te / de'i phyir
T02D2501:7a-10: phyag rgyar gyur pa badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba
T02D2501:7a-11: la sogs pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshig rnams la
T02D2501:7a-12: ni chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad do //
T02D2501:7a-13: de bas na chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i tshe lce la rdo rje sgom mo zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:7a-14: 'di ltar gzhan dag las kyang gsung gi gsang ba
T02D2501:7a-15: bshad pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya nyid du ston
T02D2501:7a-17: rdo rje tshig gi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:7a-18: chos kyi rang bzhin phyag rgyar brjod //
T02D2501:7a-20: rdo rje'i tshig ni sgra med pa'o //
T02D2501:7a-22: yang na lha'i gsung gi mtshan ma'i rang bzhin ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D2501:7a-23: de'i tshe chos nyid phyag rgya bas na chos kyi phyag rgya zhes rgyud nas bshad par bya'o //
T02D2501:7a-24: lha'i gsung gi brdar bstan pa'i yi ge de yang
T02D2501:7a-25: pha rol la phan pa ston pa'i ngo bo yin
T02D2501:7a-26: pas na chos nyid yin te /
T02D2501:7a-27: de'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya la chos kyi phyag rgya zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:7a-28: 'dir yang smra ba po dang tshig tha mi dad
T02D2501:7a-29: pas na de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan ma yang don
T02D2501:7a-30: du na yan lag dang bcas pa'i lha'i ngo bo
T02D2501:7a-31: nyid byin gyis rlob par bstan pa yin no //
T02D2501:7a-32: de bzhin du phyag rgya gzhan rnams la yang phal cher bstan te /
T02D2501:7a-33: 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud nas bshad pa'o //
T02D2501:7a-34: las kyi phyag rgya'i sgra'i don yang bshad par bya ste /
T02D2501:7a-35: de la lha'i las kyi mtshan ma ni las kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2501:7a-36: byang chub mchog la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2501:7a-37: de bzhin du de sgrub pa'i tshe las sna tshogs
T02D2501:7a-38: pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtse mo thams cad pa
T02D2501:7a-39: las thams cad sgrub pa lus kyi snying ga'i phyogs
T02D2501:7a-40: su de sgrub pa pos bsam par bshad de /
T02D2501:7a-41: 'dir yang las nye bar bstan pa'i sgo nas yan
T02D2501:7a-42: lag dang bcas pa'i lha'i ngo bo nyid nye bar
T02D2501:7a-43: ston par don gyis shes par bya ste /
T02D2501:7a-44: las dang byed pa po tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:7b-0: phyag rgya bzhi'i ngo @7b bo nyid kyi bye brag bshad zin to //
T02D2501:7b-1: de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2501:7b-2: lhar brtag pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D2501:7b-3: dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags pa'o //
T02D2501:7b-4: de la lha rnams kyis sprul pa'i mtshan mar gyur
T02D2501:7b-5: pa gang yin pa'am gang lha'i ngo bo nyid dam
T02D2501:7b-6: / de'i cha shas su bye brag med par byas te brtag pa de ni lhar brtags pa'o //
T02D2501:7b-8: de dang rjes su mthun par dam tshig can gyis bskyed pa'i lha'i ngo bo nyid dam /
T02D2501:7b-9: de'i cha shas su bye brag med par mos pa
T02D2501:7b-10: de ni dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags par
T02D2501:7b-11: grags so // des lhar brtags pa'i phyag rgya lha'i
T02D2501:7b-12: bdag nyid du sngags pas bsgom pa'i don du byin
T02D2501:7b-13: gyis rlob par mdzad do zhes phal cher bshad de
T02D2501:7b-14: grags so // / gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D2501:7b-15: dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2501:7b-16: la sngon dam tshig mdzad pa'i rjes su dgongs nas
T02D2501:7b-17: lha rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par mdzad de /
T02D2501:7b-19: gang dag bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2501:7b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs tshogs //
T02D2501:7b-21: dam tshig nyams kyis 'jigs pas na //
T02D2501:7b-22: byin gyis rlob pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2501:7b-24: de bzhin du dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags
T02D2501:7b-25: pa'i yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi lha'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2501:7b-26: kyang dngos su lhar brtags pa'i lha'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2501:7b-27: du byin gyis rlob par mdzad par blta'o //
T02D2501:7b-28: de bzhin du rgyud gzhan las kyang /
T02D2501:7b-29: bdag lhar byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir yi ge'am phyag rgyar rnam par brtag go zhes bshad do //
T02D2501:7b-31: de nas phyag rgya 'am yi ge yis //
T02D2501:7b-32: rdo rje'i lus su bsgyur bar bya //
T02D2501:7b-34: de bzhin du yang yi ge lnga'am /
T02D2501:7b-37: yi ge mang po bkod pa tsam gyis de bzhin
T02D2501:7b-38: gshegs pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur bas na bde
T02D2501:7b-39: bar gshegs pa nyid du bshad do //
T02D2501:7b-40: phyag rgya yang mo d'a na da mu dr'a ste /
T02D2501:7b-42: mu dr'a na mu dr'a ste /
T02D2501:7b-43: phyag rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya bas de skad ces bshad do //
T02D2501:7b-45: des srog chags rnams bsrung ba'i phyir phan gdags pa dang /
T02D2501:8a-0: 'dod pa'i dngos grub myur du 'grub pa'i phyir rgyas @8a * //
T02D2501:8a-3: ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas //
T02D2501:8a-4: rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar //
T02D2501:8a-5: bdag chen nyid kyi phyag rgyas kyang //
T02D2501:8a-6: skye bo rnams la de bzhin btab //
T02D2501:8a-8: de bzhin du gzhan dag las kyang gsang ba'i bdag
T02D2501:8a-9: po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyan du gyur
T02D2501:8a-10: pa chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan ma phyag rgya'i
T02D2501:8a-11: rim par dbye ba'i le'u rgyas pa zhes bya ba
T02D2501:8a-12: yod do // des brgyan na byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2501:8a-13: rnams 'khor bar 'khor ba na 'gro ba thams cad
T02D2501:8a-14: du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas
T02D2501:8a-23: mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kun du 'byol
T02D2501:8a-24: bar 'gyur zhing de rnams kyang de dag gi bka'
T02D2501:8a-25: nyan par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:8a-26: phyag rgyas de ltar byin gyis rlob pa de yang skyes bu'i skal ba dang /
T02D2501:8a-28: mnyam par gzhag pa rnam pa gsum las chung ngu dang /
T02D2501:8a-29: 'bring po dang chen po'i bye brag rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:8a-30: de bas na dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags
T02D2501:8a-31: pa'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas lhar bsgom pa goms pa
T02D2501:8a-32: dang ldan pa chen po dang /
T02D2501:8a-34: chung ngu'i bye brag gis dgos pa yang rnam pa gsum du 'grub par bshad do //
T02D2501:8a-36: mya ngan las 'das par so sor bcings pa'am grol ba'am /
T02D2501:8a-37: don chen po la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs rnams 'jigs par byed pas na phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
T02D2501:8a-38: gzhung gzhan dag las kyang rgyud nas bshad pa 'di rnams gzhan du bstan pa /
T02D2501:8a-39: 'di ni dam tshig rtsa ba ste //
T02D2501:8a-40: dbu rgyan bcings pa rgyu yi mchog / gang gis lus kun brtan pas na //
T02D2501:8a-41: de bas phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags //
T02D2501:8a-43: de kho na nyid rab tu dbye ba bsdus pa'o //
T02D2501:8a-44: de bas na bdag nyid chen po des de rig
T02D2501:8a-45: par byas nas nges par sems can gyi tshogs chen
T02D2501:8a-46: po la phan gdags pa'i phyir go 'phang dam pa
T02D2501:8a-47: thob par 'dod pas bde bar gshegs pa sras dang
T02D2501:8a-48: bcas pa thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas bdag
T02D2501:8b-0: gis lhag pa'i lha sems dpa' gang @8b yang rung
T02D2501:8b-1: ba cig ji ltar yongs su bzung ba mnyes par
T02D2501:8b-2: byed pas gang 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2501:8b-3: // mnyes par bya ba'i yan lag rnams kyi bye
T02D2501:8b-4: brag kyang 'dir phal cher lung gi tshig gis blta
T02D2501:8b-5: // bar bya'o // de'i phyir de'i thabs kyi cho
T02D2501:8b-6: ga shes pa'i bla ma rin po che mnyes pa
T02D2501:8b-7: // bar bya'o // nyid du bya'o // de nas
T02D2501:8b-8: bla ma mnyes par byas pa des bstan pa'i dkyil
T02D2501:8b-11: chos dang las kyi dkyil 'khor du cho ga ji
T02D2501:8b-12: lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bas theg pa chen
T02D2501:8b-13: po mngon par rtogs pa'i cho gas sngom pa gzung
T02D2501:8b-14: ba dang / yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig dang /
T02D2501:8b-17: spyod yul rnams la cho ga bzhin du mkhas par
T02D2501:8b-18: byas pas de phyin chad dam tshig la sogs pa
T02D2501:8b-19: ji ltar blangs pa bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu spro
T02D2501:8b-20: ba mi glod par bya ste /
T02D2501:8b-21: bdag dang gzhan gyi don ma lus par sgrub pa la de thog mar 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:8b-22: dam tshig kyang skabs 'dir ni 'bras bu 'dod pa
T02D2501:8b-23: rnams kyis mi 'da' bar bya ba yin pas rang
T02D2501:8b-24: gi lhag pa'i lha mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2501:8b-25: rjes su mthun ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
T02D2501:8b-26: spyod pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs
T02D2501:8b-27: pa la 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid de
T02D2501:8b-28: ston pas gsungs pa'i tshul gyis khyad par ro //
T02D2501:8b-30: 'dir kun rtogs shing chud par 'gyur bas na rgyud
T02D2501:8b-31: nas bshad pa la dgongs nas dam tshig ces bshad
T02D2501:8b-32: do // de yang lha thams cad thun mong ba dang khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
T02D2501:8b-33: rgyud 'di dang de las gzhan pa'i dpal mchog dang
T02D2501:8b-34: po la sogs pa cha mthun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2501:8b-35: rgyud rnams dang / rdo rje rtse mo la sogs
T02D2501:8b-36: pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor gyi tshul thams cad kyi dgongs
T02D2501:8b-37: pa 'grel pa rnams las bshad par rig par bya'o
T02D2501:8b-38: rgyud rnams dang / // de gnyis las rgyud gzhan
T02D2501:8b-39: las gsungs pa lha thams cad thun mong ba de
T02D2501:8b-40: re zhig bshad par bya ste /
T02D2501:8b-41: gang gi phyir de yang don gyis rjes su brtag
T02D2501:8b-42: na 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus par mngon te
T02D2501:8b-43: / de ltar re zhig dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa //
T02D2501:8b-44: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di //
T02D2501:8b-45: rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02D2501:9a-2: dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no //
T02D2501:9a-3: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
T02D2501:9a-4: phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa //
T02D2501:9a-5: gang ni bskyed pa tsam gyis su //
T02D2501:9a-6: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs pa med //
T02D2501:9a-7: dam pa'i chos ni mi smod cing //
T02D2501:9a-8: nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02D2501:9a-9: mi shes pa dang rmongs pa yis //
T02D2501:9a-10: tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D2501:9a-11: bdag ni yongs su spangs nas su //
T02D2501:9a-12: dka' thub kyis kyang ma gdung shig / ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung //
T02D2501:9a-13: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2501:9a-14: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste ;
T02D2501:9a-16: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi //
T02D2501:9a-17: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
T02D2501:9a-18: de ni sangs rgyas smad pas na //
T02D2501:9a-20: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad //
T02D2501:9a-21: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtso ba dang//
T02D2501:9a-22: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis //
T02D2501:9a-23: bsad nas sems can dmyal ltung 'gyur //
T02D2501:9a-24: de bas bsam gtan thams cad kyis //
T02D2501:9a-25: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che //
T02D2501:9a-26: dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa //
T02D2501:9a-27: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2501:9a-28: rtag tu bdag gis dam tshig bsrung //
T02D2501:9a-29: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02D2501:9a-30: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul //
T02D2501:9a-32: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02D2501:9a-33: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2501:9a-34: de byin bsod nams tshogs dag gis //
T02D2501:9a-35: dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:9a-38: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas /
T02D2501:9a-39: srid pa rnam par dag pa thabs kyi mchog / rtog pa thams cad gsang ba chen po yi //
T02D2501:9a-40: dam tshig rtag tu bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:9a-41: de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad kyi rab
T02D2501:9a-42: tu gsang ba bla ma med pa theg pa chen
T02D2501:9a-43: po'i dam tshig chen po rnal 'byor pa bcom ldan
T02D2501:9a-45: de ji lta zhe na de bzhin du //
T02D2501:9a-46: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
T02D2501:9a-47: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
T02D2501:9a-48: phyag rgya dam tshig ces su bshad //
T02D2501:9b-0: yid kyi lus ni @9b brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:9b-1: srid pa bde ba chung ngu yi //
T02D2501:9b-2: sdug bsngal chen po zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D2501:9b-3: shin tu bzang zhing bde ba'i thabs //
T02D2501:9b-4: zhi bar mdzad pa'i dam tshig 'di //
T02D2501:9b-5: da bas thams cad 'dod longs spyod //
T02D2501:9b-6: ci 'dod pa ru spyad nas su //
T02D2501:9b-7: rang gi lha ya rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2501:9b-8: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2501:9b-10: 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i sgra yang skabs 'dir rang
T02D2501:9b-11: gi lha nyid byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa chen
T02D2501:9b-12: po las byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bya'o //
T02D2501:9b-13: 'dod pa de'i longs spyod kyang bzhi ste /
T02D2501:9b-15: byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje l'a s+ya dang /
T02D2501:9b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2501:9b-18: gzungs kyi yon tan me tog gi mtshan nyid rdo rje phreng ba dang /
T02D2501:9b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rab sgrogs pa'i mtshan nyid rdo rje glu dang /
T02D2501:9b-20: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa gar gyi mtshan nyid rdo rje gar ma rnams te /
T02D2501:9b-21: de bzhi ni rang gi lha'i 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i longs spyod du rig par bya'o //
T02D2501:9b-22: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa stong phrag brgya pa las kyang //
T02D2501:9b-23: sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba //
T02D2501:9b-24: mkhas pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //
T02D2501:9b-25: bsrungs na bsod nams chen po ni //
T02D2501:9b-26: thams cad kun du skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2501:9b-29: gang dag du ma rgya chen po //
T02D2501:9b-30: kha dog dang ni dbyibs gdan dang //
T02D2501:9b-31: phyag bskyod la sogs gzugs 'di ni ;
T02D2501:9b-32: / sku yi gsang bar rig par bya'o //
T02D2501:9b-33: rdo rje tshig gi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:9b-34: smra ba chos kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2501:9b-35: 'di ni gsal bar gsung gsang ba //
T02D2501:9b-36: rdo rje tshig ni sgra med pa'o //
T02D2501:9b-37: rang gi sems ni rab rtogs pas //
T02D2501:9b-38: zla ba la ni rdo rje bsgom //
T02D2501:9b-39: rnam gsum gcig tu bsgom pa ni //
T02D2501:9b-40: thugs kyi gsang ba 'di zhes bya //
T02D2501:9b-41: de dag de nyid mchog chen po //
T02D2501:9b-42: rtag tu yang dang yang bsgom pa //
T02D2501:9b-43: gsum gyi sbyor bas grub 'gyur te //
T02D2501:9b-44: gzhan du ma yin kun mkhyen gsungs //
T02D2501:9b-45: gsang ba gsum gyi cho ga yis //
T02D2501:9b-46: phyag rgya thams cad shin tu bsdus //
T02D2501:10a-0: @10a * // de bas rnam pa thams cad du //
T02D2501:10a-1: gsang ba rnam gsum rnam par sba /
T02D2501:10a-2: rdo rje chen po mchog 'dzin pa //
T02D2501:10a-3: mgon po chen po byin brlabs pa //
T02D2501:10a-4: blo ngan gang zhig 'da' ba ni //
T02D2501:10a-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa mod la spong //
T02D2501:10a-6: spangs pa'i sems can chen po de //
T02D2501:10a-7: ngan song gsum du yang dang yang //
T02D2501:10a-8: ji srid 'khor ba'i spyod yul du //
T02D2501:10a-9: shin tu mi bzad cho nges 'debs //
T02D2501:10a-11: 'dir yang su la bstan par rigs she na /
T02D2501:10a-13: rdo rje dbyings ni dga' chen po //
T02D2501:10a-14: mngon par dbang bskur mkhas pa gang //
T02D2501:10a-15: rtag tu gsang ba'i mchog dang ldan //
T02D2501:10a-16: de la mkhas pas bstan par bya'o //
T02D2501:10a-19: gsungs pa'i dam tshig la gnas pa ni /
T02D2501:10a-20: rtag tu nang spyang ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi gtsang spra bya ba dang /
T02D2501:10a-21: dka' ba spyod pa la sogs pa lus la gnod
T02D2501:10a-22: par 'gyur pa rnams mi bya ba 'di nyid du
T02D2501:10a-23: // sdom dang gtsang spra 'dir mi dgos //
T02D2501:10a-24: dka' thub dka' spyad mi dgos so //
T02D2501:10a-25: sangs rgyas kun dang sems dpa' che //
T02D2501:10a-28: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud
T02D2501:10a-29: thams cad kyi dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las
T02D2501:10a-30: kyang // srog gi phyir yang byang chub sems //
T02D2501:10a-31: yongs su gtang bar mi bya zhing //
T02D2501:10a-32: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag / nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02D2501:10a-33: dkon mchog gsum ni mi gtong ste //
T02D2501:10a-34: dad pa yang ni yongs mi gtang //
T02D2501:10a-35: sdom pa yang ni mi spang zhing //
T02D2501:10a-36: bdag kyang gdung bar mi bya'o //
T02D2501:10a-37: slob dpon la ni ma smod cing //
T02D2501:10a-38: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs //
T02D2501:10a-39: sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad la //
T02D2501:10a-40: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2501:10a-42: cung zad mtshan mar byas pa gang //
T02D2501:10a-43: dngos grub 'dod pas sbyor shes pas //
T02D2501:10a-45: de bzhin dman ma lha yi grib //
T02D2501:10a-46: bla ma'i stan la sogs de bzhin //
T02D2501:10a-47: blo can gyis ni rtag tu spang //
T02D2501:10b-0: rkang pas kyang ni ma 'goms shig / lus kyi sdig @10b pa rnam gsum dang //
T02D2501:10b-1: ngag gi yang ni rnam bzhi dang //
T02D2501:10b-2: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag kyang //
T02D2501:10b-3: de bzhin kun tu mi spyod do //
T02D2501:10b-5: yang yul dang dus kyi dbang gis mi 'god pa la 'god pa dang //
T02D2501:10b-6: brdzis pa la sogs pa yang rdo rje shugs dang ldan pa dang ;
T02D2501:10b-7: phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor pa la ni gnad pa ste /
T02D2501:10b-8: de bas na de gnyis de lta bu'i yul dang
T02D2501:10b-9: dus kyi dbang gis byas na mi 'go dang ba
T02D2501:10b-10: dang 'gong ba la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa la
T02D2501:10b-13: mi shes pa'am gti mug dang /
T02D2501:10b-14: de bzhin le lo 'am mi dran pas //
T02D2501:10b-15: rdo rje ri mo la sogs brdzis /
T02D2501:10b-16: nges par dam tshig nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2501:10b-17: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02D2501:10b-18: rdo rje shugs kyis ma yengs par //
T02D2501:10b-19: shes rab can gyis rtag tu bya //
T02D2501:10b-20: khyad par du ni dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2501:10b-21: dman ma ri mo rdo rje'i mtshan //
T02D2501:10b-22: sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshogs //
T02D2501:10b-23: dman nam brdzis par gyur pa yang //
T02D2501:10b-24: rdo rje shugs ldan nyes mi 'gyur //
T02D2501:10b-26: phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang du byas nas kyang de bzhin du gsungs te /
T02D2501:10b-27: rdo rje shugs zhes bya ba'i sgra'i gnas su phyag
T02D2501:10b-28: rgya'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba sgra brjod par bya'o
T02D2501:10b-29: zhes khyad par du gzung ngo //
T02D2501:10b-30: de la re zhig 'dir rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2501:10b-31: gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor pa dag bstan pa 'di ltar /
T02D2501:10b-32: ri mo'am rdo rje srad bu'ang ma rung //
T02D2501:10b-33: yid kyis gyen du bteg nas ni //
T02D2501:10b-35: dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:10b-37: rdo rje ri mo dang rdo rje'i srad bu smos pa yang nye ba'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2501:10b-38: de bas na phyag rgya la sogs pa 'god par mi bya ba gzhan yang 'dus par blta'o //
T02D2501:10b-39: 'di ni yid kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2501:10b-41: badzra be ga aa kra ma /
T02D2501:10b-42: gzhan dag tu 'di skad kyang bshad de //
T02D2501:10b-43: bdag nyid rdo rje shugs ldan pas //
T02D2501:10b-45: rdo rje shugs zhes bshad pa ste //
T02D2501:10b-47: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2501:11a-0: rang gi lha'i sbyor ba rjes su sgrub pa dang @11a * //
T02D2501:11a-2: de yang gzhung 'di las rab tu grags pa ni phyis bshad do //
T02D2501:11a-3: gzhung gzhan dag las kyang phyir smos pa ni //
T02D2501:11a-4: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2501:11a-5: bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02D2501:11a-6: byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2501:11a-7: de bas 'dir ni rab tu brtag / phyag rgya
T02D2501:11a-8: thams cad kyi sbyor ba rab tu gsang ba'o zhes
T02D2501:11a-9: gsungs so // rnal 'byor gyi sgra'i don kyang de nyid las gtso bor bstan te /
T02D2501:11a-12: rdzas mang po bsdus pa la sbyor ba zhes grub pa de bzhin du /
T02D2501:11a-13: phyag rgya thams cad bdag tu sbyor ba thams cad
T02D2501:11a-14: dam tshig gi rnal 'byor ces bya ba'i skabs su
T02D2501:11a-15: bstan pa / phyag rgya kun du bdag sbyor ba //
T02D2501:11a-16: dbyibs dang lus ni ci 'dra bar //
T02D2501:11a-17: bdag nyid la ni bdag nyid du //
T02D2501:11a-18: yang dag bkod de rjes su bsgrub //
T02D2501:11a-21: rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba //
T02D2501:11a-22: dbyibs dang lus ni ci 'dra bar //
T02D2501:11a-23: phyag rgya kun du bdag sbyor ba //
T02D2501:11a-26: rjes su sgrub pa 'di yang de nyid las //
T02D2501:11a-27: lha nyid gang dang gang dag gis //
T02D2501:11a-28: phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa //
T02D2501:11a-29: de dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2501:11a-30: phyag rgya de dang de 'grub po //
T02D2501:11a-32: de bas na rdo rje shugs can dang //
T02D2501:11a-33: phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor pas mchod par bya
T02D2501:11a-34: ba'i grib ma la sogs pa 'gong pa la sogs
T02D2501:11a-35: pas dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ba de lta
T02D2501:11a-36: bur 'grub po // lha thams cad spyi'i dam tshig mdong bsdus pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2501:11a-37: gzhung 'dir ni lha so sor nges pa'i dam tshig
T02D2501:11a-38: bstan pas na dam tshig rnam pa lngar gsungs so
T02D2501:11a-39: // gang gi phyir 'di la lha rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2501:11a-40: thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2501:11a-41: de las byung ba'i rigs dang /
T02D2501:11a-42: rdo rje dang padma dang rin po che las byung ba'i rigs rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D2501:11a-43: de ltar 'di dag ni lha rnam pa lnga'i bye brag bstan pa ste /
T02D2501:11a-44: de bas na 'di ni bsdus te bstan pa'o //
T02D2501:11b-0: rab tu phye ste bshad @11b na ;
T02D2501:11b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams gcig tu gyur pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi sku rtag pa dang /
T02D2501:11b-5: don yod grub pa zhes bya ba rnams te /
T02D2501:11b-6: don lngar bshad pa rnam pa lngar btags pa ste grags pa rnams so //
T02D2501:11b-7: de rnams so sor re re la yang rigs su
T02D2501:11b-8: gyur pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las kyang
T02D2501:11b-9: rtag pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag las rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D2501:11b-10: gzhung chen po las ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2501:11b-11: mtha' yas pa'i phyir de dag gi rigs kyang mtha'
T02D2501:11b-13: rigs lngar bshad pa yang bsdus te bshad pa nyid du bstan te /
T02D2501:11b-15: rtag dang mi 'khrugs rin chen dbang //
T02D2501:11b-17: rigs ni rnam pa brgyar bshad pa ;
T02D2501:11b-18: / mdor bsdus pa ni rnam pa lnga //
T02D2501:11b-20: rdo rje dang padma dang rin po che'i rigs rnams
T02D2501:11b-21: kyang re re las kyang so so'i dkyil 'khor rnam
T02D2501:11b-22: pa bzhi ste / de la rdo rje'i rigs ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02D2501:11b-23: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2501:11b-25: rdo rje dbab pa zhes bya ba rnams so //
T02D2501:11b-26: de bzhin du padma'i rigs la ni 'gro ba 'dul ba dang /
T02D2501:11b-29: sna tshogs padma zhes bya ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2501:11b-30: rin po che'i rigs la yang /
T02D2501:11b-31: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02D2501:11b-34: rin chen dbab pa rnams te /
T02D2501:11b-35: rigs kyi bye brag rnam pa bzhir bstan to //
T02D2501:11b-36: de ltar 'di dag spyir bsdoms na rigs bcu bdun du 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:11b-37: bsdus te bshad na ni rigs bzhir bshad de las
T02D2501:11b-38: kyi rigs ni de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud 'dir logs
T02D2501:11b-40: de ni rin po che'i rigs kyi nang du bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:11b-42: bla na med pa'i mtshan dang /
T02D2501:11b-43: dpe byad rin po che sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid rgyal ba ma lus pa'i sku'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D2501:12a-2: de bas na byed pa po dang las tha mi
T02D2501:12a-3: dad par rigs pas na bde bar gshegs pa thams
T02D2501:12a-4: cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid las sna tshogs dang
T02D2501:12a-5: tha mi dad par dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:12a-6: rdo rje rtse mo las ni ji ltar brtag pa'i
T02D2501:12a-7: bye brag de la brten nas las kyi rigs lhag
T02D2501:12a-8: par bshad de / de bas ni de ltar rigs lngar grags so //
T02D2501:12a-9: bdud rtsi 'byung ba las ni de ltar brtag pa
T02D2501:12a-10: nyid las rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs ni rigs thams
T02D2501:12a-11: cad kyi gtso bor brtags nas khro bo'i rigs der
T02D2501:12a-13: de la sogs pa'i rigs rnam par brtag pa ni
T02D2501:12a-14: 'dul ba'i skye bo la gzigs nas bstan par shes
T02D2501:12a-15: par bya'o // de ltar rnam pa des rgyud 'dir
T02D2501:12a-16: rigs bzhir bsdus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D2501:12a-17: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang /
T02D2501:12a-18: spyod pa mtha' yas pa mi zad pa'i bkod pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D2501:12a-19: de bzhin du rigs bzhi rnams la yang /
T02D2501:12a-20: dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su ni lha rnams dgod pa gzugs kyi skur bkod pa'i phyir /
T02D2501:12a-21: sku mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par sprul pa bsdus pa yin par blta'o //
T02D2501:12a-22: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar rtogs pa'i
T02D2501:12a-23: rnam par grol ba'i sgo mtshon par byed pa rdo
T02D2501:12a-25: mda' dang mgu ba la sogs pa rnam par bkod
T02D2501:12a-26: pa nye ba'i mtshan nyid ni thugs mi zad pa
T02D2501:12a-27: rnam par bkod pa'i mdzod rnam par sprul pa bsdus
T02D2501:12a-28: pa'o // chos kyi 'khor lo ni ji ltar rtogs
T02D2501:12a-29: pa'i chos bstan pa'i thabs spyod pa mnyam par gzhag
T02D2501:12a-30: pa rnam par bkod cing gnas pa'i lha rnams te
T02D2501:12a-31: pa'o // / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2501:12a-32: gsung mi zad pa rnam par bkod pa'i mdzod rnam
T02D2501:12a-33: par sprul par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2501:12a-34: de bzhin du las kyi dkyil 'khor la yang mchod
T02D2501:12a-35: pa la sogs pa'i las kyi lha rnams bkod pas
T02D2501:12a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi
T02D2501:12a-37: don spyod pa la sogs pa bsdus pa bstan par
T02D2501:12a-38: blta'o // rim pa 'dis ni sku la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir /
T02D2501:12a-39: dkyil 'khor rnam bzhir gsungs mod kyi /
T02D2501:12b-0: 'on kyang @12b phal cher lus med pa'i sems kyang mi srid la /
T02D2501:12b-1: sems kyang lus med pa dag kyang mi srid de /
T02D2501:12b-2: de bas na dkyil 'khor so so las kyang sku la sogs pa bzhi char dgos par blta'o //
T02D2501:12b-3: de bas na rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du
T02D2501:12b-4: yang sku la sogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa go
T02D2501:12b-5: rims bzhin du phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2501:12b-6: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya dang rnam pa bzhi 'dir bshad do //
T02D2501:12b-7: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku mi
T02D2501:12b-8: zad pa la sogs pa rnam par bkod pa'i rigs
T02D2501:12b-9: so so'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhis bsdus par bstan
T02D2501:12b-10: pa yin no // de bas na sku la sogs pa'i lha rnams rigs bzhir gsungs pa /
T02D2501:12b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2501:12b-12: rigs so so'i dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid rigs
T02D2501:12b-13: kyi bye brag las ji skad du gsungs pa btus
T02D2501:12b-15: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig ni /
T02D2501:12b-17: de ni 'dod chags nyid kyis spyang //
T02D2501:12b-18: 'di ni sangs rgyas phyag rgya che //
T02D2501:12b-19: ye shes dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02D2501:12b-20: 'dir ni 'dod chags la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes
T02D2501:12b-21: bya ba'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems goms par
T02D2501:12b-23: 'dod chags kyis spyang zhes bya ba 'dis kyang byang
T02D2501:12b-24: chub kyi sems goms par byed cing rjes su chags
T02D2501:12b-25: pas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgrub pa
T02D2501:12b-26: dang / sems can smin pa dang ;
T02D2501:12b-27: grol bar bya ba la chags par nan tan bya'o zhes bstan pa'o //
T02D2501:12b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig kyang 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:12b-29: 'dod la skyo bar mi bya ba //
T02D2501:12b-30: dam tshig shin tu tshul chen te //
T02D2501:12b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag las //
T02D2501:12b-32: rgyal ba rnams kyang 'da' mi mdzad //
T02D2501:12b-34: 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i sgra yang 'dir byang chub kyi sems nyid bstan pa dang /
T02D2501:12b-37: rab tu 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang
T02D2501:12b-38: ldan pa rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D2501:13a-0: @13a * // 'dod cing mngon par dad par bya ba yin par rgyud nas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:13a-1: de bas na byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin
T02D2501:13a-2: bdag gi rnam par grol ba la rjes su zhen
T02D2501:13a-3: par rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin la skyo bar
T02D2501:13a-4: mi bya ste / nyin mtshan du ci nus par
T02D2501:13a-5: ngal bso zhing der bsam pa brtan par bya'o zhes
T02D2501:13a-8: 'dod pa bcom ldan rtag pa ste //
T02D2501:13a-9: sems can thams cad bde stsol ba //
T02D2501:13a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid ces //
T02D2501:13a-13: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te /
T02D2501:13a-14: 'dod pa la sogs bde ba kun //
T02D2501:13a-15: rtag tu bdag nyid snying gar gnas //
T02D2501:13a-16: ae ma'o sems can don gyi phyir //
T02D2501:13a-17: ma chags pa yang chags par bshad //
T02D2501:13a-19: don de nyid dam tshig chen po de kho na
T02D2501:13a-20: nyid kyi rtog pa las dam tshig bshad pa'i phyir
T02D2501:13a-23: sgrub pa chen po dang ldan par bya ste /
T02D2501:13a-24: de la sgrub pa ni 'dod pa rnams las mi skyo bas so //
T02D2501:13a-26: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'o zhes rgya cher bstan to //
T02D2501:13a-29: rin po che'i rigs kyi dam tshig 'di ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:13a-30: sems can don phyir mi khro ba'ang //
T02D2501:13a-31: khro bo chen por rab ston pa //
T02D2501:13a-32: 'di ni rdo rje rigs chen gyi //
T02D2501:13a-34: khro bo chen po zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'jig
T02D2501:13a-35: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2501:13a-36: po la sogs pa yin par bstan te /
T02D2501:13a-37: khro bar bcos pa dang bcas pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2501:13a-38: padma rigs kyi dam tshig ni //
T02D2501:13a-39: rang bzhin dag par shes nas ni //
T02D2501:13a-40: dgos pa de dang de dag byed //
T02D2501:13a-43: 'dir yang rang bzhin dag pa ni chos thams cad rnam pa med par mos pa ste /
T02D2501:13a-44: de sngon du byas nas phyag rgya chen po la
T02D2501:13a-45: sogs pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dgos pa
T02D2501:13a-46: de dang de bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2501:13b-0: rin po che'i rigs @13b kyi dam tshig ni /
T02D2501:13b-1: nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung //
T02D2501:13b-2: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ni //
T02D2501:13b-3: sbyin pa nyin gcig bzhin du yang //
T02D2501:13b-4: bya ba 'di ni dam tshig go //
T02D2501:13b-6: 'di ni dam tshig rnam pa lnga ste lha rnam
T02D2501:13b-7: pa lngar smos pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du rjes
T02D2501:13b-8: su mthun par gtso bor bstan mod kyi /
T02D2501:13b-9: rigs gzhan gang yang rung ba zlos pas kyang rnam pa lnga car bsrung dgos te /
T02D2501:13b-10: bde bar gshegs pa las gzhan pa ji skad du
T02D2501:13b-11: gsungs pa'i lha'i bye brag rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2501:13b-12: ngo bo nyid yin pa dang /
T02D2501:13b-13: de dag gi dam tshig thams cad kyang bde bar
T02D2501:13b-14: gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi ngo bo yin pa dang
T02D2501:13b-15: / bde bar gshegs pa'i tshul gyis gsang sngags zlos
T02D2501:13b-16: pa rnams kyang rgyal ba thams cad la bdag gi
T02D2501:13b-17: / lus phul bas / des gsungs pa bzhin du
T02D2501:13b-18: bya bar khas blangs pas de dag mthun par bya
T02D2501:13b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang sngon 'gro ba
T02D2501:13b-21: ma lus pa 'di dag sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis
T02D2501:13b-22: kyi dri mas yog cing de las byung ba'i nad
T02D2501:13b-24: thugs rje'i dbang du gyur pa'i thugs kyis 'dod chags
T02D2501:13b-25: la sogs pa'i skyon dang ldan pa kha cig ngo
T02D2501:13b-26: bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa mngon du gyur
T02D2501:13b-27: pa'i yid dang ldan pa rnams la rab tu zhi
T02D2501:13b-28: ba nyid kyi tshogs yongs su dag par mdzad do
T02D2501:13b-29: // yang 'dod chags la sogs pas sems shin tu
T02D2501:13b-30: dbang du byas pa kha cig la ni bdag nyid
T02D2501:13b-31: rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa thams cad dang
T02D2501:13b-32: bral yang 'dod pa dang khro ba la sogs pa
T02D2501:13b-33: so sor mthun par bstan nas /
T02D2501:13b-34: nyes pa de dang de dag ji ltar rigs pas spong ngo //
T02D2501:13b-35: de bas na rnal 'byor pa bde bar gshegs pa'i
T02D2501:13b-36: go 'phang thob par 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang sems
T02D2501:13b-37: can gyi khams mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba'i
T02D2501:13b-38: thabs dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D2501:13b-39: nyid 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la shin tu brtan
T02D2501:13b-40: par rjes su chags par bya'o //
T02D2501:13b-41: nyan thos ltar phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya
T02D2501:13b-42: ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la gzhol bas rnam pa
T02D2501:14a-1: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la skyo ba bskyed par mi bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-2: de bzhin du gdug pa'i skye bo bdag dang gzhan
T02D2501:14a-3: la gnod par sbyor zhing ngan par spyod pa rnams
T02D2501:14a-4: la rab tu bsdigs par bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-5: sems can rnams la byams pa yid du bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-6: las thams cad la yang chos thams cad kyi ngo
T02D2501:14a-7: bo nyid dag par bltas nas ma chags par bya'o
T02D2501:14a-8: // thabs kyis ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa la
T02D2501:14a-9: mos pas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don bya ba
T02D2501:14a-10: dang de sgrub pa la chags par bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-11: bdag la sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po mang du mi bdog go //
T02D2501:14a-12: zhes nyin re bzhin sbyin pa'i bar chad mi bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-13: ci nus par chung ngam ngan yang bla'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2501:14a-14: yang ye des 'di las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-15: de bas na gang yang rung ba'i rigs la rang gi lha mnyes par byed pas kyang /
T02D2501:14a-16: rigs kyi rjes su mthun par bstan pa'i dam tshig
T02D2501:14a-17: gi bye brag 'di dag thams cad kyang ci nus
T02D2501:14a-18: pas kyang rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-19: mnyes par bya ba rang gi lha'i rjes su mthun
T02D2501:14a-20: pa'i dam tshig gang yang rung ba la ni shin
T02D2501:14a-21: tu lhag par nan tan du bya dgos te khyad
T02D2501:14a-23: dam tshig 'di yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i tshe ni khyad par du yid la bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-24: 'di dag ni dam tshig gi bye brag bsdus pa'o //
T02D2501:14a-25: de ltar de la sogs pa gzhan yang de bzhin
T02D2501:14a-26: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i
T02D2501:14a-27: lha sgrub pa pos rgyud dang mthun par bla ma'i
T02D2501:14a-28: man ngag las bzlas brjod byed pa'am /
T02D2501:14a-29: bsgoms pas bsgrub pa'i yan lag rnams nges par byas
T02D2501:14a-30: nas de la nan tan bya bar yid shin tu
T02D2501:14a-32: grogs po mthun pa dang lhan cig gam /
T02D2501:14a-33: yang na gcig pu rtsol ba dang gnyis kyis bzlas brjod byed pa dang /
T02D2501:14a-34: bsgom pa la sogs pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2501:14a-35: de'i rim pa yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:14a-36: dang por re zhig nang par gyi dus la bab pa dang /
T02D2501:14a-37: khri la sogs pa med pa la rnal 'byor dang
T02D2501:14a-38: rjes su mthun pa'i mal bde ba nas langs la
T02D2501:14a-39: / dam pa'i chos klog pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2501:14b-0: nas @14b mi brjed pa'i chos nyid mngon par 'phel
T02D2501:14b-1: bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan mo dang nyin par legs
T02D2501:14b-2: par spyad pa'i yi dam ji ltar blangs pa zhig
T02D2501:14b-3: / pa'am / ma zhig pa lugs dang mthun pa dang /
T02D2501:14b-4: lugs dang mi mthun pa dran par byas te nyes
T02D2501:14b-5: pa yang phyin chad mi bya ba'i sems bskyed la
T02D2501:14b-6: dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs
T02D2501:14b-7: pa la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po rnams thang
T02D2501:14b-8: cig yud tsam zhig dran pa sngon du byas nas
T02D2501:14b-9: phyag 'tshal lo // de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i
T02D2501:14b-10: rang gi rigs kyi srung ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa
T02D2501:14b-12: phyi rol gyi sa la sogs par 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2501:14b-13: de las gzhan pa'i dus dang spyod pa'i tshe dam
T02D2501:14b-14: tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal yongs su ma btang du
T02D2501:14b-15: zin kyang phyi rol gyi sa la sogs par 'gro
T02D2501:14b-16: ba'i tshe rang gi rigs dang rjes su mthun par
T02D2501:14b-17: srung ba'i sbyor ba nan tan mi gtong ngo //
T02D2501:14b-19: dngos po'i ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu sbyor ba
T02D2501:14b-20: la de lta bu'i dus nyid kyi tshe na dam
T02D2501:14b-21: tshig gis nges par byed par ni rigs so //
T02D2501:14b-22: de la de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byed pa
T02D2501:14b-23: rnams kyi dbang du byas te srung ba gsungs pa
T02D2501:14b-24: ni 'di'o // sems can thams cad yongs mi gtang//
T02D2501:14b-25: rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod pa'i bdag / rtag tu sangs rgyas yid la byed //
T02D2501:14b-26: srung ba 'di ni dam pa mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D2501:14b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi srung ba yang /
T02D2501:14b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig gcig //
T02D2501:14b-29: ming tsam yongs su 'dzin pa yang //
T02D2501:14b-30: 'di ni srung ba chen po ste //
T02D2501:14b-31: nges par 'grub ste skad cig gis //
T02D2501:14b-33: de nas phyi rol gyi sa la sogs par bya
T02D2501:14b-34: ba byas nas gtsang sbra ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2501:14b-35: byas te / de bzhin du srung ba'i sbyor ba
T02D2501:14b-36: yang rjes su dran par byas nas chos thams cad
T02D2501:14b-37: spros pa dang bral bar snga nas bsgoms pas sgyu
T02D2501:14b-39: rmi lam la sogs par snang ba dang 'dra bar 'jig rten na grags pa rnams blos brtags te /
T02D2501:14b-40: phyi rol gyi khrus la sogs pa gtsang sbra'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa spang ngo //
T02D2501:14b-41: gzhan du na de lta bu'i 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba dang /
T02D2501:15a-0: @15a * // rang gi lus la phan zhing bde bar bya ba'i
T02D2501:15a-1: phyir ni gtsang sbra dang spyad pa'i cho ga ji
T02D2501:15a-2: ltar bstan pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2501:15a-3: yang na rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i nga
T02D2501:15a-4: rgyal mngon du byas pa ni phyi rol gyi gtsang
T02D2501:15a-5: spra la sogs pa mi dgos pa'i rgyur bshad de
T02D2501:15a-6: / de'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i yid la bya ba bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2501:15a-8: gtsang sbra bsdam pa 'dir mi dgos //
T02D2501:15a-9: dka' thub dka' spyad mi dgos te //
T02D2501:15a-10: sangs rgyas thams cad sems dpa' che //
T02D2501:15a-13: de ltar dag par kun du rtog pa legs par
T02D2501:15a-14: byas nas bdag gi yid dang mthun pa'i yul gyi
T02D2501:15a-15: bye brag gang yang rung ba'am /
T02D2501:15a-16: lha khang la sogs par gnas te /
T02D2501:15a-17: phyogs dang dus thams cad na bzhugs pa'i bde bar
T02D2501:15a-18: gshegs pa la sogs pa bla ma rnams la phyag
T02D2501:15a-19: 'tshal la kha nub phyogs su bltas sam phyogs thams
T02D2501:15a-20: cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pas gang 'dod par
T02D2501:15a-21: kha bltas te / ji ltar bde ba'i stan la
T02D2501:15a-22: 'dug nas de bzhin du srung ba'i sbyor ba rjes
T02D2501:15a-23: kha bltas te / su dran pas / bdag dang
T02D2501:15a-24: gzhan dang yo byad la sogs pa rnams yid kyis
T02D2501:15a-25: srung ba'i sbyor ba byas te /
T02D2501:15a-26: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal
T02D2501:15a-27: 'byor 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du byas
T02D2501:15a-28: la / dad pa'i lha rnams la mchod pa'i cho ga byas zin nas bzlas brjod bya ba'am /
T02D2501:15a-31: bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2501:15a-32: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2501:15a-34: 'dir yang mchod par dgongs pa dang /
T02D2501:15a-35: rang gi lhar bsgrub pa'i snying po rnams lan gnyis sam /
T02D2501:15a-37: de las lhag par brjod pas rang gi lha dgos pa sgrub par byed par gsungs te /
T02D2501:15a-38: rnal 'byor gyi tshul gyi cho ga la ting nge 'dzin gtso bor 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:15a-40: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2501:15a-41: bsgrub dang las rnams thams cad la //
T02D2501:15a-43: rtog pa kun las dngos grub stsol //
T02D2501:15b-0: de la re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams @15b dang ;
T02D2501:15b-1: de'i rigs kyi bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa'i cho ga 'dir bstan par bya'o //
T02D2501:15b-2: dang por re zhig de dag la mchod par bya
T02D2501:15b-3: ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dam
T02D2501:15b-4: tshig sems dpar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2501:15b-5: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig sems dpar sgrub pa'i cho ga ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:15b-6: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D2501:15b-8: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dag par mos pa bya ste /
T02D2501:15b-9: rdo rje thal mo snying gar bcings la de'i snying po brjod do //
T02D2501:15b-10: thal mo khong stong du byas la sor mo'i rtse mo rnams phan tshun du bsnol te gzung ngo //
T02D2501:15b-11: 'di ni rdo rje'i thal mo'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D2501:15b-14: de nas thal mo de nyid lag pa rgyab tu bkug pa ni rdo rje bcings pa ste /
T02D2501:15b-16: zhes bya ba ni snying po'o //
T02D2501:15b-17: de nas rdo rje bcings pa de las snying ga'i
T02D2501:15b-18: phyogs su sgra dang bcas par dgrol zhing snying po
T02D2501:15b-19: 'di brjod do // aom badzra bandha tra ta /
T02D2501:15b-20: de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2501:15b-21: de'i snying po brjod cing ye shes dbab pa dang /
T02D2501:15b-22: phyag rgya chen po dbab par bya'o //
T02D2501:15b-23: rdo rje bcings pa las mtheb mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni dbab pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2501:15b-24: aom badzra a'a be sha aa aa aa /
T02D2501:15b-25: zhes bya ba ni snying po'o //
T02D2501:15b-26: de'i 'og tu rang gi sems brtag pa la sogs
T02D2501:15b-27: pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:15b-28: pa thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D2501:15b-29: pa mos par byas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur
T02D2501:15b-30: bdag nyid byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2501:15b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' bsgrub pa bstan pa las /
T02D2501:15b-33: sems shes pa las brtsams nas ni //
T02D2501:15b-34: bdag nyid sangs rgyas skur bsgyur te //
T02D2501:15b-35: rdo rje dbyings ni zlos byed cing //
T02D2501:15b-36: rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:15b-38: rang gi sems brtag pa la sogs pa'i rim pa yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:15b-39: dang por re zhig yid bdag gi snying ga'i nang du bsdus la /
T02D2501:16a-0: lus thams cad kyi srog slar bsdus pa'i tshul gyis dbang po mtha' @16a * //
T02D2501:16a-1: dag gi rgyud nang du phyogs par byas nas /
T02D2501:16a-2: lce rkan la bcar te mgrin pa cung zad bkug la /
T02D2501:16a-3: mig zam zim byas nas lus drang por bsrangs te
T02D2501:16a-4: bzhag la sems brtag pa'i snying po dbugs mi 'byung
T02D2501:16a-5: bar brjod cing lus dang sems las su mi rung
T02D2501:16a-6: ba spangs te de gnyis mthun par 'jug par bya'o
T02D2501:16a-7: // de la rang gi sems brtag pa'i snying po ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:16a-9: aom tsitta pra ti be dh'am ka ro mi /
T02D2501:16a-10: rang gi sems brtag pa yang skabs 'dir ni gang
T02D2501:16a-11: zag dang chos la bdag med par bstan pa'i gtan
T02D2501:16a-12: tshigs kyis bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2501:16a-16: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma spangs te /
T02D2501:16a-17: cung zad cig nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dmigs nas
T02D2501:16a-18: zla ba tshes gcig gi shas 'dra ba nang stong
T02D2501:16a-19: pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par mos par
T02D2501:16a-20: bya'o // gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das don thams
T02D2501:16a-21: cad grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T02D2501:16a-22: pos mngon par rtogs pa'i tshe na /
T02D2501:16a-23: 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas /
T02D2501:16a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2501:16a-25: gyi rnam pa gang yin pa de ni zla ba'i
T02D2501:16a-28: 'dir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa zla ba'i
T02D2501:16a-29: dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i tshig
T02D2501:16a-30: gis na / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa
T02D2501:16a-31: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs pa yin par mngon
T02D2501:16a-32: gis na / te / gang gi phyir zla ba'i
T02D2501:16a-33: dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo zhes phyis smras pa'i
T02D2501:16a-34: gis na / te / phyir ro // de'i dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:16a-35: 'khor ba'i bag chags kyi rdul gyi khug rna thams cad spangs pas /
T02D2501:16a-36: sems de yongs su dag nas thog ma med pa'i
T02D2501:16a-37: dus nas bsags pa'i dkar po'i chos kyi bag chags
T02D2501:16a-38: yongs su ma rgyas pa dang ldan pas /
T02D2501:16a-39: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa yongs su ma rdzogs te /
T02D2501:16a-40: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par ma
T02D2501:16a-41: byas kyi bar du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig kho
T02D2501:16a-42: nar yongs su rdzogs par snang bar mi 'gyur ro
T02D2501:16b-0: // 'dis kyang 'bras bu @16b dang bcas pa'i ye
T02D2501:16b-1: shes kyis chos dkar po thams cad kyi bag chags
T02D2501:16b-2: kyi gnas thog ma med pa'i dus nas byung bar
T02D2501:16b-3: // bstan to // de nas rang bzhin gyis 'od
T02D2501:16b-4: gsal ba'i ye shes kyi zla ba de yongs su
T02D2501:16b-5: rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid brtan par byed pa'i
T02D2501:16b-6: rgyu byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i
T02D2501:16b-7: snying po 'dis skyed cig / aom bo dhi tsitto
T02D2501:16b-10: de ltar byas nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa 'od zer mang po 'phro ba'i sbyor bas /
T02D2501:16b-11: ston ka'i zla ba nya gang ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar rnyog pa med par mos par bya ste /
T02D2501:16b-12: shin tu yun ring du rab tu gsal bar snang ba dang dran pa dang /
T02D2501:16b-13: srog gnyis bsdams nas ji srid 'dod par bsam mo //
T02D2501:16b-14: 'dis ni rgyu'i gnas skabs su bsdus pa kun du
T02D2501:16b-15: bzang po'i ye shes kyi sa'i mthar thug pa bsod
T02D2501:16b-16: nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par
T02D2501:16b-17: byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o //
T02D2501:16b-18: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa las ni /
T02D2501:16b-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i steng du /
T02D2501:16b-20: zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa gnyis pa bsgom par
T02D2501:16b-21: bshad pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par rdzogs
T02D2501:16b-22: par byang chub pa'i byin gyis brlabs par bshad pas
T02D2501:16b-23: 'dul ba'i skye bo'i dbang gis gzhan du brtag pa
T02D2501:16b-24: nyid de / der ni rang gi sems rtog pas
T02D2501:16b-25: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad rnam
T02D2501:16b-26: nyid de / par dag cing / sa dang pha
T02D2501:16b-27: rol tu phyin pa'i bag chags yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D2501:16b-28: gnas skabs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snga mas byin gyis
T02D2501:16b-29: nyid de / par dag cing / brlabs so //
T02D2501:16b-30: zla ba gnyis pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2501:16b-31: kyi mngon par rtogs pa thob pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D2501:16b-32: ngo bo nyid kyi sems kyi mtshan mar bstan to
T02D2501:16b-33: nyid de / par dag cing / brlabs so //
T02D2501:16b-34: // de la gnas pa'i rdo rjes ni de'i 'og
T02D2501:16b-35: tu 'byung ba'i ye shes rnam par dag pa lnga
T02D2501:16b-36: rnams su byin gyis brlabs te 'di skad du yang
T02D2501:16b-37: nyid de / par dag cing / brlabs so //
T02D2501:16b-38: // de nyid las / snying po blo can gyis
T02D2501:16b-39: nyid de / par dag cing / brlabs so //
T02D2501:16b-40: // de nyid las / blangs nas // rang gi
T02D2501:16b-42: de ni skad cig mnyam gzhag la //
T02D2501:16b-43: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du blta //
T02D2501:16b-44: de ni sems kyi rang bzhin nam //
T02D2501:16b-45: kun nas nyon mongs sa bon yin//
T02D2501:17a-0: @17a * // dge dang mi dge ba yi sems //
T02D2501:17a-1: 'di ni kun gzhi sa bon yin //
T02D2501:17a-2: chos kyi mthar ni rtogs nas su //
T02D2501:17a-3: pha rol phyin drug bag chags bsags //
T02D2501:17a-4: yongs su dag pa'i sems chen de //
T02D2501:17a-5: nyon mongs kun gzhi ma yin gyi //
T02D2501:17a-6: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po //
T02D2501:17a-7: yun ring du ni bsags pa ste //
T02D2501:17a-8: ji ltar zla ba gang ba bzhin //
T02D2501:17a-9: dag cing dang ba dri ma med //
T02D2501:17a-10: de ltar tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:17a-11: rang sems zla ba gang ba bzhin //
T02D2501:17a-12: yod pa ma yin dngos med phyir //
T02D2501:17a-13: zla ba ltar yang mi bshad de //
T02D2501:17a-14: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen dag / rdzogs pas zla ba lta bur bshad //
T02D2501:17a-15: rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2501:17a-16: legs par byas pa'i tshogs mthong nas //
T02D2501:17a-17: dga' zhing mgu ba skyes pa ste //
T02D2501:17a-18: yang ni tshig tu rab smras pa //
T02D2501:17a-19: mgon po bcom ldan bdag gis ni //
T02D2501:17a-20: nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dang //
T02D2501:17a-21: gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yis //
T02D2501:17a-22: rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong //
T02D2501:17a-23: de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa //
T02D2501:17a-24: snga nas ma skyes sems bzang 'di //
T02D2501:17a-25: 'on kyang glo bur gyis nyon mongs //
T02D2501:17a-26: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems spyang ba'i //
T02D2501:17a-27: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2501:17a-28: nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa //
T02D2501:17a-29: byang chub sems kyang rnam par rtogs //
T02D2501:17a-30: kun du dga' ba'i snying po 'dis //
T02D2501:17a-31: snying po dag pa blangs nas kyang //
T02D2501:17a-32: zla ba'i dbus su rnam brtags na //
T02D2501:17a-33: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yang//
T02D2501:17a-34: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na mthong //
T02D2501:17a-35: de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa //
T02D2501:17a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
T02D2501:17a-38: de bas na rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa las
T02D2501:17a-39: gsungs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul
T02D2501:17a-40: yang dgongs pa gzhan yin la /
T02D2501:17a-41: 'dir yang gzhan du dgongs pas na nyes pa med pa'o //
T02D2501:17a-42: de nas kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa /
T02D2501:17a-43: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la /
T02D2501:17a-44: rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha gnyis pa bsams nas /
T02D2501:17b-0: de yang shin tu @17b gsal ba kun du snang bar bya'o //
T02D2501:17b-3: 'dis kyang mngon par byang chub pas thob par bya
T02D2501:17b-4: ba'i gnas skabs thob pa na thams cad mkhyen pa
T02D2501:17b-5: zhes bya ba'i yan lag lnga'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan
T02D2501:17b-6: pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas pa bstan
T02D2501:17b-7: to // de ltar 'di ni log par lta ba'i
T02D2501:17b-8: ri thams cad 'joms pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes
T02D2501:17b-9: rdo rje rtse mo dbus ma ni chos kyi dbyings
T02D2501:17b-10: rnam par dag pa'i mtshan mar bstan to //
T02D2501:17b-11: de las gzhan pa'i gzhi rnams ni me long lta bu dang /
T02D2501:17b-14: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su bstan to //
T02D2501:17b-15: kha gnyis kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
T02D2501:17b-16: kyi snang ba de phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i mthu bstan
T02D2501:17b-19: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yid la byas te /
T02D2501:17b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun du bzang
T02D2501:17b-21: po'i sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje de la de bzhin
T02D2501:17b-22: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D2501:17b-23: rdo rje'i dbyings su zhugs nas /
T02D2501:17b-24: rdo rje de shin tu yun ring du bsams pas
T02D2501:17b-25: rab tu gsal bar snang bar rab tu brtan par
T02D2501:17b-26: bya ste / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2501:17b-27: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ni bdag
T02D2501:17b-28: yin no snyam du nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D2501:17b-29: sku'i dbyings kyang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po rnams so //
T02D2501:17b-30: sangs rgyas kyi gsung bkod pa'i rgyan so sor snang ba yang 'dir gsung gi dbyings so //
T02D2501:17b-31: thugs kyi dbyings ni thugs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa ral gri dang /
T02D2501:17b-34: rin po che la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
T02D2501:17b-35: de bas na sgom pa shin tu brtan par bya
T02D2501:17b-36: ba bstan pa 'dis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T02D2501:17b-37: pa'i gnas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D2501:17b-38: mtshan nyid du byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o
T02D2501:17b-39: // de nas snying po 'di brjod do //
T02D2501:17b-40: ye shes kyi rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2501:17b-41: gnas pa de nyid 'od zer mang po 'phro ba
T02D2501:17b-42: dang 'du pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2501:18a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'jig @18a * //
T02D2501:18a-1: rten gyi khams mtha' yas par khyab par bdag nyid gyur par rab tu brtag to //
T02D2501:18a-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta s'a th'a aa ham /
T02D2501:18a-4: zhes bya ba 'dis kyang ye shes kyi kun du
T02D2501:18a-5: 'od kyis rgyu mthun par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:18a-6: pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams
T02D2501:18a-7: bsdus par blta'o // dgongs pa 'di dag thams cad
T02D2501:18a-8: kyang rdo rje rtse mo theg pa chen po mngon
T02D2501:18a-9: par rtogs par rab tu dbye ba las gsal bar
T02D2501:18a-10: bsdus par blta'o // bstan te / sra zhing sdug
T02D2501:18a-11: la rab tu dag / nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs
T02D2501:18a-12: bsdus par blta'o // bstan te / mnyam pa // gnas ngan len pa kun las grol //
T02D2501:18a-13: rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i mchog / nyon mongs
T02D2501:18a-14: dri ma thams cad dag / zla ba lta bu
T02D2501:18a-15: sngon mthong ba // byams dang snying rje las byung zhing //
T02D2501:18a-16: sems can la ni phan mdzad cing //
T02D2501:18a-17: byang chub sems chen rab tu dag / sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa //
T02D2501:18a-18: dge ba'i chos rnams kun rdzogs shing //
T02D2501:18a-19: nyon mongs thams cad rnam par grol //
T02D2501:18a-20: stug po'i dbus na zla chen po //
T02D2501:18a-21: byang chub sems ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D2501:18a-22: bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni //
T02D2501:18a-23: byang chub bsgrubs pas 'thob pa ste //
T02D2501:18a-24: dam chos mchog ni grangs med pa'i //
T02D2501:18a-25: spyod pa spyod pa'i mchog yin te //
T02D2501:18a-26: sa dang sa min shin tu mkhyen //
T02D2501:18a-27: ye shes dag pa zag pa med //
T02D2501:18a-28: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2501:18a-29: rdo rje'i gzugs ni blta bar bya //
T02D2501:18a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku //
T02D2501:18a-31: snang ba med cing gnas med pa //
T02D2501:18a-32: ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste //
T02D2501:18a-33: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02D2501:18a-34: mi chod mi shigs mi tshig pa //
T02D2501:18a-35: phung po med pa chos kyi sku //
T02D2501:18a-36: rdo rje bdag nyid las byung ba //
T02D2501:18a-37: rdo rje'i sku ni bla med pa'o //
T02D2501:18a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa'o //
T02D2501:18a-39: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin
T02D2501:18a-40: tu bsgoms nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi sems
T02D2501:18a-41: dpa' chen po bdag go zhes nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D2501:18a-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a sa ma ya sa tv'a ham /
T02D2501:18a-44: de nas bdag dang mi gnyis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2501:18a-45: sku de la byang chub chen por mos par bya
T02D2501:18b-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2501:18b-2: sangs rgyas rjes dran de bzhin te //
T02D2501:18b-3: byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di'o //
T02D2501:18b-4: zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2501:18b-5: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i khu tshur
T02D2501:18b-6: gyi phyag rgyas bcings la lus dang ngag dang yid
T02D2501:18b-7: gcig tu mos par brtan par bya'o //
T02D2501:18b-8: de nas rdo rje dbyings chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2501:18b-9: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la de las
T02D2501:18b-10: gzhan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji ltar rigs
T02D2501:18b-11: par rdo rje sems ma gnyis pa la sogs pa
T02D2501:18b-12: bcings la dam tshig gi sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i sems
T02D2501:18b-13: dpar snying po 'dis bdag bsgom mo //
T02D2501:18b-15: zhes bya ba ni snying po'o //
T02D2501:18b-16: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag la /
T02D2501:18b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi sems dpar snying po 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2501:18b-18: aom sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02D2501:18b-19: zhes bya ba 'di ni snying po'o //
T02D2501:18b-20: de la rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:18b-21: sngar gsungs pa'i rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo
T02D2501:18b-22: gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rtse mo myu gu lta
T02D2501:18b-23: bur bya'o // de bskyed pa'i snying po ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:18b-27: sa ma ya stvam zhes smras nas /
T02D2501:18b-28: phyag rgya'i rigs ni kun la yang //
T02D2501:18b-29: de nyid bskul bas bdag chen rnams //
T02D2501:18b-30: nyid kyis bsdams nas brtan par 'gyur //
T02D2501:18b-31: de nas badzra h'um zhes brjod la gzungs kyi dkyil
T02D2501:18b-32: 'khor du gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2501:18b-33: mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D2501:18b-34: dbang phyug ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas bcings la snying
T02D2501:18b-37: spyi bor byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2501:18b-38: de la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:18b-40: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba //
T02D2501:18b-41: gsang ba chen mor rab tu grags //
T02D2501:18b-42: phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus te //
T02D2501:18b-43: de dag bcing ba bshad par bya'o //
T02D2501:18b-44: mthe bo gnyis ni skyil mo krung //
T02D2501:18b-45: 'dzub mo gnyis ni rtse mo bkug /
T02D2501:19a-0: @19a * // gung mo rtse mo bsnyoms [*ba snyoms?] pa ste //
T02D2501:19a-1: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D2501:19a-3: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um /
T02D2501:19a-4: badzri p'a ni aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02D2501:19a-6: de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing /
T02D2501:19a-7: 'og nas 'byung ba'i mchod pa'i cho gas bsngags pa'i
T02D2501:19a-8: yon tan gyi tshogs bzang por mos par byas la
T02D2501:19a-11: rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rang gi spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02D2501:19a-12: de'i snying po brjod la bdag rang dbang bskur bar mos pa bya'o //
T02D2501:19a-14: rdo rje rin chen dpral ba ru //
T02D2501:19a-15: rab tu gnas par bsams nas ni //
T02D2501:19a-16: rdo rje rin chen zhes byas nas //
T02D2501:19a-17: rgyal ba rnams kyis dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02D2501:19a-19: rdo rje bcings pa las mthe bo gnyis rtse mo
