T02D2501:19a-20: can tu byas nas de'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis
T02D2501:19a-21: phan tshun ngos sprad de rin po che'i rtse mo
T02D2501:19a-23: rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ste //
T02D2501:19a-27: de nas rang gi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2501:19a-28: pa chos kyi phyag rgya rab tu bsgrub par bsams
T02D2501:19a-29: la / de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya bsam mo //
T02D2501:19a-30: de la chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:19a-32: las kyi phyag rgya rdzogs par byed pa yang snying
T02D2501:19a-33: gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la 'og nas 'byung
T02D2501:19a-34: ba'i mtshan nyid byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2501:19a-35: te / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yang rung ba'i
T02D2501:19a-36: skur bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur pa de shin
T02D2501:19a-37: tu yun ring du mngon par zhen par bsam mo
T02D2501:19a-39: ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa las //
T02D2501:19a-40: rgyal ba kun gyi rnam pa yi //
T02D2501:19a-41: phyag rgya mnyam gzhag bcings nas ni //
T02D2501:19a-42: rang gi sngags sam rig bzlas na //
T02D2501:19a-43: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:19a-44: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T02D2501:19a-46: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing /
T02D2501:19a-47: rdo rje l'a s+ya la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2501:19a-49: gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhis //
T02D2501:19b-0: mchod @19b pa gsang ba brjod cing bya //
T02D2501:19b-1: yang na bdag dbul la sogs pa'i //
T02D2501:19b-2: mchod pa rnams ni legs par bya //
T02D2501:19b-4: gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa yang phyi rol
T02D2501:19b-5: gyi mchod pa'i cho ga las 'og nas 'chad do
T02D2501:19b-6: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor bshad zin to //
T02D2501:19b-7: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig
T02D2501:19b-8: gi sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa bshad par bya'o
T02D2501:19b-9: // de la rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02D2501:19b-10: snyems tshul bcas par rdo rje gsor //
T02D2501:19b-11: rdo rje snyems pa'i tshul byed cing //
T02D2501:19b-12: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yis //
T02D2501:19b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2501:19b-15: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2501:19b-16: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yis //
T02D2501:19b-17: ji ltar bris pa'i tshul bzhin du //
T02D2501:19b-18: mtshan ma'ang phyag rgya dang ldan pa //
T02D2501:19b-19: sems dpa' chen po nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2501:19b-21: de la dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pa rdo
T02D2501:19b-22: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i
T02D2501:19b-23: dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor mngon
T02D2501:19b-24: du bya bar 'dod pas sngar bshad pa'i rim pa
T02D2501:19b-25: nyid kyis rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2501:19b-26: rgya bcings la / de'i snying po brjod de sems
T02D2501:19b-27: dpa' rnams kyis ye shes dbab pa bdag la bya'o
T02D2501:19b-28: rgya bcings la / // de la ye shes dbab pa'i rim pa ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:19b-29: dran pa dang srog bsdams pa'i sgo nas /
T02D2501:19b-30: yid rang gi lus la dmigs par bya ste /
T02D2501:19b-31: cung zad cig gnas nas gang zag dang chos ngo
T02D2501:19b-32: bo nyid med par mos pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T02D2501:19b-34: de yang zhi gnas kyi mthus spangs te /
T02D2501:19b-35: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa'i sems shin tu brtan par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2501:19b-37: rang gi dbang po bshigs [*bshegs?] [*ba shigs?] nas su //
T02D2501:19b-38: rdo rje bcings pas 'dzin pas gzung //
T02D2501:19b-40: de nas skye bo mtha' dag gi sdug bsngal dang /
T02D2501:19b-41: yid mi bde ba sel ba yum snying rje chen po dran pa'i lam sngon du byas te /
T02D2501:20a-1: chos nyid kyi ngo bo de zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa rab tu 'od 'phro bas //
T02D2501:20a-2: phyogs bcur khyab par byas te /
T02D2501:20a-3: rab tu gsal bar bsam mo //
T02D2501:20a-4: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ye
T02D2501:20a-5: shes kyi sems dpa' gang 'dod pa de dang mthun
T02D2501:20a-6: par bdag dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po de'i
T02D2501:20a-7: snying po rdo rje tshig gis brjod dam yang na
T02D2501:20a-9: zhes bya ba phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa spyi'i snying po brjod cing /
T02D2501:20a-10: rang gis rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi zla ba de
T02D2501:20a-11: nyid 'od zer 'phro ba dang 'du ba'i sbyor bas
T02D2501:20a-12: zla ba de nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i rang
T02D2501:20a-13: gi lha'i dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dang /
T02D2501:20a-15: padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D2501:20a-16: nyid rang gi rigs las gsungs pa'i kha dog dang
T02D2501:20a-17: 'od gsal ba 'og nas 'byung ba soms shig /
T02D2501:20a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi lha'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D2501:20a-21: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo yang /
T02D2501:20a-22: rdo rje dang lcags kyu la sogs pa ste /
T02D2501:20a-23: de dag gi kha dog dang gzugs kyang rigs kyi
T02D2501:20a-24: rim pa las mchod pa bshad pa'i skabs su lha
T02D2501:20a-25: bsam pa 'og nas 'chad pa las blta'o //
T02D2501:20a-26: de nas ji ltar bsams pa'i rdo rje la sogs
T02D2501:20a-27: pa gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje
T02D2501:20a-28: bdag go // dam tshig gi padma bdag go //
T02D2501:20a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D2501:20a-31: sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //
T02D2501:20a-32: brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar brjod //
T02D2501:20a-33: mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2501:20a-34: nges pa las ni rdo rjer gyur //
T02D2501:20a-35: sems dpa' byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2501:20a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:20a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2501:20a-38: de la sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:20a-39: thams cad bdag nyid sems dpa' ste //
T02D2501:20a-40: bdag kyang bdag la yang dag gnas //
T02D2501:20a-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2501:20a-42: de nas yid kyis dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
T02D2501:20a-43: bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs
T02D2501:20b-0: @20b de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
T02D2501:20b-1: rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2501:20b-2: kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings su
T02D2501:20b-3: zhugs par snga ma bzhin du dran par bya ste
T02D2501:20b-4: / bdag gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs
T02D2501:20b-5: bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur pa 'di ni de
T02D2501:20b-6: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
T02D2501:20b-7: thugs rdo rje'i rdul phra rab las gyur ba'o snyam
T02D2501:20b-8: du yang de'i nga rgyal yid la bya'o //
T02D2501:20b-10: aom ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham /
T02D2501:20b-11: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di rdo rje tshig gis brjod la /
T02D2501:20b-12: ji ltar bsams pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de
T02D2501:20b-13: nyid rdo rje'i me lce mang po 'phro zhing 'du
T02D2501:20b-14: ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lha'i gzugs su gyur par
T02D2501:20b-15: shin tu mngon par brtag go //
T02D2501:20b-17: phyag rgya chen po'i dam tshig gi //
T02D2501:20b-18: sems dpa'i rjes su dran par byas te /
T02D2501:20b-21: aom ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham /
T02D2501:20b-23: de bas na rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2501:20b-24: rgya las gyur pa'i rang gi lha'i gzugs de ltar
T02D2501:20b-26: mtshan las sems dpa' chen po ste //
T02D2501:20b-27: de las tshul 'di thams cad do //
T02D2501:20b-28: zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi tshig 'di yang legs par bshad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:20b-29: de ltar mnyes par bya ba'i dam tshig gi sems
T02D2501:20b-30: dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D2501:20b-31: gang yang rung ba'i rang bzhin mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2501:20b-32: las bstan pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i kha dog dang
T02D2501:20b-34: bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur par rnam par brtags la //
T02D2501:20b-36: zhes brjod de gong du smos pa'i dam tshig gi
T02D2501:20b-37: phyag rgya rdo rje sems ma zhes bya ba bcings
T02D2501:20b-38: nas / rang gi rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab rten bsams te /
T02D2501:20b-40: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D2501:20b-42: sa ma ya stvam zhes smras nas //
T02D2501:20b-43: rgyab tu zla ba gnas par gyur //
T02D2501:20b-44: sa ma ya stvam zhes smra zhing //
T02D2501:20b-45: de la sems dpar bdag nyid bsgrub //
T02D2501:20b-47: 'dir yang tshigs bcad 'di phyag rgya chen po bsgrub
T02D2501:20b-48: pa'i ye shes kyi sems dpa' gzhug pa'i 'og tu
T02D2501:21a-1: 'on kyang dam tshig gi sems dpa'i nga rgyal byas
T02D2501:21a-2: pa'i 'og tu 'di sbyar bar slob dpon dag 'chad
T02D2501:21a-5: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dam tshig gi sems dpa' nyid la bya bar rigs kyi /
T02D2501:21a-6: ye shes kyi sems dpa' la ni ma yin no //
T02D2501:21a-7: de nas aom su ra te stvam /
T02D2501:21a-8: zhes brjod la rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2501:21a-9: rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag nyid snying po 'dis bsgom mo //
T02D2501:21a-14: phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig
T02D2501:21a-15: gi sems dpar bdag nyid snying po 'dis bsgom mo
T02D2501:21a-18: mnyes par bya ba'i sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam
T02D2501:21a-19: tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings
T02D2501:21a-20: pa yang mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa 'og nas
T02D2501:21a-22: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam
T02D2501:21a-23: tshig sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms nas snying po 'dis
T02D2501:21a-26: aom sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02D2501:21a-29: rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag bsgoms la 'dis byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2501:21a-31: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02D2501:21a-32: bdag rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ba 'di
T02D2501:21a-33: yang dngos grub kyi rgyu'i gtso bo yin par rig
T02D2501:21a-34: par bya ste / gang gi phyir rang gi lha'i
T02D2501:21a-35: dam tshig sems dpar bdag nyid legs par bsgoms pas
T02D2501:21a-36: yongs su dag par gyur pa'i sngags pas bgegs kyi
T02D2501:21a-37: tshogs shin tu rgyang ring du spangs te /
T02D2501:21a-38: bya ba'i las thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing legs par byed pa ni //
T02D2501:21a-39: phyi rol gyi gtsang sbra dang dka' thub dang sdom pa dang /
T02D2501:21a-40: dka' ba spyod pa la rab tu 'bad pa med
T02D2501:21a-41: par yang ring por mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2501:21a-43: de kho na nyid bsdus pa theg pa chen po'i gzhung las /
T02D2501:21a-44: gtsang sbra sdom pa 'dir mi dgos //
T02D2501:21a-45: dka' thub dka' spyad mi dgos te //
T02D2501:21a-46: sangs rgyas thams cad sems dpa' che //
T02D2501:21b-2: phyi rol gyi gtsang sbra la sogs pa bsdam par bya ba la 'bad pa ni /
T02D2501:21b-3: yid 'byung bar byed pas mnyam par gzhag pa dang 'gal te /
T02D2501:21b-4: de bas na yun ring zhig na dka' bas grub pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:21b-6: / de lta bas na kha na ma tho ba
T02D2501:21b-7: dang bcas pa ma gtogs pa thabs gzhan gyis ci
T02D2501:21b-9: lha'i rnal 'byor 'di nyid rtag tu nan tan du bya'o //
T02D2501:21b-10: gzhung gzhan dag las kyang tshul 'di thams cad bstan te /
T02D2501:21b-12: dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas//
T02D2501:21b-13: lus can lus ni skam par 'gyur //
T02D2501:21b-14: sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g-yengs pa //
T02D2501:21b-16: de bas ci dgar spyod byed cing //
T02D2501:21b-17: kun zab kun byed de bzhin te //
T02D2501:21b-18: ji ltar 'dod pa bya byed cing //
T02D2501:21b-19: ci dga' bar ni spyod pa yis //
T02D2501:21b-20: langs sam yang na 'dug kyang rung //
T02D2501:21b-22: rab tu rgod dang smra yang rung //
T02D2501:21b-23: gang du de ltar der de bzhin //
T02D2501:21b-24: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa 'am //
T02D2501:21b-25: sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang //
T02D2501:21b-26: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor dag / tshig tsam gyis kyang rtag tu bya //
T02D2501:21b-29: rnam pa thams cad sgrub pa ni //
T02D2501:21b-30: bza' nyes spyad nyes thams cad kyang //
T02D2501:21b-31: yong ye skyon du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:21b-32: de nyid las 'di'i 'bras bu bstan pa /
T02D2501:21b-33: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang //
T02D2501:21b-35: dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos //
T02D2501:21b-36: las mchog rab tu mang po yang //
T02D2501:21b-37: don yod pa ni mchog tu 'grub //
T02D2501:21b-38: phyag rgya'i mchog kun sgrub pa po //
T02D2501:21b-39: sdug bsngal kun spong dpal dang ldan //
T02D2501:21b-42: de nas rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin de la byang chub chen por mos par bya'o //
T02D2501:21b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dbang du byas nas /
T02D2501:21b-45: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2501:21b-46: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas su //
T02D2501:22a-0: @22a * // byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di //
T02D2501:22a-3: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje
T02D2501:22a-4: khu tshur byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i las kyi
T02D2501:22a-6: de'i snying po brjod la lus dang ngag dang yid gcig tu mos pa brtan par bya'o //
T02D2501:22a-7: de ltar gong du smos pa'i rim pa bdag dam
T02D2501:22a-8: tshig gi sems dpa' chen po mnyes par bya ba'i
T02D2501:22a-9: lha'i rjes su mthun par rab tu bsgrub la /
T02D2501:22a-10: aom satva badzra ni aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02D2501:22a-11: zhes brjod cing gong du smos pa'i rdo rje sems
T02D2501:22a-12: ma'i phyag rgyas snying ga dang lkog ma dang smin
T02D2501:22a-13: mtshams dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2501:22a-15: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2501:22a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' brtan byas te //
T02D2501:22a-17: snying ga smin mtshams lkog ma dang //
T02D2501:22a-18: spyi bor bzhag ste byin gyis brlab //
T02D2501:22a-20: de nas bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur pa'i rang
T02D2501:22a-21: gi lha'i sku de nyid padma dang bcas pa'i zla
T02D2501:22a-22: ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsams nas /
T02D2501:22a-23: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa
T02D2501:22a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyag rgya rnams kyi de
T02D2501:22a-25: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che
T02D2501:22a-26: dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D2501:22a-28: rdo rje dbyings phyug la sogs pa'i //
T02D2501:22a-29: phyag rgyas spyi bo nas brtsams te //
T02D2501:22a-30: phreng bas de ni dbang bskur ro //
T02D2501:22a-32: de la gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa rdo
T02D2501:22a-33: rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas
T02D2501:22a-34: / rang gi klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag la /
T02D2501:22a-35: aom badzra dha tv'i shva ra h'um badzra ni aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2501:22a-37: der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dag / sh'akya thub pa'i gzugs snying po 'dis bsam mo //
T02D2501:22a-40: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D2501:22a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi skabs su
T02D2501:22a-43: de nas mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas dpral ba'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D2501:22a-44: aom badzra badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2501:22a-45: zhes rdo rje tshig gis brjod la //
T02D2501:22b-0: der mi 'khrugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa @22b bsgom mo //
T02D2501:22b-1: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma nyid las gung
T02D2501:22b-2: mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil
T02D2501:22b-4: mi 'khrugs pa'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2501:22b-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma nyid las gung
T02D2501:22b-6: mo gnyis nor bur byas pa'i mtshan nyid rin chen
T02D2501:22b-7: 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas rna ba g-yas pa'i
T02D2501:22b-9: aom ratna badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2501:22b-10: zhes brjod la bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba bsam mo //
T02D2501:22b-11: de nyid las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis padma lta bur byas te /
T02D2501:22b-12: aom padma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2501:22b-13: zhes brjod la ltag pa'i phyogs su bzhag ste /
T02D2501:22b-14: der bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa bsam mo //
T02D2501:22b-15: de nas gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung rnams kyi sor mo rnams brkyang la /
T02D2501:22b-16: rna ba g-yon pa'i gong du bzhag ste /
T02D2501:22b-17: aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2501:22b-18: zhes brjod la bcom ldan 'das don yod grub par bsam mo //
T02D2501:22b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa bzhi po de dag
T02D2501:22b-20: bzhugs par bya ba'i snying po yang so so'i mtshan
T02D2501:22b-21: gyi thog ma la aom bzhag pa nyid yin par
T02D2501:22b-22: shes par bya'o // dkyil 'khor chen po 'di las
T02D2501:22b-23: gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mnyes
T02D2501:22b-24: par byed pa rnams dbang bskur ba'i cho ga 'di
T02D2501:22b-25: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa rdo rje dbyings
T02D2501:22b-26: kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya lngas
T02D2501:22b-28: 'di ltar dpal mchog dang po dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02D2501:22b-29: dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid la sogs
T02D2501:22b-30: pa rnal 'byor gyi sngags kyi rgyud gzhan dag las
T02D2501:22b-31: kyang phyag rgya 'di dag nyid kyis ji ltar rigs
T02D2501:22b-32: par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2501:22b-33: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bya bar bshad do //
T02D2501:22b-34: gang yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa /
T02D2501:22b-35: rdo rje sems ma la sogs sa dam tshig gi
T02D2501:22b-36: phyag rgya lnga rnams kyis dbang skur bar byed pa
T02D2501:22b-37: de dag ni dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las gsungs
T02D2501:22b-38: pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang mi mthun la /
T02D2501:22b-39: rgyud 'di nyid kyi tshig dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
T02D2501:23a-0: rdo rje dbyings phyug la sogs @23a * //
T02D2501:23a-2: phyag rgya'i phreng bas de dbang bskur //
T02D2501:23a-4: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i ni rdo rje
T02D2501:23a-5: dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i sgras btags
T02D2501:23a-7: rgyud 'dir gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa /
T02D2501:23a-8: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2501:23a-9: phyag rgya chen po nyid las de skad ces bshad
T02D2501:23a-10: pa'i phyir ro // gzhan yang dbang bskur ba'i las ni rin po che'i rigs nyid mdzad de /
T02D2501:23a-11: de gtso bor byas nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:23a-12: de bas na gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid las gsungs
T02D2501:23a-13: pa'i sku'i phyag rgya lag pas byas pa rnams kyis
T02D2501:23a-14: spyi bor dbang bskur bar rigs so //
T02D2501:23a-15: de'i 'og tu rang gi lha'i skur bdag nyid ji
T02D2501:23a-16: ltar bsams pa rnam pa thams cad du zil gyis
T02D2501:23a-17: mi non pa'i nga rgyal rim pa 'di ltar bsgom
T02D2501:23a-18: par bya'o // dang por re zhig rang gi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2501:23a-19: der 'og nas 'byung ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga las
T02D2501:23a-20: bstan pa rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya bsams
T02D2501:23a-21: nas snying gar yang sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshan nyid
T02D2501:23a-23: las kyi phyag rgya bcings la yid la 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D2501:23a-24: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi sems dpar bdag bsgyur te /
T02D2501:23a-25: des bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs
T02D2501:23a-26: shing chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par
T02D2501:23a-27: dag par mos par 'khor ba na gnas kyang rdo
T02D2501:23a-28: rje chos kyi padma bzhin du bag chags kyi nyes
T02D2501:23a-30: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad
T02D2501:23a-31: kyi don dam par mi gos so snyam du dpa'
T02D2501:23a-32: bo'i rang bzhin gyi nga rgyal mngon du bya ste
T02D2501:23a-36: rdo rje chos kyi ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2501:23a-37: sems dpa' byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2501:23a-38: gsang sngags rig sngags bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D2501:23a-41: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod de //
T02D2501:23a-42: rdo rje l'a s+ya la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi rnams kyis mngon par mchod do //
T02D2501:23a-44: gsang ba'i mchod pa rjod byed cing //
T02D2501:23b-0: gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam @23b bzhis mchod //
T02D2501:23b-1: bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pas //
T02D2501:23b-2: mchod pa rnam bzhi rab tu bya //
T02D2501:23b-4: gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa ni gsang ba'i
T02D2501:23b-5: mchod pa'i cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba la blta'o
T02D2501:23b-6: // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2501:23b-7: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa gtso bo
T02D2501:23b-8: rnams kyi dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bshad zin
T02D2501:23b-9: to // de nas de ltar bdag dam tshig sems
T02D2501:23b-10: dpa'i rnal 'byor du byas te de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2501:23b-11: to // rnams dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D2501:23b-12: sogs pa gtso bo rnams la phyi rol gyi mchod
T02D2501:23b-13: pas mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D2501:23b-14: mchod pa'i sbyor ba yang rgyud nyid las dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs par bkod pa'am //
T02D2501:23b-15: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du bkod pas rgyas pa dang bsdus pa gnyis su gsungs te /
T02D2501:23b-16: ras dang thang bu dang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyogs su byas pa'am //
T02D2501:23b-18: bsams pa la mnyes par bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:23b-19: pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu ji ltar
T02D2501:23b-20: rigs par bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2501:23b-22: khyad par du na theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa bsdus par gyur pa'i sku rdo rje /
T02D2501:23b-23: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams
T02D2501:23b-24: cad bsdus par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D2501:23b-25: kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2501:23b-26: phyag rgya gcig gis dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis mchod
T02D2501:23b-27: do // de ltar yang phyi ma'i yang phyi ma rgyud kyi cho ga las ni mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2501:23b-28: sems dpa' rnams ras la bris pa la ji ltar
T02D2501:23b-29: 'byor pa'i mchod pa sngon du byas nas las mang
T02D2501:23b-30: po bya ba'i mtshan nyid rnams snang ste /
T02D2501:23b-32: de ltang ras dang thang bu dang /
T02D2501:23b-36: bsams pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:23b-37: mchod pa'i dgos pa yang 'di nyid las //
T02D2501:23b-38: dkon mchog gsum la mchod na ni //
T02D2501:23b-40: sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pas ni //
T02D2501:23b-41: bsod nams med pa'ang nges par 'grub //
T02D2501:24a-0: @24a * // mchod pa rnam bzhi byas pa ni //
T02D2501:24a-1: bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:24a-2: sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pas ni //
T02D2501:24a-3: bsod nams med pa'ang nges par 'grub //
T02D2501:24a-5: de la dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis mchod pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02D2501:24a-6: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su 'os pa /
T02D2501:24a-7: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2501:24a-8: gang gi phyir gsang sngags gang du bshad pa'i gnas
T02D2501:24a-9: der mos par byas na 'grub bo zhes spyi'i rgyud
T02D2501:24a-10: las 'byung ba'i tshig slob dpon dag 'chad pa'i phyir
T02D2501:24a-12: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a zhes brjod la /
T02D2501:24a-13: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
T02D2501:24a-14: du mos pas gnas de rnam par dag par mos
T02D2501:24a-15: pa byas te de rnam par dag pa yang ngo
T02D2501:24a-16: bo nyid yod pa dang bral bar mos pa'o //
T02D2501:24a-17: de nas de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma
T02D2501:24a-18: lus pa kun stong par nus pa rlung gi dkyil
T02D2501:24a-19: 'khor chen por gzhi byas par bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i
T02D2501:24a-20: dbus nas byung ba'i ri rab gzi ma dangs bzang
T02D2501:24a-21: po dang ldan pa'i gser gyi sa gzhi rdo rje
T02D2501:24a-23: gru bzhi lham pa rgya chen po khor khor yug mos pa'i tshad kyis mtha' klas pa la /
T02D2501:24a-24: phyogs bzhir sgo bzhi sgo khang dang rta babs dang /
T02D2501:24a-27: rin po che du mas spras pas shin tu mdzes par gyur pa /
T02D2501:24a-28: bde bar gshegs pa mang po ma lus pa'i phun
T02D2501:24a-29: sum tshogs pa'i gzhi rab tu nyams dga' ba'i lha'i
T02D2501:24a-30: gnas bzang po rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2501:24a-31: de'i dbus su yang rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil
T02D2501:24a-32: 'khor 'khor lo lta bu cha brgyad du legs par
T02D2501:24a-33: phye ba / de'i mtha' ka ba chen po brgyad kyis brten pa /
T02D2501:24a-34: rin po che sna tshogs rab tu 'od gsal ba'i
T02D2501:24a-35: khang pa brtsegs pa mthon po 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2501:24a-36: ba'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po ngo mtshar rnam
T02D2501:24a-37: pa sna tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa cig bsams la
T02D2501:24a-38: ji ltar bsams pa'i 'khor lo'i nang du yang seng
T02D2501:24a-39: ge'i gdan la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D2501:24a-40: 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas ting nge 'dzin du
T02D2501:24a-41: bsam par bya ba'i lha rnams kyi gnas dang ldan
T02D2501:24b-1: gdan la sogs pa gnas rnam par dgod pa 'di
T02D2501:24b-2: dag thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyu ni dam tshig sems
T02D2501:24b-3: dpa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sems nyid do //
T02D2501:24b-4: yang na rang gi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams te /
T02D2501:24b-5: las sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya brjod pa'o //
T02D2501:24b-6: de la chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:24b-9: da ni 'dir ci ltar rigs par mchod par bya
T02D2501:24b-10: ba'i lha'i sku bsam pa ni de dag shin tu
T02D2501:24b-11: byin gyis rlob pa dang rjes su mthun par bshad
T02D2501:24b-12: par bya'o // de yang bsam par bya ba'i lha
T02D2501:24b-13: rnams so so'i snying po rdo rje'i tshig gis brjod
T02D2501:24b-14: cing de'i don rtogs par bya bar rig par bya'o
T02D2501:24b-16: sngags kyi rgyud phyi ma las bzlas brjod kyi skabs kyi dbang du byas te /
T02D2501:24b-17: snying po'i don gyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi skur
T02D2501:24b-18: tshig tsam gyis kyang mdun du bsgom par bya'o zhes
T02D2501:24b-19: gsungs so // bzlas brjod la sogs pa'i tshe bsgom
T02D2501:24b-20: pa'i gtso bo yin par bstan te de'i dgongs pa
T02D2501:24b-21: gsungs so // ni 'di'o // bsgoms pa'i dbang gis
T02D2501:24b-22: ni lha spyan ma drangs par yang byin gyis rlob
T02D2501:24b-24: de la ji ltar brtags pa'i khang pa'i nang gi
T02D2501:24b-25: 'khor lo dbu ma'i gdan gyi dbus su seng ge'i
T02D2501:24b-26: gdan chen po lha'i phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis
T02D2501:24b-27: mi khyab pa bla na med pa'i gzhir gyur pa
T02D2501:24b-28: la / bcom ldan 'das brtag pa 'og ma nas
T02D2501:24b-29: 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid byang chub mchog gi las kyi
T02D2501:24b-31: ji skad du gsungs pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa bla
T02D2501:24b-32: na med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag par
T02D2501:24b-33: ston pa'i bdag nyid dam pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2501:24b-34: mtha' yas pa zil gyis mi non cing thogs pa
T02D2501:24b-35: med pa rnam par 'phros pa 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2501:24b-36: ma lus pa yongs su srung ba gcig pu tshad
T02D2501:24b-37: mar mdzad pa mtshan ma dang spyod lam dang /
T02D2501:24b-38: sku mang po rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa
T02D2501:24b-39: mos pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis sems can re
T02D2501:24b-40: re'i rgyud la yang sku du ma so sor snang
T02D2501:24b-41: bar 'gyur ba nye bar ston pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D2501:24b-42: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs sam /
T02D2501:24b-43: sh'akya thub pa dge slong gi gzugs lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02D2501:24b-44: thub pa'i skye bor bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te bzhugs pa /
T02D2501:25a-1: gshegs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams mngon du phyogs
T02D2501:25a-2: pa zhal kun du gzigs pa rnam par bsam mo
T02D2501:25a-5: de nas de'i shar dang lho dang nub dang byang
T02D2501:25a-6: gi phyogs su go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang
T02D2501:25a-7: rin po che dang chos dang las kyi rdo rje
T02D2501:25a-8: ma'i phyag rgya bzhi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D2501:25a-9: pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02D2501:25a-12: rdo rje kun du rtse mo'i mtshan nyid rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2501:25a-18: zhes bya ba go rims bzhin no //
T02D2501:25a-19: de nas mdun logs nas brtsams te shar la sogs
T02D2501:25a-20: pa'i phyogs bzhir brtags pa'i gnas bzhir bde bar gshegs
T02D2501:25a-24: don yod par grub pa zhes bya ba dge slong
T02D2501:25a-25: gi gzugs 'dra ba bzhi rnams gong du smos pa
T02D2501:25a-26: lta bu'i yon tan dang zhal dang cha lugs dang
T02D2501:25a-28: gzhung gzhan las grags pa glang po che dang rta dang rma bya dang /
T02D2501:25a-29: nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs pa go rims
T02D2501:25a-30: bzhin du g-yas nas bskor ba'i tshul du las kyi
T02D2501:25a-31: phyag rgya rnam par bkod pas so so'i las kyi
T02D2501:25a-32: khyad par dang dgongs pa nye bar ston pa rnams
T02D2501:25a-34: de nas thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan
T02D2501:25a-35: nyid ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i mchod pa bshad pa'i
T02D2501:25a-37: de dag gi snying po yang rang gi ming nyid
T02D2501:25a-38: la aom zhes bya ba yang thog mar bzhag pa
T02D2501:25a-40: yang na rdo rje dbyings kyi snying po sngar gsungs pa de dag gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2501:25a-41: de nas mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa de dag nyid kyi mdun dang /
T02D2501:25a-42: g-yas dang g-yon dang rgyab kyi phyogs khang pa de
T02D2501:25a-43: nyid kyi nang du re re zhing yang rdo rje
T02D2501:25a-44: sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po bzhi'i
T02D2501:25a-45: snying po'i don gyis rab tu brtag go //
T02D2501:25a-46: de la mi 'khrugs pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2501:25a-49: rdo rje mgu ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2501:25a-50: so so'i las kyi phyag rgya rnam par bkod pa rdo rje dang /
T02D2501:25a-53: mgu bar ston pa rnams phyag na thogs par bya'o //
T02D2501:25b-0: @25b de dag gi snying po yang go rims bzhin du //
T02D2501:25b-3: aom badzra r'a ga / aom badzra s'a dhu /
T02D2501:25b-4: zhes bya ba'i sngags rnams so //
T02D2501:25b-5: rin chen 'byung ba'i yang rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02D2501:25b-6: nyi ma dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2501:25b-7: bzhad pa zhes bya ba rnams te /
T02D2501:25b-8: de dag kyang so so'i las kyi phyag rgya ston
T02D2501:25b-9: pa'i tshul du nor bu rin po che chen po
T02D2501:25b-11: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2501:25b-12: so'i phreng ba phyag na thogs pa rnams bsam mo //
T02D2501:25b-13: de dag gi snying po yang go rims bzhin du /
T02D2501:25b-18: thub pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i ni /
T02D2501:25b-21: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D2501:25b-22: dgongs pa smra ba zhes bya ba rnams te /
T02D2501:25b-23: so so'i las kyi phyag rgya mngon par ston pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i padma dang /
T02D2501:25b-26: lce rnams phyag na thogs par bsam mo //
T02D2501:25b-27: de dag gi snying po yang /
T02D2501:25b-32: bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pa'i ni /
T02D2501:25b-37: las kyi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba nyid kyis rdo rje kha bzhi pa dang /
T02D2501:25b-40: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa rnams brtag par bya'o //
T02D2501:25b-41: de rnams kyi snying po yang go rims bzhin du /
T02D2501:25b-46: sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang zla
T02D2501:25b-47: ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing des rgyab
T02D2501:25b-48: brten byas pa / lha'i dbang po'i cha lugs can
T02D2501:25b-49: dbu la sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa

T02D2501:35a-28: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2501:35a-29: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2501:35a-30: rin po che 'byung ba'i rigs 'khor los sgyur ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02D2501:35a-31: zab cing rgya che ba'i mdo sde bshad pa'i mthu bdag la bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02D2501:35a-32: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo dpal rdo rje chos dang /
T02D2501:35a-33: sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i mthu grub par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2501:35a-34: don yod par grub pa'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur
T02D2501:35a-35: ba gtso bo las sna tshogs pa la 'og nas
T02D2501:35a-36: 'byung ba'i cho gas rigs bzhi la yan lag thams
T02D2501:35b-0: cad kyis phyag bya ba'i mchod @35b pa sngar bya
T02D2501:35b-1: zhing dgos pa dang bcas pa'i bdag gi lus phul
T02D2501:35b-2: te byin gyis brlab par gsol ba sngon pa'i snying
T02D2501:35b-3: po 'di bzhis gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D2501:35b-4: ji skad du phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i rgyud las bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'i skabs su /
T02D2501:35b-5: gnas ji lta bur gnas pas zla ba bzhir dus
T02D2501:35b-6: bzhir bdug spos la sogs pas ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2501:35b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen
T02D2501:35b-9: po mngon par rtogs pa las gsungs pa'i mtshan brgya
T02D2501:35b-10: rtsa brgyad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
T02D2501:35b-12: phyag rgya bzhi'i sbyor bas phyag bya zhing sngags rnam
T02D2501:35b-13: pa bzhi po 'dis bdag dbul ba'i mchod pa bya'o
T02D2501:35b-14: zhes gsungs so // 'dir phyag rgya bzhi'i sbyor bas
T02D2501:35b-15: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya
T02D2501:35b-16: gnas bzhir gzhag par bstan pa'o //
T02D2501:35b-17: de la 'di ni phyag rgya rnam bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2501:35b-18: 'di ltar rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste /
T02D2501:35b-19: lus thams cad kyis sngags 'di brjod cing phyag bya'o //
T02D2501:35b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pasth'a na ya a'atma n'am nity'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2501:35b-21: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2501:35b-22: de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste /
T02D2501:35b-23: rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar la sngags 'di brjod cing dpral bas phyag bya'o //
T02D2501:35b-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhishe ka ya a'atma n'am nir+y'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2501:35b-25: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2501:35b-26: de nas de bzhin du la nangs la rdo rje'i
T02D2501:35b-27: thal mo spyi bor bcings te sngags 'di brjod cing
T02D2501:35b-28: khas phyag bya'o // aom sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D2501:35b-29: p'u dza pra ba rta n'a ya a'atma n'am niry'a
T02D2501:35b-30: khas phyag bya'o // ta y'a mi / sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bharm'a pra barta ya m'am /
T02D2501:35b-31: de nas de bzhin du 'dug la rdo rje'i thal
T02D2501:35b-32: mo spyi bo nas phab ste snying gar sbyar la
T02D2501:35b-33: sngags 'di brjod cing spyi bos phyag bya'o //
T02D2501:35b-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ne a'atma n'a ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2501:35b-35: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am /
T02D2501:35b-36: nus na las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i mchod
T02D2501:35b-37: pa bcu drug gi lha mo'i rig sngags rnams kyis
T02D2501:35b-38: kyang / rdo rje gar gyis byor bas mgon po rnams la yang mchod pa chen po bya'o //
T02D2501:35b-39: rig sngags de rnams kyang las kyi dkyil 'khor du blta'o //
T02D2501:35b-40: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing /
T02D2501:36a-0: byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba la sogs pa'i @36a * //
T02D2501:36a-2: rdo rje l'a s+ye la sogs pa sgrub pa'i mchod pa bzhi rnams kyis mchod do //
T02D2501:36a-4: mchod pa gsang ba rab 'don cing /
T02D2501:36a-5: gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi'am /
T02D2501:36a-6: bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yis //
T02D2501:36a-7: mchod pa byas nas rab tu 'grub //
T02D2501:36a-9: de ltar byas na spyan ji ltar drangs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dang /
T02D2501:36a-10: bdag rnal 'byor pa yul gcig la spyod par gzigs
T02D2501:36a-11: nas sems cha mthun pas rjes su chags nas dngos
T02D2501:36a-12: grub myur du stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:36a-14: ji ltar yul bzhi ldan gyur nas //
T02D2501:36a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:36a-16: de nyid bskul bas myur ba ru //
T02D2501:36a-17: rjes su chags nas rab tu 'grub //
T02D2501:36a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni nye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig ste /
T02D2501:36a-20: mnyes par bya ba'i sems dpa' thams cad kyang de
T02D2501:36a-21: las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2501:36a-22: kyi mtshan nyid du gzung ngo //
T02D2501:36a-23: de la rdo rje l'a s+ye'i ni byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D2501:36a-24: rdo rje phreng ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnam
T02D2501:36a-25: par grol ba'i yon tan me tog gi phreng ba'o
T02D2501:36a-26: // rdo rje'i glu ni dam pa'i chos 'chad pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2501:36a-27: rdo rje'i gar ni sems can gyi don bya ba dang /
T02D2501:36a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par byed pa'i
T02D2501:36a-29: ngo bo nyid de yul bzhi po 'di dag ni
T02D2501:36a-30: rdo rje l'a s+ye la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid la
T02D2501:36a-31: bya'i / skabs 'dir ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs dang
T02D2501:36a-32: sgra la sogs pa chags par 'gyur ba'i yul la
T02D2501:36a-33: bya'i / ni mi bya'o // zhes rnal 'byor la mkhas pa rnams 'chad do //
T02D2501:36a-35: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yul de rnams ni
T02D2501:36a-36: rang gi lha mnyes par byed pa'i cho gar bstan
T02D2501:36a-37: to snyam nas rab tu bstan na sems g-yeng bar
T02D2501:36a-38: 'gyur bas de dag la brten par dga' ba rnams
T02D2501:36a-39: / lha'i gnas skabs khyad par can la dmigs pa'i
T02D2501:36a-40: mtshan nyid rnal 'byor gyi skabs su ga la 'gyur
T02D2501:36a-43: ji ltar 'dod dang ci dgar spyod //
T02D2501:36a-44: thams cad za zhing thams cad byed //
T02D2501:36a-45: ces bya ba la sogs pa bag yangs kyi tshig
T02D2501:36a-46: tu gsungs pa de dag ni gang dka' ba spyod
T02D2501:36b-0: pa la @36b dga' ba'i bzlas brjod byed pa la
T02D2501:36b-1: dgongs te dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang /
T02D2501:36b-2: lan tshva med pa'i zas za ba dang /
T02D2501:36b-3: sgog pa dang btsong dang la phug la sogs pa
T02D2501:36b-4: yang spang bar gsungs pa de dag bcas pa'i kha
T02D2501:36b-6: gcig kho nar bgegs la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:36b-7: de dag 'dir spyad par gsungs pa ni thabs dang
T02D2501:36b-8: shes rab tu ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa sems ting
T02D2501:36b-9: nge 'dzin rtse gcig tu gyur pa rnams dang /
T02D2501:36b-10: de las sems gzhan pa brtul zhugs dang sdom pa'i
T02D2501:36b-11: sgra thos pa tsam gyis yid skrag par 'gyur pa
T02D2501:36b-12: rnams drang ba'i phyir rjes su gnang gi /
T02D2501:36b-13: de yang nges par byar mi rung ba nyid du gsungs pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2501:36b-15: de rnams kyang rnal 'byor gyi spyi'i tshul kha cig las mi gnang bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:36b-16: dgongs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang //
T02D2501:36b-17: rdo rje rtse mo las gsungs pa'i //
T02D2501:36b-18: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i skabs su gsal ba nyid du bstan te /
T02D2501:36b-20: byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni //
T02D2501:36b-21: lha gzhan la ni mi mos par //
T02D2501:36b-22: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang //
T02D2501:36b-23: de la gzhol zhing 'bab pa yis //
T02D2501:36b-24: gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang //
T02D2501:36b-25: brdzun dang chang ni rnam par spang //
T02D2501:36b-26: khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni //
T02D2501:36b-27: rig sngags rgyal po rtag par bsgrub //
T02D2501:36b-28: gal te de ni rab byung na //
T02D2501:36b-29: sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya //
T02D2501:36b-30: so sor thar dang byang chub che //
T02D2501:36b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs nas /
T02D2501:36b-33: gtsang zhing gos kyang gtsang ba dang //
T02D2501:36b-34: gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2501:36b-35: rdo rje sdom pa dam pa yi //
T02D2501:36b-36: bslab pa'i tshig gis yang dag blangs //
T02D2501:36b-37: dkon mchog bzhi yi sbyor ba dang //
T02D2501:36b-38: phyag rgya de la gzhol bar bya //
T02D2501:36b-40: slob dpon yang ni phyi ma'o //
T02D2501:36b-41: nyin re zhing ni ci nus par //
T02D2501:36b-42: khrus bzhi rab tu sbyar bar bya //
T02D2501:36b-43: rnal 'byor ji ltar 'khru ba dag / go rims bzhin du bshad par bya //
T02D2501:36b-44: sdom pa gsum la gnas pa ni //
T02D2501:36b-45: dang po'i khrus su bshad pa yin //
T02D2501:37a-2: bshags dang gsol la sogs pa'o //
T02D2501:37a-3: phyag rgya dgrol ba gsum pa'o //
T02D2501:37a-4: bzhi pa chu ste phyi ma'o //
T02D2501:37a-5: khrus kyi cho ga 'di rnams kyis //
T02D2501:37a-6: mkhas pa rnams ni de bzhin 'khru //
T02D2501:37a-7: sgrub pa po yi cho ga la //
T02D2501:37a-8: gos gsum dag kyang brje bar bya //
T02D2501:37a-9: dang po'i gos su bshad pa ni //
T02D2501:37a-10: sdom pa rnams la gnas pa dag / sgrub pa'i cho ga dag pa'o //
T02D2501:37a-11: gnyis pa khrel yod ngo tsha shes //
T02D2501:37a-12: gsum pa thub pa'i gos rnams te //
T02D2501:37a-13: gos gsum du ni yongs su bsgrags //
T02D2501:37a-14: thams cad bza' dang 'dod pa ni //
T02D2501:37a-15: kha na ma tho gang med pa'o //
T02D2501:37a-16: sha chang sgog pa la sogs pa //
T02D2501:37a-17: mi bza' ba rnams spang bar bya //
T02D2501:37a-18: dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang ba'i //
T02D2501:37a-19: bza' dang btung ba rnams kyang spang //
T02D2501:37a-20: gzhan la gnod dang ldan pa dag / sems kyis kyang ni mi bya'o //
T02D2501:37a-21: g-yem pa bdun gyi sbyor ba rnams //
T02D2501:37a-22: mi sdug bsgom pas spang bar bya //
T02D2501:37a-23: bsod nams byed la rtag tu brtson //
T02D2501:37a-24: theg pa chen po'i don sems pa //
T02D2501:37a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya che //
T02D2501:37a-26: shes rab pha rol phyin la mkhas //
T02D2501:37a-27: klog cing rnam par sems pa dang //
T02D2501:37a-28: yang dang yang du gsol ba 'debs //
T02D2501:37a-29: dgra dang zin dang tha mal pa //
T02D2501:37a-30: sems snyoms mi 'jigs rab tu sbyin //
T02D2501:37a-31: zhe sdang 'joms pa bsgom pa ni //
T02D2501:37a-32: byams shing dga' la des pa can //
T02D2501:37a-33: chos dang gang zag bdag med pa //
T02D2501:37a-35: mngon sum blo can brtan pa ni //
T02D2501:37a-36: 'dus byas kun gyis mi rmongs so ;
T02D2501:37a-37: / srog la bab par gyur na yang //
T02D2501:37a-38: byang chub sems ni mi gtong zhing //
T02D2501:37a-39: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2501:37a-40: nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02D2501:37a-41: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02D2501:37a-42: shes rab dril bu zhes brjod do //
T02D2501:37a-43: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
T02D2501:37a-44: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra //
T02D2501:37a-45: sbyor ba lhod par ma gyur pas //
T02D2501:37a-46: go cha rab tu brtan par bgos //
T02D2501:37a-47: pha rol phyin drug spyad pa yang //
T02D2501:37a-48: rim pa bzhin du slob par byed //
T02D2501:37a-49: sems can kun gyi don dang ldan //
T02D2501:37a-50: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul la ni //
T02D2501:37a-51: kha na ma tho rdul tsam la //
T02D2501:37a-52: srog la yang ni mi lta ba //
T02D2501:37b-0: rab tu @37b byung dang khyim pa yang //
T02D2501:37b-2: bu dang chung ma dag la yang //
T02D2501:37b-3: srid pa'i bcings pa dag las grol //
T02D2501:37b-4: brkam dang chags dang gdug pa med //
T02D2501:37b-5: rmongs pa dang ni le lo med //
T02D2501:37b-6: bag yod spyod cing brtson 'grus che //
T02D2501:37b-7: rnal 'byor sgrub pas bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:37b-8: lta ba kun las rnam par grol //
T02D2501:37b-9: yang dag nyid kyi lam ston pa //
T02D2501:37b-10: dgongs pa'i tshig la rab tu mkhas //
T02D2501:37b-11: don chen don ni rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2501:37b-12: tshul dang tshul min cho ga yang //
T02D2501:37b-13: de nyid rnal 'byor rab tu mkhas //
T02D2501:37b-14: sems can kun la rab tu byams //
T02D2501:37b-15: byang chub spyod pa'i don sems pa //
T02D2501:37b-17: de lta bu yi sgrub pa yis //
T02D2501:37b-18: grol ba dang ni dngos grub 'thob //
T02D2501:37b-19: dngos grub thams cad dgos pa med //
T02D2501:37b-20: phyogs dang zas dang gos rnams la //
T02D2501:37b-21: 'bags pa thams cad rnam par spang //
T02D2501:37b-22: lha rnams smad par mi bya zhing //
T02D2501:37b-23: rnam pa yang ni spang bar bya //
T02D2501:37b-24: nyi ma re re rab bsdams shing //
T02D2501:37b-25: srung ba'i cho ga byas pa la //
T02D2501:37b-26: bgegs ni med kyis ma 'jigs shig / sems ni rab tu gdul dka' 'dis //
T02D2501:37b-27: bgegs ni cung zad med snyam pas //
T02D2501:37b-28: sems ni dag pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2501:37b-29: rang gi sems ni bdud ces gsungs //
T02D2501:37b-30: rang gi sems nyid bgegs yin no //
T02D2501:37b-31: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02D2501:37b-32: rnam par rtog las bgegs kun 'byung //
T02D2501:37b-33: gdul dka' sems ni rab bzung nas //
T02D2501:37b-34: 'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya //
T02D2501:37b-35: sngon gyi rjes dran nas brtsams te //
T02D2501:37b-36: rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:37b-37: 'jig rten na ni gang zag bzhi //
T02D2501:37b-38: bskal pa brgyar ni brtson byas shing //
T02D2501:37b-39: cho ga bzhin du kun spyad kyang //
T02D2501:37b-41: byang chub sems ni ma bskyed dang //
T02D2501:37b-42: the tshom yod pa nyid dang ni //
T02D2501:37b-43: gang zhig bka' stsal mi byed dang //
T02D2501:37b-44: ma dad pas ni mi 'grub po //
T02D2501:37b-45: pha dang mar ni shes pa dang //
T02D2501:37b-47: gtsang zhing zhi ba dul ba dang //
T02D2501:37b-48: bsdams shing thar pa la sems pa //
T02D2501:37b-49: rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod dang //
T02D2501:38a-2: gzhan du sems can thams cad phyir //
T02D2501:38a-3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas pa //
T02D2501:38a-4: de bzhin kha zas tshod shes shing //
T02D2501:38a-5: mtshan mo mi nyal ba la dga' //
T02D2501:38a-6: 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs byung //
T02D2501:38a-7: rnam par rtog pa mi sems shing //
T02D2501:38a-8: sems ni rab tu dang gyur nas //
T02D2501:38a-9: mi g-yo bar ni nges par bya //
T02D2501:38a-10: legs bshad shin tu rnam phye ba'i //
T02D2501:38a-11: chos kyi don la mngon par dga' //
T02D2501:38a-12: sems can gnod la sogs pa'i rgyu //
T02D2501:38a-13: drag shul spyod pa'i las mi byed //
T02D2501:38a-14: sems can gdug pa la sogs pa'i //
T02D2501:38a-15: nyes pa dag kyang rab tu bzod //
T02D2501:38a-16: rig sngags mtshon dang de bzhin mtshon //
T02D2501:38a-17: lha yis bcings pa rnams dang ni //
T02D2501:38a-18: dman ma dag dang lha yi grib //
T02D2501:38a-19: lha yi mtshan ma la sogs kun //
T02D2501:38a-20: bza' ba dang ni sna tshogs pa //
T02D2501:38a-21: mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid byas pa rnams //
T02D2501:38a-22: mi 'gong zhing ni mi bza' ste ;
T02D2501:38a-23: / nam yang brdzi bar mi bya'o //
T02D2501:38a-24: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor dag ni //
T02D2501:38a-25: nam yang spyad par mi bya'o //
T02D2501:38a-26: tha na rdul gyi lhag ma dang //
T02D2501:38a-27: bdug smos dag kyang mi snom mo //
T02D2501:38a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsang sngags kyi rnal
T02D2501:38a-29: 'byor ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa
T02D2501:38a-30: bsdam pa'i tshig rnams rnal 'byor gyi sngags kyi rgyud
T02D2501:38a-31: thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i tshig 'grel par gyur pa
T02D2501:38a-32: / rdo rje rtse mo dang rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa la sogs pa las 'byung ste /
T02D2501:38a-33: de bas na bag yangs kyi tshig gang yin pa
T02D2501:38a-34: 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis phal cher ji
T02D2501:38a-35: skad du grags pa'i don las gzhan du rang gi
T02D2501:38a-36: brdas de lta bur bshad pas gdul ba'i 'gro ba
T02D2501:38a-37: la phan gdags pa'i phyir bstan to //
T02D2501:38a-38: de rnams kyi nang nas kyang tshig gang rnal 'byor
T02D2501:38a-39: la sogs pa'i skabs ji ltar ba dang mi 'gal
T02D2501:38a-40: ba de dag ni sgra ji bzhin pa nyid du
T02D2501:38a-41: 'jig rten pa'i brda las shes par bya'o zhes lung
T02D2501:38a-43: 'dir ni zhar la bshad pa ste /
T02D2501:38a-45: gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi'i cho ga bya ba dang /
T02D2501:38a-46: de'i don du dang por mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas te /
T02D2501:38b-0: kun du @38b bzang po 'dod pa dag / sems can kun la bde stsol ba //
T02D2501:38b-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2501:38b-2: mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:38b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang nye ba'i
T02D2501:38b-5: mtshan nyid de mnyes par bya ba'i sems dpa' gzhan
T02D2501:38b-7: / de nas mchod pa gsang ba brjod cing rdo
T02D2501:38b-8: rje gar gyi sbyor bas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
T02D2501:38b-9: mkha' ltag gnyis su bsnyems pa'i tshul dang bcas par
T02D2501:38b-10: bzhag la / ji ltar smos pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon dran pa sngar byas te /
T02D2501:38b-11: de las dga' ba bskyed cing dang pa spel ba dang /
T02D2501:38b-12: ba spu ldang ba la sogs pa sngar byas te /
T02D2501:38b-13: ldem bag can du spyi bo g-yon du 'dud par bya'o //
T02D2501:38b-14: 'di ni rdo rje l'a s+ye'i las kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2501:38b-17: aom badzra satva sam gra ha /
T02D2501:38b-21: zhes bya ba 'di ni mchod pa gsang ba ste /
T02D2501:38b-22: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi char la yang so so'i snying po dang bcas pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2501:38b-23: de nas gar byed cing rdo rje phreng ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2501:38b-24: gong du gsungs pa'i mchod pa gsang ba nyid brjod
T02D2501:38b-25: la gzungs dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa
T02D2501:38b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi
T02D2501:38b-27: me tog gi phreng ba'i cho gas bdag dang sems
T02D2501:38b-28: can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams
T02D2501:38b-29: nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bdag gi spyi
T02D2501:38b-30: bor phreng ba'i tshul du bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2501:38b-31: 'di ni rdo rje phreng ba'i las kyi phyag rgya ste snying po yang 'di'o //
T02D2501:38b-33: de nas de bzhin du mchod pa gsang ba brjod la /
T02D2501:38b-34: 'gro ba thams cad la zab cing rgya che ba'i
T02D2501:38b-35: mdo sde bshad pa la sogs pa 'byung bar gyur
T02D2501:38b-37: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rang gi kha nas tshig brjod pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2501:38b-38: 'di ni rdo rje glu'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2501:38b-41: de nas de bzhin du mchod pa gsang ba brjod la //
T02D2501:38b-42: mtshan ma dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs pa
T02D2501:38b-43: 'gro ba thams cad la nges pa'i tshig tu smra
T02D2501:38b-44: ba la mkhas shing ral gri la sogs pa dam
T02D2501:39a-1: rgya rnam pa sna tshogs pa lag na thogs pa
T02D2501:39a-2: 'gro ba'i don bsgrub pa la mkhas par bdag gi
T02D2501:39a-3: lus gyur cig ces yid la bsams te rdo rje
T02D2501:39a-4: gar gyi tshul gyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar ro
T02D2501:39a-5: // 'di ni rdo rje gar gyi las kyi phyag rgya ste de'i snying po ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:39a-7: de la 'di ni rdo rje gar gyi thabs bstan pa'o //
T02D2501:39a-8: rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pa mdun du bkan te
T02D2501:39a-9: bzhag la de'i steng du g-yas pa khas phub ste
T02D2501:39a-10: bzhag nas / rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pa de
T02D2501:39a-11: g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung la sogs pa sor mo thams
T02D2501:39a-12: cad dgrol ba'i tshul gyis bskor te /
T02D2501:39a-13: lag pa g-yas pa de yang de bzhin du ldem bag can du rdo rje khu tshur byas la /
T02D2501:39a-14: de bzhin du khu tshur g-yon pa bskor te mkhur tshos g-yon par bkur /
T02D2501:39a-15: de nas de bzhin du gar byed cing bskor ba gnyis bya ste /
T02D2501:39a-17: de nas kyang de bzhin du gar byed cing thal mo khong stong du bya'o //
T02D2501:39a-18: 'di ni rdo rje gar gyi rim pa'o //
T02D2501:39a-19: de ltar 'di ni mchod pa rnam pa brgyad mdor
T02D2501:39a-20: bsdus te rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi spyir bstan
T02D2501:39a-21: pa'o // mchod pa'i cho ga de bas kyang lhag
T02D2501:39a-22: par byed 'dod pa des ni las kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2501:39a-23: las gsungs pa'i lha rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i
T02D2501:39a-25: de rnams kyang rgyud nyid las shes par bya ste 'di ni mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2501:39a-26: de ltar gang du gsungs pa'i rim pas rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpar bdag nyid bsgrubs te /
T02D2501:39a-27: byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang ting
T02D2501:39a-28: nge 'dzin dang mchod par ldan pa'i bsngags pa ni
T02D2501:39a-29: / rang gi lha bzhin du cis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro zhes dad par bya ste /
T02D2501:39a-31: byin gyis brlabs la sogs ldan pa //
T02D2501:39a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur 'gyur //
T02D2501:39a-33: cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis //
T02D2501:39a-34: phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:39a-36: skabs 'dir yang yi ge brgya ba rdo rje'i tshig gis brjod par bya ste /
T02D2501:39a-37: nam bzlas brjod dang bsam gtan la sogs pa byed
T02D2501:39a-38: pa'i tshe yang rang gi lha'i bsgrub par byas pa
T02D2501:39a-40: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa mang po byung ngam /
T02D2501:39b-0: yul gzhan la sogs @39b par 'gro 'dod pa'i rnam
T02D2501:39b-1: par rtog pa'i dbang gis phyag rgya chen po la
T02D2501:39b-2: dmigs pa la sogs pa'i yul la sems mi 'du
T02D2501:39b-3: bar gyur pa de'i tshe yang rang gi sems de'i
T02D2501:39b-4: rang bzhin du gnas pas brtan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2501:39b-5: / yi ge brgya pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyis /
T02D2501:39b-6: dpal rdo rje sems dpa''am rdo rje rnon po la
T02D2501:39b-7: sogs pa ye shes sems dpa' chen po thams cad
T02D2501:39b-8: kyi ngo bo nyid la bskul lo //
T02D2501:39b-9: de la 'di ni yi ge brgya pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2501:39b-10: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D2501:39b-11: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha di dho me bha ba /
T02D2501:39b-12: su to shyo ma bha ba /
T02D2501:39b-13: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2501:39b-14: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2501:39b-17: tsittam shri ya ku ru h'um /
T02D2501:39b-20: sarba ta th'a ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02D2501:39b-21: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa;/
T02D2501:39b-22: 'di brjod pas mtshams med par byas pa dang /
T02D2501:39b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang /
T02D2501:39b-25: dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang /
T02D2501:39b-26: nyes par byas pa'i las thams cad byas pa yang
T02D2501:39b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub
T02D2501:39b-28: pa po la rdo rjes sems dpa' brtan par gyur
T02D2501:39b-29: pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos
T02D2501:39b-30: grub thams cad myur du 'thob ste rdo rje'i dngos
T02D2501:39b-31: grub bam rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub grub nas
T02D2501:39b-32: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub mchog gi bar
T02D2501:39b-33: du 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2501:39b-34: rje sems dpas gsungs so zhes gzhung las 'byung ngo
T02D2501:39b-35: / // thabs dang shes rab du ldan pa'i rnal
T02D2501:39b-36: 'byor pa mchog rnams la rang gi lha'i dam tshig
T02D2501:39b-37: sems dpa'i rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i byin gyis brlabs nas
T02D2501:39b-38: / // / dbang bskur ba dang ting nge 'dzin
T02D2501:39b-39: dang mchod pa dang ldan pa dngos su rgyas par
T02D2501:39b-40: / // / bshad zin to // cho ga byed
T02D2501:39b-41: mi nus pa des ni bzlas brjod bya ba'i snying
T02D2501:39b-42: po'i don gyi tshig tsam gyis kyang rang gi lha'i
T02D2501:39b-44: rang gi lha'i gzugs mdun du yang bsams la bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:39b-46: lta ngan chags pa med pa la //
T02D2501:39b-47: gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs so //
T02D2501:39b-48: zhes bya ba'i skabs su rgyas par gsungs nas de
T02D2501:39b-49: bas na snying po'i don gyis bdag rang sangs rgyas
T02D2501:40a-2: mdun du yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgom zhing ji ltar 'dod par byed pas /
T02D2501:40a-3: brgya rtsa brgyad du rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas brjod bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T02D2501:40a-4: 'di yang nye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig tu zad kyi /
T02D2501:40a-5: de bas na de las gzhan pa rdo rje sems
T02D2501:40a-6: dpa' la sogs pa mnyes par bya ba'i sems dpa'
T02D2501:40a-7: chen po rnams kyi cho ga yang 'di nyid do
T02D2501:40a-9: ji skad du gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i dam tshig
T02D2501:40a-10: sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byed mi nus pa'i sngags pas
T02D2501:40a-11: bzlas brjod bya ba'i snying po brjod pa tsam nyid
T02D2501:40a-12: de'i don gyis bzlas brjod bya ba'i lha sems dpar
T02D2501:40a-13: bdag byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2501:40a-16: mchod pa dang ldan par bsams te /
T02D2501:40a-17: mdun du yang de lta bu nyid bsgom zhing bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2501:40a-18: snying po'i don gyi tshig tsam gyis kyang dam tshig
T02D2501:40a-19: sems dpar bsgrub pa'i phyogs gnyis pa 'di yang bzlas
T02D2501:40a-20: brjod 'ba' zhig la dngos grub 'dod pa rnams la
T02D2501:40a-21: bstan gyi / phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa
T02D2501:40a-22: bsgom pas bsgrub nus pa rnams la ni ma yin
T02D2501:40a-23: bstan gyi / no // ji lta zhe na /
T02D2501:40a-24: phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i rgyud las bzlas brjod kyi skabs su /
T02D2501:40a-25: lta ngan chags pa med pa la //
T02D2501:40a-26: gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs so //
T02D2501:40a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs nas /
T02D2501:40a-28: tha na snying po'i don gyis bdag rang sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur te /
T02D2501:40a-29: mdun du yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tshig tsam gyis
T02D2501:40a-30: kyang bsgom zhing ji ltar 'dod par byed pas brgya
T02D2501:40a-31: rtsa brgyad du rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas par bya'o
T02D2501:40a-32: zhes gsungs so // gang gi phyir gzhan dag las
T02D2501:40a-33: kyang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i rim pa
T02D2501:40a-35: de ni mi nus pa rnams la gsang sngags kyi
T02D2501:40a-36: che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir rgyas pa las
T02D2501:40a-37: mdor bsdus par bya ba bstan pa dag kyang snang
T02D2501:40a-38: ste / ji ltar dam tshig chen po'i de kho
T02D2501:40a-39: na nyid kyi rtog pa las gsungs ba bzhin no
T02D2501:40a-40: ste / // gang gi phyir der ni rtog pa
T02D2501:40a-41: thams cad las gsungs pa'i lha rnams byin gyis brlab
T02D2501:40a-42: pa la sogs pa rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2501:40a-43: h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po bde ba chen po
T02D2501:40b-0: rdo rje dam tshig @40b ces bya ba'i mthu bstan
T02D2501:40b-1: pa'i sgo nas / 'dir 'dod chags med pa'i 'khor
T02D2501:40b-2: lo gzhom mi dgos so zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2501:40b-3: pa'i sgo nas / pa gsungs nas / 'di'i byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'ang ma bshad do //
T02D2501:40b-5: 'di ltar de rjes su dran pa nyid kyis bcom
T02D2501:40b-6: ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur
T02D2501:40b-7: bar 'gyur ro zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
T02D2501:40b-8: de ltar rgyas pa dang mdor bsdus pa rnam pa gnyis kyis kyang /
T02D2501:40b-9: rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpar bdag byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2501:40b-11: ting nge 'dzin dang mchod pa dang /
T02D2501:40b-12: ldan pa nyid du byas nas dang po ra re
T02D2501:40b-13: zhig rang gi sems dbang du gyur par bya ba'i
T02D2501:40b-14: phyir / rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo //
T02D2501:40b-15: ji skad du 'dir rdo rje phra mo'i phan yon
T02D2501:40b-16: bstan pa las de phyin chad ni gang zung zad
T02D2501:40b-17: // shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgom pa ni //
T02D2501:40b-18: de dag thams cad brtan bya ba //
T02D2501:40b-19: ting 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa'o //
T02D2501:40b-21: rdo rje phra mo yang 'dir dngos su na rang
T02D2501:40b-22: gi sems gnas pa'i rlung nyid sna nas dbugs dbyung
T02D2501:40b-23: zhing 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dod de /
T02D2501:40b-24: de bsnyen pa'i phyir de las gyur cing de dang
T02D2501:40b-25: 'brel pa nyid rab tu phra ba ni skra'i rtse
T02D2501:40b-26: mo tsam / rab tu bsgom pa ni til gyi 'bras bu tsam dang /
T02D2501:40b-27: de gnyis kyi bar ma ste /
T02D2501:40b-28: de lta bu rdo rje phra mo nas 'bras 'dra ba'am /
T02D2501:40b-29: rtse lnga pa rang gi lha'i kha dog dang mdangs
T02D2501:40b-30: 'dra ba sna'i thog mar rnal 'byor la mkhas pa
T02D2501:40b-31: rnams sems so // gang gi phyir de bsams pa'i
T02D2501:40b-32: dbang gis sna nas dbyung ba'i rlung de dbugs phyi
T02D2501:40b-33: nang du rgyu ba'i rang bzhin btang nas /
T02D2501:40b-34: sna'i bu ga gnyis bkang ste gnas par brtags pas
T02D2501:40b-35: reg pa khyad par sems rnam par gnas pa dang
T02D2501:40b-36: rjes su mthun par kun du bskyed do //
T02D2501:40b-37: de bas na khyad par ting nge 'dzin las byung
T02D2501:40b-38: ba'i dngos grub sgrub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang
T02D2501:40b-39: por rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya bar nges
T02D2501:40b-40: so // 'di skad du phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i skabs su yang /
T02D2501:40b-41: rdo rje phra mo'i cho ga sbyar //
T02D2501:40b-42: ye shes phyag rgya bcing bar bya //
T02D2501:40b-44: ye shes phyag rgya dbang du bya'o //
T02D2501:41a-2: gzhan dag las kyang phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i zhar la /
T02D2501:41a-3: don 'di phal cher bstan gyi der brtag par bya'o //
T02D2501:41a-4: rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:41a-5: dang por re zhig rang gi lha'i sems dpar bdag
T02D2501:41a-6: nyid ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i rjes su dran par byas
T02D2501:41a-7: la / rang gi lce rkan la bcar te mnyam
T02D2501:41a-8: par gzhag pa'i rim pa ji lta ba mngon du
T02D2501:41a-9: la / byas nas / dbugs dbyung ba'i rlung las
T02D2501:41a-10: gyur pa rdo rje phra mo ji skad gsungs pa'i
T02D2501:41a-11: mtshan nyid de'i snying po yid kyis brjod cing sna'i
T02D2501:41a-12: rtse mo rnam par brtags te /
T02D2501:41a-13: sna'i bu ga'i nang na rang gi sems dang dbyer
T02D2501:41a-14: med par gyur pa mi g-yo ba'i rdo rje phra
T02D2501:41a-15: mo'i rlung gis bde bar reg pa myong ba las
T02D2501:41a-16: lus dang sems las su rung ba dang /
T02D2501:41a-17: rjes su mthun pa nyams su myang bar bya'o //
T02D2501:41a-19: lce ni rkan la bcar nas su //
T02D2501:41a-20: sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:41a-21: rdo rje phra mo der reg pas //
T02D2501:41a-22: sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur //
T02D2501:41a-24: de la 'di ni rdo rje phra mo'i snying po'o //
T02D2501:41a-26: de nas reg pa myong ba'i 'og tu snying po
T02D2501:41a-27: 'di yang yid la brjod cing dbugs dal bus phyung
T02D2501:41a-28: la rang gi sems rgyu ba'i gnas sna'i bu gnas
T02D2501:41a-29: rgyu ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rlung de rlung gi
T02D2501:41a-30: dkyil 'khor gyis rdul bus ba ltar 'thor ba'i tshul
T02D2501:41a-31: gyis rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i mtshon cha mang
T02D2501:41a-32: po gtor bar gyur ba rim gyis phyis ji ltar
T02D2501:41a-33: mthong zhing thos pa'i srid pa gsum gyi gnas kyi
T02D2501:41a-34: nang khyab par de'i rjes su song ba'i yid kyis
T02D2501:41a-36: rdo rje phra mo bder reg pa'i //
T02D2501:41a-37: mtshan ma nam zhig byung ba na //
T02D2501:41a-38: mtshan ma de ni 'phro bya zhing //
T02D2501:41a-39: sems de kun du 'phro bar bya //
T02D2501:41a-40: ji ltar 'dod par sems spros pas //
T02D2501:41a-41: khams gsum yang ni khyab par bya //
T02D2501:41a-45: de nas de ltar yun ring du bsams te /
T02D2501:41a-46: snying po 'di yang yid la zlos shing dbugs slar
T02D2501:41a-47: bsdu ba'i reg pa myong bar byed pas rdo rje'i
T02D2501:41a-48: tshogs de dag thams cad slar bsdu zhing rab tu
T02D2501:41a-49: phra ba'i rdo rje gcig pur rnam par rtog pa
T02D2501:41b-0: rjes @41b su chud pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin
T02D2501:41b-1: du sna'i rtse mo'i bar du dbugs slar bsdus pa'i
T02D2501:41b-2: rlung gi rdo rje de bsgom mo //
T02D2501:41b-4: de nas de yi slar bsdu ba //
T02D2501:41b-5: sna yi rtse mor 'ongs pa'i bar //
T02D2501:41b-8: aom sam ha ra na badzra /
T02D2501:41b-9: de'i 'og tu snying po 'di yang yid la bya
T02D2501:41b-10: zhing ji srid 'dod pa'i bsam gtan du byas par

T02D2501:41b-15: dbang du bya ba'i phyir rdo rje phra mo'i ting
T02D2501:41b-16: nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor spyir bstan pa'o //
T02D2501:41b-17: rdo rje rtse mo las ni rdo rje phra mo bstan pa'i skabs su mi rtag pa dang /

T02D2501:41b-22: sems mnyam par gnas pa'i rgyu rdo rje phra mo

T02D2501:41b-25: ltar 'dod pa'i bar byas na 'gal ba med do

T02D2501:41b-27: gang gi phyir de la ting nge 'dzin la nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2501:41b-28: sems mnyam par gnas pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur ro//
T02D2501:41b-30: bdag ni rdo rje phra mo'i chos //
T02D2501:41b-31: bdag nyid bsam pa shes rab can //
T02D2501:41b-32: bdag de dmigs su med pa ste //
T02D2501:41b-33: 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi lus //
T02D2501:41b-34: 'byung ba rnams ni gang las byung //
T02D2501:41b-35: yang na lus 'di thams cad ni //
T02D2501:41b-36: mi gtsang rkyen las byung ba ni //
T02D2501:41b-37: spyi bo nas brtsams rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2501:41b-38: rkang mthil bar du khyab par bsam //
T02D2501:41b-39: yang na bdag nyid rdo rjer bsam //
T02D2501:41b-40: zla ba'i dbus su mi 'jigs pas //
T02D2501:41b-41: yang na snying ga'i dbus su ni //
T02D2501:41b-42: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
T02D2501:41b-43: yang na zla ba gnyis ldan pa'i //
T02D2501:41b-44: dbus su rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:41b-45: yang na dbus kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D2501:41b-46: rang gi lus ni khyab par bya //
T02D2501:41b-47: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
T02D2501:41b-48: de ltar gang yang rung ba'i rim gyis dus ji
T02D2501:41b-49: srid 'dod par bsgoms te rtse gcig tu dmigs pa'i
T02D2501:41b-50: mtshan nyid du sems dbang du gyur par shes nas
T02D2501:42a-0: / @42a * // sa'i dngos grub la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang
T02D2501:42a-1: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya chen po la
T02D2501:42a-2: sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams
T02D2501:42a-3: bsgrub par bya'o // 'dir yang rnal 'byor sgrub pa po rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2501:42a-4: de la gcig ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nyid na /
T02D2501:42a-5: ye shes bab par gyur pa ste /
T02D2501:42a-6: de dag la ni sa la sogs pa 'jig rten
T02D2501:42a-7: pa'i dngos grub rnams sbyar ba tsam gyis 'grub po
T02D2501:42a-8: // de las gzhan pa rnams ni mtshan ma byung
T02D2501:42a-9: gi bar du bsgoms pas 'grub par shes par bya'o
T02D2501:42a-10: // // 'jig rten las 'das pa phyag rgya chen
T02D2501:42a-11: po la sogs pa bzhi'i dngos grub rnams ni bsod
T02D2501:42a-12: nams ci yod pa las dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i
T02D2501:42a-13: // // tshe / ye shes babs pa'i mthus kyang
T02D2501:42a-14: ma thob pa de rnams ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i
T02D2501:42a-15: mtshan nyid du bsgoms pas thob par shas par bya'o
T02D2501:42a-17: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams ni
T02D2501:42a-18: rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ji
T02D2501:42a-19: skad du bstan pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2501:42a-20: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bsgrub pa
T02D2501:42a-21: la ni sbyor ba 'di khyad par du bya bar
T02D2501:42a-23: 'di ltar rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpar rnal
T02D2501:42a-24: 'byor byas pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa la
T02D2501:42a-25: rang gi lus kyi nang du rang gi lha'i ye
T02D2501:42a-26: shes kyi sems dpa' gzhug go //
T02D2501:42a-27: de bzhin du ji ltar rigs par rdo rje la
T02D2501:42a-28: sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa la
T02D2501:42a-29: ni rang gi snying gar bsgrub par bya ba'i phyag
T02D2501:42a-30: rgya gzhag go // chos kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa la ni //
T02D2501:42a-31: rang gi lce la rdo rje bsam mo //
T02D2501:42a-32: las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa la ni rang gi snying gar las kyi rdo rje sbyar ro //
T02D2501:42a-33: de ltar phyag rgya bzhi bsgrubs pas las gzhan pa
T02D2501:42a-34: la sogs pa'i dngos grub rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs
T02D2501:42a-35: pa dang / phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i rgyud las
T02D2501:42a-36: gsungs pa thams cad ni rang gi lha'i dam tshig
T02D2501:42a-37: sems dpa'i rnal 'byor nyid kyis 'grub par gsungs so
T02D2501:42a-38: pa dang / // gang yang 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2501:42a-39: rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bzlas brjod dang bsgom
T02D2501:42b-0: pa goms par byas pa las ji ltar rigs @42b
T02D2501:42b-1: par 'byung ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir khyad par
T02D2501:42b-2: med par bdag nyid rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems
T02D2501:42b-4: ye shes kyi sems dpa' gzhug par sngar byas te bsgom pa'am /
T02D2501:42b-5: bzlas brjod bya bar 'chad pa de rnams kyis rdo
T02D2501:42b-6: rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyis skabs su phyag rgya
T02D2501:42b-7: chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcing bar bstan pa
T02D2501:42b-8: brtag dgos te / 'di ltar der ni de bzhin
T02D2501:42b-9: gshegs pa la sogs pa dam tshig sems dpa'i phyag
T02D2501:42b-10: rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par byas nas /
T02D2501:42b-11: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa nyid la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bstan te /
T02D2501:42b-12: des ni 'dir phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa bshad
T02D2501:42b-13: do zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas phyag rgya
T02D2501:42b-14: chen po'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i mtha'i
T02D2501:42b-15: bar gyi gzhung gis bshad do //
T02D2501:42b-17: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i //
T02D2501:42b-18: dam tshig phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid brtag /
T02D2501:42b-19: rang gi phyag rgya snying gar gnas //
T02D2501:42b-20: rdo rje sems ma'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2501:42b-21: zhes bya ba de rnams bsgrub par gsungs so //
T02D2501:42b-23: rdo rje sems ma'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2501:42b-24: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D2501:42b-25: pa'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid la rdo rje sems ma'i
T02D2501:42b-26: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya bar bshad do //
T02D2501:42b-27: de bzhin du chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bstan
T02D2501:42b-28: nas de bsgrub pa'i phyir rang gi lce la rdo
T02D2501:42b-29: rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bstan to //
T02D2501:42b-30: las kyi phyag rgya bstan nas kyang rang gi snying gar las kyi rdo rje bsgom pa bstan te /
T02D2501:42b-31: de ltar brtags na khyad par med par dngos grub
T02D2501:42b-32: thams cad sgrub pa pos ji ltar rigs par rang
T02D2501:42b-33: gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas pa
T02D2501:42b-34: dngos grub thams cad 'dod pa la khyad par med
T02D2501:42b-35: par ye shes kyi sems dpa' gzhug pa yod ces
T02D2501:42b-36: rgyud kyi don rtogs pa la mkhas pa'i slob dpon
T02D2501:42b-38: gzhan yang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa

T02D2501:42b-40: dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi rnams su phyag
T02D2501:42b-41: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin bzhi rnams
T02D2501:42b-42: kyis gnas te / de rnams ji ltar rigs par
T02D2501:43a-0: sgrub pa pos rang gi lha dang rjes @43a *
T02D2501:43a-1: kyis gnas te / // su mthun pa nyid du
T02D2501:43a-2: de'i nga rgyal rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir rang gi
T02D2501:43a-3: lus kyi nang du ye shes kyi sems dpa' gzhug
T02D2501:43a-5: de las la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim pa yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:43a-6: 'di ltar dang por re zhig rdo rje phra mo'i
T02D2501:43a-7: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rab tu goms pas
T02D2501:43a-8: snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid rang gi lha'i dam
T02D2501:43a-9: tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byin gyis brlab pa dang
T02D2501:43a-12: mchod pa dang ldan par byas te /
T02D2501:43a-13: de bzhin du phyi rol gyi ye shes kyi sems
T02D2501:43a-14: dpa' la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ci nus
T02D2501:43a-15: par cho ga bzhin du byas la /
T02D2501:43a-16: rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas
T02D2501:43a-17: te btang la 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas rdo
T02D2501:43a-18: rje sems ma'i phyag rgya dral ba sngar byas te
T02D2501:43a-19: / dbab pa'i snying po brjod pas ye shes dbab pa mngon du bya'o //
T02D2501:43a-20: 'di ni phal cher dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa
T02D2501:43a-21: la thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pa rnams kyis
T02D2501:43a-22: sngon gyi dus su bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2501:43a-23: de la sa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams sgrub sla bas rgyud las kyang dang por bshad do //
T02D2501:43a-24: de dag bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir man ngag dang
T02D2501:43a-25: bcas pa'i bsgom pa dang blang ba'i rim pa bstan
T02D2501:43a-27: rten la rdo rje'i gzugs gnas pa //
T02D2501:43a-28: snying ga nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:43a-29: bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yis //
T02D2501:43a-30: gter rnams de yis mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2501:43a-32: de'i don man ngag dang bcas pa ni gang yang rung ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas /
T02D2501:43a-33: snga ma bzhin du thams cad spyi dam tshig sems
T02D2501:43a-34: dpa'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa ye shes dbab pa'i
T02D2501:43a-35: mtha'i bar du sngon gyi dus su bya ba rnams
T02D2501:43a-36: byas nas dus bzhir ci nus su bsam pa ni

T02D2501:43a-39: rang gi rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog
T02D2501:43a-40: rdo rje rtse lnga pas brgyan pa'i snying po 'di
T02D2501:43a-41: rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas shing bsgom mo //
T02D2501:43a-44: de ltar na mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcom ste /
T02D2501:43a-45: rdo rje dang ldan pa'i bum pa la dmigs pa'i
T02D2501:43b-0: ting nge 'dzin du rab tu gsal bar @43b snang

T02D2501:43b-2: ma'i mtshan nyid dang rjes su mthun pa byung gi
T02D2501:43b-4: ting nge 'dzin thams cad grub pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid kyang 'og nas 'chad par blta'o //
T02D2501:43b-5: de'i 'og tu srung ba dang mchod pa'i cho ga byas te /
T02D2501:43b-6: ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig tu gnas te /
T02D2501:43b-7: de'i 'og tu sa'i gnas brtag pa'i phyir de bzhin
T02D2501:43b-8: du mchod pa'i cho ga byas la 'byung po rnams
T02D2501:43b-9: la gtor ma yang byin te sa pa yod par
T02D2501:43b-11: gang yang rung ba'i gnas su 'dug la /

T02D2501:43b-13: byas te ji srid du mnyam par gnas pa nyid
T02D2501:43b-14: kyis sa la gnas pa'i gtar snang ba'i tshul du

T02D2501:43b-18: de ltar 'og nas 'byung ba'i sbyor ba gsum rnams la yang spyi'i cho ga 'di sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2501:43b-19: de rnams kyi bye brag gang yin pa de ni 'dir bshad par bya ste /

T02D2501:43b-23: sbyor ba'i tshe yang mnyam par gzhag pas ji ltar
T02D2501:43b-24: bsams pa'i rdo rje gter gyi gnas su lhung bar

T02D2501:43b-42: sbyor ba bzhi pa ni bdag sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzugs su snying po 'dis bsgom ste /
T02D2501:43b-45: sbyor ba'i tshe yang de ltar bsgoms pas bdag nyid
T02D2501:43b-46: gter gyi gnas su gyur nas rang babs te ltung
T02D2501:44a-2: lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kun //

T02D2501:44a-9: rnams thams cad kyis sa'i sgrub pa'i bye brag la

T02D2501:44a-13: sbyar bar bya'o // // de la 'di ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi man ngag go //
T02D2501:44a-14: rdo rje bab par gyur nas su //
T02D2501:44a-15: chu la rdo rje'i gzugs bzhin du //

T02D2501:44a-19: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje babs pa'i de ma

T02D2501:44a-29: pa / badzra dzny'a na m'a nu tta ram /

T02D2501:44a-31: de la rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po 'di'o //

T02D2501:44a-33: sems ma'i phyag rgya de gnyis su byas la lag

T02D2501:44a-36: pa'i rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'i gung mo la

T02D2501:44a-38: pa zhes bya ba yi ge brgya pa sngar gsungs
T02D2501:44a-39: pa yang rdo rje'i tshig gis ji tsam 'dod par

T02D2501:44a-42: 'dra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sems mnyam par
T02D2501:44a-43: gnas pa dang rdzas su mi mthun pa ni mi

T02D2501:44a-46: pa'i cho ga 'di sbyor bar bya'o //

T02D2501:44b-13: gcig pu rang gi rigs kyi kha dog dang mthun
T02D2501:44b-14: par gyur par rnam par brtag go //
