T02D2501:45a-3: de nas kyang de las gzhan pa'i gzugs su bsam ste /
T02D2501:45a-4: de ltar dbang du gyur na /
T02D2501:45a-5: de bzhin du nub gcig ting nge 'dzin du gnas
T02D2501:45a-6: la phyis bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su
T02D2501:45a-7: bsams te / ji srid ting nge 'dzin las langs
T02D2501:45a-8: pa de srid du de lta bu'i gzugs su bdag
T02D2501:45a-9: nyid kyis mthong zhing gzhan gyis kyang mthong bar 'gyur
T02D2501:45a-10: ba de srid du bsam mo //
T02D2501:45a-11: de bas 'di ni mi snang ba'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa ste /
T02D2501:45a-12: de bzhin bdag la babs nas su //
T02D2501:45a-13: bdag ni nam mkha' yin par bsgom //
T02D2501:45a-14: ji srid 'dod par bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2501:45a-15: ji srid du ni mi snang 'byung //
T02D2501:45a-17: de'i man ngag ni sngon gyi dus su bya ba'i cho ga thams cad de bzhin du byas nas /
T02D2501:45a-18: rang gi lus rdul phra rab tu bshigs [*bshegs?] te /
T02D2501:45a-19: rdul phra rab kyi phyogs cha tha dad par brtag
T02D2501:45a-20: pa'i rigs pa mi bzod pas rang bzhin med par
T02D2501:45a-23: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yid la brjod cing /
T02D2501:45a-24: bdag nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ji srid ting
T02D2501:45a-25: nge 'dzin grub pa'i mtshan ma ma byung gi bar
T02D2501:45a-26: du bsgom mo // de nas mnyam par bzhag na
T02D2501:45a-27: thad na 'khod pas kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro
T02D2501:45a-28: du bsgom mo // // de nas de bzhin du
T02D2501:45a-29: nub gcig pa'i sbyor ba sngar byas nas ji ltar
T02D2501:45a-30: 'dod pa'i yul dang dus su gnas te /
T02D2501:45a-31: ting nge 'dzin 'di la ji srid sus kyang mi
T02D2501:45a-32: mthong bar 'gyur ba de srid du rnal 'byor pas
T02D2501:45a-33: gnas par bya'o // nam mkha' la yang 'phar ba'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2501:45a-34: bdag rang rdo rje dbab byas nas //
T02D2501:45a-35: bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom pa ni //
T02D2501:45a-39: de'i rim pa yang sngon du bya ba'i cho ga rnams de bzhin du byas te /
T02D2501:45a-41: zhes bya ba'i snying po bzlas shing gzugs rnam par
T02D2501:45a-42: ma bshigs [*bshegs?] pa nyid du bdag rdo rje rtse
T02D2501:45a-43: lnga pa rab tu yang ba dbugs 'dren pa'i rlung
T02D2501:45a-44: gis gyen du bdegs shing ji srid sa la sor
T02D2501:45a-45: gcig dang sor gnyis la sogs pa rim gyis 'phags
T02D2501:45b-0: nas bdag gyen du 'gro @45b bar gyur pa de
T02D2501:45b-1: srid kyi bar du bsgom mo //
T02D2501:45b-2: de nas kyang de bzhin du nub gcig ting nge 'dzin du 'dug ste /
T02D2501:45b-3: de nas ji srid 'dod pa'i khang pa dang khri
T02D2501:45b-4: dang khri'u la sogs pa'i tshad las 'dzegs nas gyen
T02D2501:45b-5: du 'gro ba ji ltar goms pas nam mkha' la
T02D2501:45b-6: 'phar ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya ste /
T02D2501:45b-7: ji ltar 'dod par 'phar nas ji srid ting nge
T02D2501:45b-8: 'dzin ma btang ba de srid du nam mkha'i dkyil
T02D2501:45b-10: rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa'i rim pa yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:45b-11: dang po re zhig mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par
T02D2501:45b-12: byas la rdo rje phra mo rab tu bsgoms nas
T02D2501:45b-13: / rig sngags 'chang gi snying po 'og nas 'byung
T02D2501:45b-14: ba bzhi las gang yang rung ba cig yid la
T02D2501:45b-15: / zlos shing / bdag gi rig sngags 'chang gi
T02D2501:45b-16: gzugs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rang gi
T02D2501:45b-17: rigs las gsungs pa'i kha dog dang /
T02D2501:45b-18: gzi ma dangs can gdu bu dang /
T02D2501:45b-21: snyan cha la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa'i
T02D2501:45b-22: lus su bsgom par bya ba'i snying po'i don dang
T02D2501:45b-23: rjes su mthun par sems shing lag pa g-yas pa
T02D2501:45b-24: na ji ltar srid par rdo rje dang rin po
T02D2501:45b-25: che dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i
T02D2501:45b-26: mtshan ma 'dzin pas bdag gi rigs kyi nga rgyal
T02D2501:45b-27: du byas pas ji srid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang
T02D2501:45b-28: / ji ltar bsams pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs pa reg pa myong ba sngar byas te /
T02D2501:45b-29: mig phye na rig sngags 'chang gi gzugs su bdag
T02D2501:45b-30: nyid ji ltar bsgoms par mnyam par gzhag pas mthong
T02D2501:45b-32: de nas zla ba'i ste ngan 'dug bzhin du bdag
T02D2501:45b-33: gi lus rdo rje rig sngags 'chang du snang ba
T02D2501:45b-34: sor gcig dang sor gnyis la sogs pa rim gyis
T02D2501:45b-35: gyen du 'phar bar bsgom zhing nam mkha' la gnas
T02D2501:45b-36: nus par rnam par brtag go //
T02D2501:45b-37: de nas nub mo dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs
T02D2501:45b-38: pa'i sbyor bas dad pa'i lha la mchod pa'i cho
T02D2501:45b-39: ga byas te ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas na /
T02D2501:45b-40: rang gi lha ye shes kyi sems dpa' gshegs nas
T02D2501:45b-41: ji ltar bsgoms pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub
T02D2501:45b-44: nam mkha' la ni zla ba'i gzugs //
T02D2501:46a-2: lag par rdo rje bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2501:46a-4: zla ba'i gzugs la gnas nas su //
T02D2501:46a-5: rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:46a-6: bdag nyid dag pa ci 'dod pa //
T02D2501:46a-7: de tsam du ni myur du 'phar //
T02D2501:46a-8: zla ba'i gzugs la gnas nas su //
T02D2501:46a-9: rdo rje padma lag gnas nas //
T02D2501:46a-10: rdo rje spyan du bsgoms na ni //
T02D2501:46a-12: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te //
T02D2501:46a-13: rdo rje las su rab tu bsgom //
T02D2501:46a-14: rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin kun gyi //
T02D2501:46a-17: de nas bsgom pa'i snying po rnams 'byung ste /
T02D2501:46a-22: da ni rang gi lha'i nga rgyal du gnas pa'i
T02D2501:46a-23: rnal 'byor pa ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bzhi go
T02D2501:46a-24: rims bzhin du bsgoms pas nam mkha' la 'phar ba
T02D2501:46a-25: dang / lnga mngon par shes pa dang /
T02D2501:46a-27: sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang 'thob pa'i sbyor ba rnams bshad par bya ste /
T02D2501:46a-28: de la ting nge 'dzin dang po'i rim pa ni
T02D2501:46a-29: sngon gyi dus su bya ba'i cho ga mchod pa
T02D2501:46a-30: la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin du byas nas
T02D2501:46a-32: zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod cing nam mkha'i phyogs
T02D2501:46a-33: na gnas pa'i rdul mang po'i gzugs rdul phra rab
T02D2501:46a-34: gcig dang gnyis dang gsum gyi go rims kyis so
T02D2501:46a-35: so nas rdo rje rgya gram gyi gzugs su gyur
T02D2501:46a-36: pa rnams 'phro ba dang 'du ba'i tshul gyis rdo
T02D2501:46a-37: rje'i ri them skas kyi rim pa bzhin du rnam
T02D2501:46a-38: par phye bas brgyan cing rab tu mdzes pa'i gnas
T02D2501:46a-39: gcig tu gyur par bsgom zhing de yang rkang lag
T02D2501:46a-40: gis reg tu rung bar goms par byas te /
T02D2501:46a-41: de bzhin du mchod pa'i cho ga byas la /
T02D2501:46a-42: rdo rje rgya gram gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste nub gcig la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2501:46a-43: de nas des ji ltar 'dod pa'i nam mkha'i nang
T02D2501:46a-44: khyab pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bdag gi
T02D2501:46a-45: lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa nyid du rnal 'byor
T02D2501:46a-46: ting nge 'dzin ma btang ba'i bar du 'og min
T02D2501:46a-47: gyi gnas su yang gom pas 'dzegs nus par 'gyur
T02D2501:46a-49: thams cad rdo rje'i ting 'dzin du /
T02D2501:46a-50: nam mkha'i dbyings su bsams nas ni //
T02D2501:46a-51: rdo rje'i bdag nyid ci 'dod pa//
T02D2501:46b-0: @46b skad cig gis ni de tsam 'phar //
T02D2501:46b-2: 'dir yang rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni
T02D2501:46b-3: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi nye ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2501:46b-4: do // de bzhin du sngon gyi dus su bya
T02D2501:46b-5: ba'i cho ga thams cad byas te rang gi lha'i
T02D2501:46b-6: rnal 'byor pa la gnas pa nyid kyis /
T02D2501:46b-8: zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod cing rnam par rtog
T02D2501:46b-9: pa'i rab tu spros pa thams cad dang bral ba
T02D2501:46b-10: nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa'i mtshan
T02D2501:46b-11: nyid bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
T02D2501:46b-12: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dag pa mngon du byas
T02D2501:46b-13: nas lha'i mig la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa'i
T02D2501:46b-14: mngon par shes pa'i yul yongs su shes par bya
T02D2501:46b-15: ba'i phyir rjes su dran par byas nas /
T02D2501:46b-16: der yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsgom par bya
T02D2501:46b-17: ba ni ji srid ting nge 'dzin grub pa'i mtshan
T02D2501:46b-18: ma byung nas mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyis ji
T02D2501:46b-19: ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs yul gzhan la sogs pa na
T02D2501:46b-20: gnas pa yang mngon sum du mthong bar gyur gyi
T02D2501:46b-22: de bzhin du nub gcig mnyam par bzhag nas lha'i mig la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02D2501:46b-24: thams cad dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog / de bzhin du ni bsgom byas na //
T02D2501:46b-25: ye shes bsgrub pa'i mngon shes lnga //
T02D2501:46b-28: mngon par shes pa yang lha'i mig dang /
T02D2501:46b-30: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T02D2501:46b-31: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2501:46b-33: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa'i mthu bstan pa'i skabs su phyis bstan par bya'o //
T02D2501:46b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin du thams cad byas nas /
T02D2501:46b-36: zhes bya ba'i snying po yid la brjod cing ji
T02D2501:46b-37: skad du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs rnams
T02D2501:46b-38: kyis nam mkha'i nang mtha' dag gang bar mtshan ma
T02D2501:46b-39: byung gi bar du bsgom mo //
T02D2501:46b-40: de nas de bzhin du mnyam par gzhag pa nyid
T02D2501:46b-41: kyis mig phye na ji ltar bsams pa'i rdo rje
T02D2501:46b-42: sems dpa'i gzugs mang po rnams rab tu gsal bar
T02D2501:46b-43: mthong bar bya'o // de nas de bzhin du mtshan
T02D2501:46b-44: gcig mnyam par bzhag nas phyis ji ltar 'dod par
T02D2501:47a-1: 'dzin mngon tu byas pas nam mkha'i nang rdo rje
T02D2501:47a-2: sems dpas gang bar bdag gis mthong zhing gzhan la
T02D2501:47a-3: yang de bzhin du bstan du rung bar bya ba
T02D2501:47a-4: ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur
T02D2501:47a-5: gyi bar du goms par bya'o //
T02D2501:47a-6: de bzhin du sngon gyi dus su bya ba'i cho ga thams cad byas la /
T02D2501:47a-8: zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod cing nam mkha'i nang sangs rgyas kyi skus gang bar bsams te /
T02D2501:47a-9: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2501:47a-10: ting nge 'dzin de gnyi ga yang rgyud las /
T02D2501:47a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du //
T02D2501:47a-12: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas par bya //
T02D2501:47a-13: dran pa brtan ldan myur bar ni //
T02D2501:47a-15: nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du //
T02D2501:47a-16: sangs rgyas gzugs rnams bsam pa ni //
T02D2501:47a-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin te //
T02D2501:47a-18: sangs rgyas nyid du de 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:47a-20: da ni dbang du bya ba dang /
T02D2501:47a-23: sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mtshan nyid kyi sbyor
T02D2501:47a-24: ba bzhi bsgom pa goms par bya ba gang gsungs
T02D2501:47a-26: sbyor ba 'di bzhi'i cho ga yang bsgrub par bya ba skyes pa dang /
T02D2501:47a-27: bud med gang yang rung ba'i lus kyi bu ga nas 'jug pa sngar byas la /
T02D2501:47a-28: yid kyis khyab par bya ba'i sbyor ba ste /
T02D2501:47a-30: skyes pa'am bud med dag gi ni //
T02D2501:47a-31: bu ga nas ni lus gzhug go //
T02D2501:47a-32: zhugs nas de lus thams cad ni //
T02D2501:47a-33: yid kyis kun du khyab par bya //
T02D2501:47a-35: khyad par du yang dbang du bya ba la ni /
T02D2501:47a-36: mchod pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa rdo rje
T02D2501:47a-37: phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du thams cad
T02D2501:47a-38: byas la rang gi lha rjes su dran pa sngar
T02D2501:47a-39: byas te / de bzhin du rdo rje dbab pa sngar byas la /
T02D2501:47a-41: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di'i rjes su dran par byed cing /
T02D2501:47a-42: thog mar re zhig goms par bya ba'i phyir rdo
T02D2501:47a-43: rje'i thal mo bcings la sa'am shing dam rdo la
T02D2501:47a-44: sogs pa la gzugs brnyan byas pa mdun du bzhag
T02D2501:47a-45: ste / yid kyis de'i bu ga nas zhugs la
T02D2501:47a-46: de'i lus kyi nang ma lus par bdag gi lus
T02D2501:47a-48: rdo rje'i thal mo'i mthil phye la ci nas kyang
T02D2501:47a-49: mnyam par gzhag pa mnyam par bzhag nas brdab bo
T02D2501:47b-0: // de nas dbugs slar @47b bsdu ba'i tshul gyis
T02D2501:47b-1: yang slar bsdus te bdag gi lha dang mi gnyis
T02D2501:47b-2: pa'i rjes su dran par byas la de bzhin du
T02D2501:47b-3: // yang zhugs te / de nyid kyi tshul du
T02D2501:47b-4: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas rjes su dran
T02D2501:47b-5: pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2501:47b-6: de ltar rim pa de dus bzhir ting nge 'dzin
T02D2501:47b-7: dbang du gyur cing ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma
T02D2501:47b-8: byung gi bar du bsgom ste de bzhin du nub
T02D2501:47b-10: de nas skyes pa'am bud med gang dbang du bya
T02D2501:47b-11: bar 'dod pa'i yid la mdun du 'dug par bltas
T02D2501:47b-12: te / bdag kyang rdo rje dbab pas sngar bsam
T02D2501:47b-13: par byas la dbang du bya ba'i snying po yang
T02D2501:47b-14: de bzhin du zlos shing bu ga nas 'jug pa
T02D2501:47b-15: la sogs pa'i las snga ma bzhin byas na ring
T02D2501:47b-16: por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur ro zhes dbang
T02D2501:47b-17: du bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di slob dpon dag gis
T02D2501:47b-19: rdo rje dbab pa kun bskyed nas /
T02D2501:47b-20: mnyam par gzhag pas thal mo brdab /
T02D2501:47b-21: rdo rje thal mo dal brdabs pas /
T02D2501:47b-22: ri yang dbang du byas par 'gyur /
T02D2501:47b-24: dbab pa la sogs pa sbyor ba 'og nas 'byung ba gsum la yang 'di dag kun mtshungs te /
T02D2501:47b-25: khyad par du ni dbab pa'i sbyor ba la /
T02D2501:47b-27: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di brjod cing rdo rje bcings pa'i mthil brdab bo //
T02D2501:47b-29: rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga sbyar //
T02D2501:47b-30: rdo rje bcings pa'i mthil gyis brdab //
T02D2501:47b-31: thal mo dal ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:47b-32: ri yang kun du dbab par 'gyur //
T02D2501:47b-34: gzhig pa'i sbyor ba'i khyad par ni /
T02D2501:47b-36: zhes bya ba bsgom pa'i snying po zlos shing rdo
T02D2501:47b-37: rje bcings pa brkyang pa'i sor mo rnams drag tu
T02D2501:47b-39: de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D2501:47b-40: rdo rje bcings pa brkyang nas ni //
T02D2501:47b-41: sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdab na //
T02D2501:47b-42: ri brgya yud kyis brlag par 'gyur //
T02D2501:47b-43: sdug bsngal thams cad bsal ba'i khyad par ni /
T02D2501:47b-45: zhes bya ba bsgom pa'i snying po brjod cing /
T02D2501:47b-46: rdo rje bcings pa dgrol pa ste /
T02D2501:47b-48: dal bus brdab pa'i cho ga sbyar //
T02D2501:47b-49: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sor mo kun //
T02D2501:47b-50: rdo rje bcings pa bkrol ba ni //
T02D2501:47b-51: sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D2501:48a-1: pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i skabs su gsungs
T02D2501:48a-2: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub rnams bshad zin
T02D2501:48a-4: / da ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de'i
T02D2501:48a-5: rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgoms
T02D2501:48a-6: pa las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
T02D2501:48a-7: pa'i skur bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams
T02D2501:48a-8: bshad par bya'o // 'dir yang snga ma bzhin du
T02D2501:48a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rang gi lha'i
T02D2501:48a-10: dam tshig sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2501:48a-13: mchod pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor rdo rje phra
T02D2501:48a-14: mo bsgom pa dang bcas par de bzhin du bya'o
T02D2501:48a-15: // khyad par du ni rdo rje phra mo bsgoms
T02D2501:48a-16: pa'i 'og tu phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa
T02D2501:48a-17: sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa bde ba dang yid bde
T02D2501:48a-18: ba la gnas kyang byams pa la sogs pa snga
T02D2501:48a-19: nas bsgoms pa'i rang gis lhun gyis grub pa nyid
T02D2501:48a-20: du sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir chos kyi
T02D2501:48a-21: dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i rim pas byams pa la
T02D2501:48a-22: sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2501:48a-23: de'i 'og tu rang gi lha'i rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi
T02D2501:48a-24: byang chub kyi sems bsdus par gyur pa zla ba'i
T02D2501:48a-26: de nas rang gi lha nyid kyis rnam par grol
T02D2501:48a-27: ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa ji ltar
T02D2501:48a-31: dga' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams goms par bya'o //
T02D2501:48a-32: de'i 'og tu de'i 'od zer mang po 'phro ba
T02D2501:48a-33: dang 'du ba'i tshul gyis ji ltar srid par bdag
T02D2501:48a-34: dang mi gnyis par gyur pa'am /

T02D2501:51a-46: ba'i sgo dang cha mnyam pas gcig go snyam du
T02D2501:51a-47: bsams te de ltar bdag dang lha'i rnam par grol
T02D2501:51b-0: @51b ba'i sgo gnyis gcig tu mos pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2501:51b-1: rnam par grol ba sprad pa byams pa'i bde ba
T02D2501:51b-2: la kun du chags pa brtan par bsgom pa 'di
T02D2501:51b-3: ni rab tu gsang ba'i mchod pa gsum pa ste
T02D2501:51b-5: byams pa'i bde la brtan par chags //
T02D2501:51b-6: sprad pa'i bde ba mchog rnams ni //
T02D2501:51b-7: sangs rgyas rnams la phul na yang //
T02D2501:51b-10: sprad pa ni 'dir rang gi dam tshig gi sems dpa' dang /
T02D2501:51b-11: ye shes kyi sems dpa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo gnyis sbyar ba'o //
T02D2501:51b-12: de nas karma badzra zhes brjod la 'di ltar rnam par brtag go //
T02D2501:51b-13: gang gi phyir lha'i gzugs kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku dag dang /
T02D2501:51b-14: bdag dang rnam pa thams cad du gcig ste /
T02D2501:51b-15: de bas ni 'di gnyis kyi dbang po gzugs yod pa dang /
T02D2501:51b-16: gzugs med pa thams cad mnyam par gzhag pas gcig tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pas /
T02D2501:51b-18: ye shes kyi sems dpar gcig tu gyur pa'i nga
T02D2501:51b-19: rgyal rab tu bsgom pa 'di ni rab tu gsang
T02D2501:51b-20: ba'i mchod pa bzhi pa ste 'di skad du /
T02D2501:51b-21: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba'i //
T02D2501:51b-22: sbyor ba'i bde ba thams cad du //
T02D2501:51b-23: mchod pa nges par phul na ni //
T02D2501:51b-26: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba ni bdag gi lus kyi dbang po rnams dang /
T02D2501:51b-27: bdag gi lus kyi nang na gnas pa'i ye shes
T02D2501:51b-28: kyi sems dpa'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad yin par
T02D2501:51b-29: shes par bya'o // 'dir yang go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2501:51b-32: las kyi rigs rnams kyi bye brag gis rang gi
T02D2501:51b-33: lha'i ye shes kyi sems dpa' dang bdag dang mi
T02D2501:51b-35: dam tshig gi sems dpa' dang gcig tu gyur pa
T02D2501:51b-36: la rab tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i mchod pa 'di
T02D2501:51b-38: 'on kyang gang yang rung ba'i rigs su gtogs pa'i
T02D2501:51b-39: rang gi lha gang yang rung ba gcig gi phyag
T02D2501:51b-40: rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa pos kyang
T02D2501:51b-41: rab tu gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhi char go
T02D2501:51b-42: rims snga ma bzhin du sbyar dgos te /
T02D2501:52a-0: gang gi phyir ye shes kyi sems dpa' bdag dang mi gnyis @52a * //
T02D2501:52a-1: pa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad la rjes su chags
T02D2501:52a-2: pa la sogs pa rab tu gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
T02D2501:52a-3: yon tan 'di rnams kyis rang gi sems kyi rgyud
T02D2501:52a-4: la brlan na 'gal ba med do //
T02D2501:52a-5: khyad par du ni rang gi rigs su gtogs pa'i
T02D2501:52a-6: rab tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i mchod pa bdag la
T02D2501:52a-7: gnas pa'i ye shes kyi sems dpa' la lhag par
T02D2501:52a-8: bya'o zhes rnal 'byor gyi rigs pa mkhas pa'i slob
T02D2501:52a-10: de nas de ltar rang gi lha bdag gi lus
T02D2501:52a-11: la chu dang 'o ma lta bur gcig tu gyur
T02D2501:52a-12: pa la / aom su ra ta stvam zhes bya
T02D2501:52a-13: ba'i snying po 'di brjod cing dbang du gyur par
T02D2501:52a-14: pa la / bya ba'i phyir / ji srid 'dod par bsgom mo //
T02D2501:52a-16: 'dod pa bsten pa bde ba bdag / rab tu dga' ba khyod ces smras //
T02D2501:52a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub bya ba //
T02D2501:52a-18: de nyid bskul bas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:52a-19: de nas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod byas na /
T02D2501:52a-20: de nas nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2501:52a-21: du 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog 'thob
T02D2501:52a-23: rang gi rigs kyang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang
T02D2501:52a-24: ji ltar 'dod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang las
T02D2501:52a-25: rnams bsgrub pa la yang rim pa 'di thams cad
T02D2501:52a-27: khyad par du rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi
T02D2501:52a-28: phyag rgya sgrub pa la snga ma bzhin du yang
T02D2501:52a-29: ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:52a-30: pa'i rigs kyi rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D2501:52a-31: te mi dgrol bar de bzhin du dus bzhi pa
T02D2501:52a-32: sbyor bas rang gi lha'i snying po 'bum bzlas so
T02D2501:52a-33: // de nas tha mar de bzhin du ri mo'i
T02D2501:52a-34: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya
T02D2501:52a-35: de nyid bcings te mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod
T02D2501:52a-36: // bya'o // bzlas brjod byed pas na phyag rgya
T02D2501:52a-37: bcings pas skyo ba bsal ba'i phyir skabs skabs su
T02D2501:52a-38: phyag rgya dgrol te slar yang bcing ngo //
T02D2501:52a-39: de ltar bzlas brjod byed pa las gal te phyag
T02D2501:52a-40: rgya bcings pa 'phar na de'i tshe bcings pas 'phar
T02D2501:52a-41: ro // de ste rab tu g-yon de'i tshe bcings
T02D2501:52a-42: pas gang 'dod pa'i gzugs de lta bur bdag nyid
T02D2501:52a-43: ro // ston to // de ste snying ga'i phyogs
T02D2501:52a-44: su bzung ste bzlas brjod byed pa las de steng
T02D2501:52a-45: du 'phar na de'i tshe bcings pas mi snang bar
T02D2501:52a-46: ro // ston to // 'gyur ro // de ste
T02D2501:52b-0: @52b sgra byung na de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2501:52b-1: rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2501:52b-2: rgya bcings pa rang gi snying po dang ldan pa
T02D2501:52b-3: ji skad gsungs pa'i rang gi las rnams byed do
T02D2501:52b-4: ro // ston to // 'gyur ro // // 'di skad du yang /
T02D2501:52b-5: de nas phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod pa des /
T02D2501:52b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2501:52b-7: ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar /
T02D2501:52b-9: ji ltar bcings pa mi dgrol bar rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02D2501:52b-10: de'i mthar skyo na cung zad bkrol te /
T02D2501:52b-11: ji lta ba bzhin du bcings nas /
T02D2501:52b-12: mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:52b-17: de nas phyag rgya bcings pas 'phar ba dang /
T02D2501:52b-18: 'dod pa'i gzugs su gyur pa dang /
T02D2501:52b-21: phyag rgya thams cad kyang bcings pa tsam gyis las
T02D2501:52b-22: thams cad byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2501:52b-25: de nas ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na /
T02D2501:52b-26: de nas rdo rje phra mo la sogs pa gang
T02D2501:52b-27: yang rung ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa'i snying po
T02D2501:52b-28: yid la bsgom pa dus cung zad cig tu goms
T02D2501:52b-29: par bya ste / de nas rang gi lha'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:52b-30: ji ltar goms par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan te /
T02D2501:52b-31: de nas bsgom pa goms pa las ci ltar byin
T02D2501:52b-32: gyis brlab pa'i rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpa'i gzugs
T02D2501:52b-33: su bdag bsgrub par 'dod pa na /
T02D2501:52b-34: de'i tshe rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i
T02D2501:52b-35: skabs su gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i snying po brjod
T02D2501:52b-36: cing / ci ltar mos pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2501:52b-38: de nas dngos grub mchog 'dod na /
T02D2501:52b-39: rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2501:52b-40: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2501:52b-41: dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i rim pa ni 'di'o
T02D2501:52b-42: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs
T02D2501:52b-43: su bdag ji ltar byas pa mngon du byas te
T02D2501:52b-44: // / sna'i thog ma'i bu ga'i nang du dbugs dgag par bya ste /
T02D2501:53a-0: zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod cing nam mkha'i nang thams cad yang dag par @53a * //
T02D2501:53a-1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phra mo rnams kyi
T02D2501:53a-2: khyad par rab tu gsal bar snang ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D2501:53a-3: gyis bsams te / sna'i bu ga'i thog ma nas dbugs bag yangs su byung ba'i sbyor bas /
T02D2501:53a-4: de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i yid kyis yang legs par brtags te /
T02D2501:53a-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mang
T02D2501:53a-6: po ji ltar bsams pa de dag yan lag thams
T02D2501:53a-7: cad kyi rlung rang gi lus kyi nang du 'jug
T02D2501:53a-9: mar sar bye ma'i nang du thim pa bzhin du rang gi snying gar gzung ngo //
T02D2501:53a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2501:53a-12: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
T02D2501:53a-13: byin gyis brlabs pa dang rang gi snying gar gzung
T02D2501:53a-14: ngo // tshe 'di nyid la rab tu zhi ba'i mchog sangs rgyas par 'dod pa des 'di bya'o //
T02D2501:53a-15: min na sgrub pa gong ma bzhin zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:53a-16: de ltar las gzhan med par bsgom pa la brtson
T02D2501:53a-17: zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len
T02D2501:53a-18: btul ba ni // ji ltar bsgom pa'i de bzhin
T02D2501:53a-19: gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i mtshan ma
T02D2501:53a-20: byung bar gyur na yang snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs
T02D2501:53a-21: pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
T02D2501:53a-22: 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i rig sngags 'chang du
T02D2501:53a-23: btul ba ni // 'gyur ro // de la 'di
T02D2501:53a-24: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'grub
T02D2501:53a-26: sems dpa'i byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2501:53a-27: sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgom pa /
T02D2501:53a-32: dang por goms par byed pa'i tshe rnam pa lnga
T02D2501:53a-33: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim gyis sems ma rdo
T02D2501:53a-34: rjer byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu sems dpar byin
T02D2501:53a-35: gyis brlabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms
T02D2501:53a-36: na rnal 'byor pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag
T02D2501:53a-37: rgya chen por snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:53a-38: nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur snang ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2501:53a-39: phyag rgya chen po goms te sgrub tu rung bar
T02D2501:53a-41: sems ma rdo rje bsgom pa'i tshe nyid ni de'i
T02D2501:53b-0: rnam par rtog pa med @53b kyang de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:53b-1: pa'i phyag rgya chen por snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:53b-2: de la sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:53b-3: sems dpa' dang ni thams cad bdag / bdag kyang bdag la kun du gnas //
T02D2501:53b-4: zhes bya ba yid la bya ste /
T02D2501:53b-5: bdag rang phyag rgya chen por mngon du byed pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D2501:53b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i thabs bshad zin to //
T02D2501:53b-7: de'i rigs dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D2501:53b-8: gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i
T02D2501:53b-10: dang por re zhig mchod pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2501:53b-11: ga ye shes dbab pa'i mtha'i bar du thams cad
T02D2501:53b-12: byas la / ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa'i rang
T02D2501:53b-13: gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su bdag mngon
T02D2501:53b-14: byas la / du byas te / rdo rje dbyings
T02D2501:53b-15: kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i skabs su gsungs pa'i mnyes
T02D2501:53b-16: par bya ba'i sems dpa' gang yang rung ba'i snying
T02D2501:53b-17: po rdo rje'i tshig gis yid la brjod cing sna'i
T02D2501:53b-18: bu ga'i nang nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba
T02D2501:53b-19: bkag pas dbang po'i tshogs nang du phyogs par bya
T02D2501:53b-21: rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgrubs la snying po'i don
T02D2501:53b-22: rtogs pas rang gi lha sems dpa' de'i gzugs bdag
T02D2501:53b-23: dang mi gnyis pa'i nga rgyal du nyi ma re
T02D2501:53b-24: re lus dang ngag dang sems la gnod pa spangs
T02D2501:53b-25: te bsgom mo // bar skabs su yang dbugs dbyung ba byas te /
T02D2501:53b-26: rang gi lha'i gzugs rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya'o //
T02D2501:53b-27: khyad par du yang gang dang gang dbang po dang
T02D2501:53b-28: dran pa'i spyod yul du 'ong ba de dag thams
T02D2501:53b-29: cad mnyes par bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po sems
T02D2501:53b-31: de dag sems pa na yang 'di ltar yid la bya'o //
T02D2501:53b-32: 'di rnams thams cad ni bdag gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba ste /
T02D2501:53b-33: ji ltar rnam par brtags pa de bzhin du so sor snang bar 'gyur mod kyi //
T02D2501:53b-34: rigs pa dang lung dang 'gal bas 'di rnams kyi
T02D2501:53b-35: ngo bo nyid ni gang yang don dam par ngo
T02D2501:53b-36: bo nyid yod pa ma yin no snyam du bsam
T02D2501:53b-37: mo // de nas yang rlung dang bcas pa'i yid de slar bsdus nas //
T02D2501:54a-1: gyur pa'i rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar dmigs par bya'o //
T02D2501:54a-2: de dag thams cad rgyud 'di las phyag rgya chen por mnyam par gzhag ste /
T02D2501:54a-3: de nyid chen po kun zlos shing //
T02D2501:54a-4: gnas der thams cad bdag nyid du //
T02D2501:54a-5: sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis bsgom mo //
T02D2501:54a-7: rim pa ni 'dis bsgom zhing ji srid de bzhin
T02D2501:54a-8: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D2501:54a-9: kyi mtshan ma byung gi bar du goms par bya'o
T02D2501:54a-10: // de la 'di ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
T02D2501:54a-11: grub nye bar gyur pa'i mtshan ma gsungs pa ste
T02D2501:54a-12: // / nam mkha' 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du //
T02D2501:54a-13: dkyil 'khor dkar po ser po dang //
T02D2501:54a-14: rang gi phyag rgya sems dpar bdag / mngon sum bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2501:54a-16: de bzhin du dngos grub rab tu nye bar gyur pa na /
T02D2501:54a-17: gzhan yang ji skad du gsungs te /
T02D2501:54a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa /
T02D2501:54a-20: dngos grub dus na rang gi gzugs //
T02D2501:54a-21: bdag la thog mar ston par mdzad //
T02D2501:54a-23: de nas de bzhin du mchod pa'i cho ga byas te /
T02D2501:54a-24: nub gcig de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la gnas na rang gi lha byon nas /
T02D2501:54a-25: rang gi phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su grub pa de la stsol to //
T02D2501:54a-26: de bzhin du bsgoms pa las gal te nam zhig
T02D2501:54a-27: de'i sgom pa'i lam zhan pas rang gi lha'i phyag
T02D2501:54a-28: rgya chen po grub pa mngon du gyur pa'i mtshan
T02D2501:54a-29: ma med par gyur na yang /
T02D2501:54a-30: de'i tshe sngar bshad pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2501:54a-31: tshe dang stobs dang lus bzang po la sogs pa'i
T02D2501:54a-32: mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub rnams nan tan byas kyang
T02D2501:54a-35: yang phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i phan yon bsngags pa'i skabs su /
T02D2501:54a-36: tshe 'di nyid la dam pa yi //
T02D2501:54a-39: min na dngos grub gong ma bzhin //
T02D2501:54a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen por sgrub pa
T02D2501:54a-42: sngar gsungs pa la yang de bzhin du shes par
T02D2501:54a-43: bya'o // 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
T02D2501:54a-44: pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa'i
T02D2501:54b-0: bya'o // cho ga / rdo rje dbyings @54b kyi
T02D2501:54b-1: dkyil 'khor chen po'i skabs su gsungs pa ste bshad
T02D2501:54b-2: bya'o // cho ga / zin to // der gsungs
T02D2501:54b-3: pa'i dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2501:54b-4: rnams sgrub pa'i rim pa ni 'di nyid do //
T02D2501:54b-5: 'bras bu yang phal cher 'di nyid de /
T02D2501:54b-6: khyad par du ni dam tshig la sogs pa'i phyag rgya gsum rnams bsgrub pa la /
T02D2501:54b-7: sngar gsungs pa'i rim gyis dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang ye shes dbab par bya ste /
T02D2501:54b-8: de nas bsgrub par bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la bsgrub po //
T02D2501:54b-9: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub pa la
T02D2501:54b-10: ni rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2501:54b-11: te / phyag rgya de nyid kyi rang gi gzugs rang gi snying gar bsams te /
T02D2501:54b-12: sngar gsungs pa'i snying po de nyid brjod cing bdag
T02D2501:54b-13: gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di ni de
T02D2501:54b-14: bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rdo rje las gyur pa'i
T02D2501:54b-15: gzugs te / de bas na bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2501:54b-16: rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2501:54b-17: phyag rgya rdo rje'i mtshan nyid dang bcas pa /
T02D2501:54b-18: mi shigs mi chod pa de bzhin du bdag kyang mi shigs mi chod pa'o //
T02D2501:54b-19: zhes sems shing de ltar nyi ma re bsgom pa'o //
T02D2501:54b-20: lhag ma rnams ni cho ga snga ma nyid 'dir sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D2501:54b-22: ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub na //
T02D2501:54b-23: de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni //
T02D2501:54b-24: sangs rgyas mkhas pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:54b-25: min na 'grub pa gong ma bzhin //
T02D2501:54b-27: de bzhin du chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i khyad par yang 'di'o //
T02D2501:54b-28: snga ma bzhin du bdag rang gi lha'i sems dpar
T02D2501:54b-29: byas pa'i lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom
T02D2501:54b-30: mo // de yang rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa bsams te /
T02D2501:54b-31: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o zhes bya ba spyi'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i don mos par bya ste /

T02D2501:57b-29: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sbyor pa des /

T02D2501:58a-20: pa ste / rigs bzhi char gyi sbyor ba bstan pa spyir bshad pa'o //
T02D2501:58a-21: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02D2501:58a-22: khro bo dang 'bar ba dang byams pa'i lta ba dang /
T02D2501:58a-23: lta ba bzhi'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:58a-24: de la 'di ni rdo rje lta ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2501:58a-25: rdo rje lta ba'i chags pas su //
T02D2501:58a-26: rab tu dga' ba chags pa'i mig / de yis bud med la bltas na //
T02D2501:58a-28: bud med ces bya ba ni 'dir rang gi lha'i
T02D2501:58a-29: phyag rgya chen po la sogs par shes par bya'o
T02D2501:58a-31: rab tu myur ba g-yo ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02D2501:58a-32: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su gsungs //
T02D2501:58a-35: khro gnyer bsnyer bas rab tu 'jigs //
T02D2501:58a-36: khro bo'i lta bas rab tu 'dzum ;
T02D2501:58a-37: / khro bo'i lta bar mnyam bzhag na //
T02D2501:58a-38: khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed //
T02D2501:58a-40: ri rab lhun po'i brag chen ltar //
T02D2501:58a-41: brtan zhing mi 'dzum pa yi mig / byams pa'i lta ba yin par bshad //
T02D2501:58a-42: rims nad gdon dang dug rnams sel //
T02D2501:58a-43: lta ba 'di rnams kyang so so'i snying po gang
T02D2501:58a-44: yin pa dang ldan par rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2501:58a-45: du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas sbyar na dbang du
T02D2501:58a-46: bya ba dang / dgug pa dang /
T02D2501:58a-48: rims nad dang gdon la sogs pa sel ba'i las sngar gsungs pa'i rnams byed do //
T02D2501:58b-0: de la snying @58b po ni 'di rnams so //
T02D2501:58b-2: badzra drishti am ku sha dza /
T02D2501:58b-3: kro dha drishti h'ram: dipta drishti ma ta //
T02D2501:58b-4: snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang /
T02D2501:58b-5: rig sngags rnams kyi tshig gi bye brag cho ga bzhin du ji ltar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang /
T02D2501:58b-6: de bzhin du gsang sngags yid la brjod pa dang /
T02D2501:58b-7: tshig tu brjod pa rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D2501:58b-8: de la yid la brjod pa yang mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2501:58b-9: mtshan ma med pa'i bye brag rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2501:58b-10: de la 'og nas byung ba'i mtshan nyid ting nge
T02D2501:58b-11: 'dzin gyi tshig gi rang bzhin ni mtshan ma dang
T02D2501:58b-12: bcas pa'o // de las gzhan pa yid la brjod
T02D2501:58b-13: pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2501:58b-14: phyin pa'i rnal 'byor las bshad par bya'o //
T02D2501:58b-15: tshig tu brjod pa ni rigs bzhi'i bye brag gi tshig rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2501:58b-16: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni //
T02D2501:58b-17: lce yi thog ma cung zad g-yo //
T02D2501:58b-18: so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas su //
T02D2501:58b-19: rtog pa thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:58b-20: rdo rje'i tshig ni sgra med pa'o //
T02D2501:58b-22: rtog pa thams cad ces bya ba yang 'dir sangs
T02D2501:58b-23: rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2501:58b-24: thams cad du gtogs pa'i lha'i bye brag la bya
T02D2501:58b-25: ste / sems can gyi don grub par bya ba'i
T02D2501:58b-26: phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de dag de lta
T02D2501:58b-29: de la mi rtog rtog pa'i bdag / rtog pas brtags pa las byung ba //
T02D2501:58b-30: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2501:58b-31: de bas rtog pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2501:58b-33: de bas na rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid de
T02D2501:58b-34: bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi rigs
T02D2501:58b-35: kyi lha rnams su gyur nas /
T02D2501:58b-36: sems can gyi don gyi don gyi dbang gis de lta bur gnas te /
T02D2501:58b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2501:58b-38: rigs kyi lha thams cad la rtog pa zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod par nges so //
T02D2501:58b-39: de bas na rdo rje'i tshig ni lha rnams thams cad kyi spyi'i yon tan no zhes bstan to //
T02D2501:58b-40: de'i phyir rigs thams cad spyi'i rgyud bstan pa nas /
T02D2501:58b-41: phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D2501:58b-42: rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2501:58b-43: rdo rje tshig dang lta ba yis //
T02D2501:58b-44: dngos grub mchog ni myur du 'thob //
T02D2501:59a-0: @59a * // 'dir yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la tshig gzhan 'dir ma bstan pas /
T02D2501:59a-1: rdo rje'i tshig nyid dang sbyar ro //
T02D2501:59a-2: de las gzhan pa'i rigs rnams las ni /
T02D2501:59a-3: rdo rje'i tshig dang bshad pa 'di las gzhan pa'i
T02D2501:59a-4: tshig gi bye brag 'og nas 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2501:59a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang rang gi rigs
T02D2501:59a-7: kyi spyi'i chos dang 'brel cing bye brag tu ma
T02D2501:59a-8: bstan pas rdo rje'i tshig nyid du bshad par bya'o
T02D2501:59a-9: // de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcas pa'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
T02D2501:59a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dang rigs rnams yin pas na /
T02D2501:59a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bshad par bya'o //
T02D2501:59a-12: rigs zhes bya ba'i sgrar bye brag tu ma phye
T02D2501:59a-13: yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rigs dang nye ba
T02D2501:59a-15: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa yang tshig gis
T02D2501:59a-16: bskul ba nyid kyis rdo rje'i tshig dang 'brel par
T02D2501:59a-18: gzhan dag las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ldem
T02D2501:59a-19: po ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig rdo rje'i
T02D2501:59a-20: tshig ces 'byung bas bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D2501:59a-21: tshig gzhan rnams kyang yod par mdon [*mngon?] no //
T02D2501:59a-22: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yang gzhan dag las /
T02D2501:59a-23: de lta bu'i gsang sngags rig sngags bzlas brjod bya
T02D2501:59a-24: ba'i rjes su mthun par tshig gzhan du gsungs pa
T02D2501:59a-25: / rnga ltar thab pa'i sgra 'byin pa /
T02D2501:59a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bshad //
T02D2501:59a-28: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i sgom pa'i sbyor ba la yang /
T02D2501:59a-29: gzhan dag tu h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2501:59a-30: bsgom pa'i snying po brjod pa'i phyir tshig gi mtshan
T02D2501:59a-31: nyid gsungs pa / sna ru glu ni glu kun gyis //
T02D2501:59a-32: gsang ba rab tu dga' ba'i tshig / ces bya'o //
T02D2501:59a-34: sna glu 'dren pa la sogs pa //
T02D2501:59a-35: glu rnams kun gyis ci dga' bar //
T02D2501:59a-36: rdo rje dga' ba'i tshig gis ni //
T02D2501:59a-37: glu mkhan dang por blang bar bya //
T02D2501:59a-39: h'um zhes bya ba'i glu ni 'dir glu mkhan dang por dgongs so //
T02D2501:59a-40: tshig 'di nyid gzhan dag las glu'i tshig ces 'byung ste /
T02D2501:59b-0: 'dren pa la @59b sogs dang po'i rnams //
T02D2501:59b-1: blangs na glu yi tshig ces bsgrags //
T02D2501:59b-3: khyad par du yang 'dir phyag na rdo rje'i glu'i tshig gis bzlas par bstan to //
T02D2501:59b-4: rdo rje rigs la bzlas brjod byed pa rnams kyi
T02D2501:59b-5: tshig gi mtshan nyid kyi khyad bar bshad zin to
T02D2501:59b-8: dbugs med rab tu phra ba'i tshig / rab tu yongs su gsal ba ste //
T02D2501:59b-9: bzlas brjod thams cad de bzhin 'grub //
T02D2501:59b-10: ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba'o //
T02D2501:59b-12: gzhan dag las ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig padma'i rigs kyi yin no zhes bshad do//
T02D2501:59b-13: rin po che'i rigs la ni //
T02D2501:59b-14: rab tu gsal ba'i tshig gis ni //
T02D2501:59b-16: cho ga 'di yis bzlas pa ni //
T02D2501:59b-17: sgra yi tshig ces kun du grags //
T02D2501:59b-19: rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bdag po rnams
T02D2501:59b-20: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du rang gi rigs
T02D2501:59b-21: kyi tshig nyid du shes par bya ste /
T02D2501:59b-22: lha'i bye brag yongs su bzung ba las tshig gi bye brag rnams shes par bya'o //
T02D2501:59b-23: de ltar rgyud gzhan las grags pa bzhi las lhag
T02D2501:59b-24: pa'i tshig gi bye brag rnams kyang tshul 'di las
T02D2501:59b-25: gsungs pa'i rigs bzhi'i tshul du gtogs te ;
T02D2501:59b-26: tshig rnams pa bzhi'i phyir te bsgrub pa'i bzlas brjod rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
T02D2501:59b-29: sgra'i tshig rnams rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs la
T02D2501:59b-30: myur du 'grub par byed par khyad par du bkod
T02D2501:59b-31: pa'o // rdo rje'i tshig ni rigs rnams thun mong pa ste /
T02D2501:59b-32: de'i yon tan khyad bar med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:59b-33: de bas kyang yid kyi bzlas pa rab tu lhag pa dang thun mong ba ste /
T02D2501:59b-34: gar gtogs pa'i khyad par bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:59b-35: de bzhin du yang tshul gzhan dag las //
T02D2501:59b-36: yid kyis su ni bzlas par bya //
T02D2501:59b-37: gal te na yang shu bur bzlas //
T02D2501:59b-38: zhes bya ba spyir bshad do //
T02D2501:59b-39: de yang mtshan nyid 'dir ma gsungs kyang phyag rgya
T02D2501:59b-40: chen po la sogs pa bsgoms pa'i dngos grub kyi
T02D2501:59b-41: snying po rnams yid la bsam pa'i mtshan nyid gtso
T02D2501:59b-43: gang gi phyir phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgom pa'i tshe /
T02D2501:60a-1: pa'i dam tshig rnams kyis bsgom pa'i snying po rnams brjod pa'i zhar gyis /
T02D2501:60a-2: ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshig la zhen pa'i yid
T02D2501:60a-3: ni gcig kho nar bsgom par bya ba'i dngos po
T02D2501:60a-4: rab tu gsal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so
T02D2501:60a-5: // gang yang rigs kyi bye brags las tshig gi mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa 'di ni /
T02D2501:60a-6: bzlas pa'i skabs nyid du gtsor bstan par shes par bya'o //
T02D2501:60a-7: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor gyi tshul gzhan las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid //
T02D2501:60a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2501:60a-9: tshig / rdo rje'i tshig go zhes bya ba 'dir
T02D2501:60a-10: sbyar na de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D2501:60a-11: yid kyi bzlas brjod nyid du bshad par rig par
T02D2501:60a-13: mnyam par gzhag pa'i tshig ni rang gi brjod pa
T02D2501:60a-14: nyid du rnal 'byor la mkhas pa rnams 'chad do
T02D2501:60a-16: rgyal ba rnams kyi yid kyir bshad //
T02D2501:60a-17: tshig tu de yi rigs la sogs //
T02D2501:60a-18: rdo rje khro bo sgra chung ba'i //
T02D2501:60a-19: tshig rnams kyis ni phal cher bzlas //
T02D2501:60a-20: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T02D2501:60a-21: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi tshig gi yul gyi bye brag rnams bshad zin to //
T02D2501:60a-22: yid kyi bye brag kyang re zhig /
T02D2501:60a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D2501:60a-24: 'dod pa la sogs bde ba kun //
T02D2501:60a-25: rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas //
T02D2501:60a-26: ae ma ho sems can don zhes pa //
T02D2501:60a-27: gang phyir chags dang bral ba'am chags //
T02D2501:60a-30: 'dod pa bcom ldan rtag pa ste ;
T02D2501:60a-31: / sems can kun la bde stsol pa //
T02D2501:60a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bdag ces //
T02D2501:60a-36: sems can kun la phan 'dogs phyir //
T02D2501:60a-37: gdug pa rnams ni gzhig phyir dang //
T02D2501:60a-38: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir /
T02D2501:60a-39: khro bo grub par byed pa'i mchog / ces bya'o //
T02D2501:60a-40: padma'i zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:60a-41: padma kun gyi nyes pa yis //
T02D2501:60a-42: ma gos rab tu chags dang ldan //
T02D2501:60a-43: de bzhin gnas kyi nyes pas dag / srid la chags pas 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2501:60b-0: nam zhig @60b sems can thams cad gyis //
T02D2501:60b-1: dgos pa'i don kun bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:60b-2: de bzhin rin chen char dbab ces //
T02D2501:60b-5: rigs bzhi'i lha rnams kyi bzlas brjod byed pa'i tshe /
T02D2501:60b-6: sngags pa rnams kyi yid kyi bsam pa bshad zin to //
T02D2501:60b-7: rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bdag po rnams
T02D2501:60b-8: kyis ni phal cher bzlas brjod kyi tshig bzhin du
T02D2501:60b-9: rang gi rigs kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
T02D2501:60b-10: sbyor ba la bstan pa nyid du shes par bya'o
T02D2501:60b-11: // rig sngags thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang
T02D2501:60b-12: yid kyi spyod pa rab tu dbye ba bsdus pa'o
T02D2501:60b-13: // // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
T02D2501:60b-14: pa rigs bzhi'i rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i
T02D2501:60b-15: rnal 'byor byas pa bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa'i rjes
T02D2501:60b-16: su mthun pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sbyor
T02D2501:60b-17: ba la mkhas pa so so'i snying po dang phyag
T02D2501:60b-19: rig sngags rnams las ji lta ba bzhin du gang
T02D2501:60b-20: yang rung ba'i bzlas brjod kyi skabs su gsungs pa'i
T02D2501:60b-21: dngos grub 'dod pa'i snying po la sogs pa gang
T02D2501:60b-22: yang rung ba gcig bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:60b-23: de la re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
T02D2501:60b-24: pa rigs bzhir gsungs pa'i lha'i snying po rnams las
T02D2501:60b-25: gang yang rung ba'i las byed par 'dod pa'i rnal
T02D2501:60b-26: 'byor pas bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur pa'i rang
T02D2501:60b-27: gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs ji ltar bsgrub
T02D2501:60b-29: khyad par du ni rigs ji lta bu'i lha'i gzugs rnams bsgrub pa'i nang nas /
T02D2501:60b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi lha'i gzugs ji ltar
T02D2501:60b-31: bsams pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa dang
T02D2501:60b-32: ldan pa nyid du mngon du bya'o //
T02D2501:60b-34: dam tshig phyag rgya 'dzin par bya'o //
T02D2501:60b-35: padma'i rigs las 'byung ba la ni snying gar chos kyi phyag rgya'i yi ge zhag go //
T02D2501:60b-36: rin chen 'byung gnas las byung ba la ni phyag
T02D2501:60b-37: gnyis rang gi las kyi phyag rgya ji lta bur
T02D2501:60b-38: mdzad pa gtsor dran pa'i spyod yul du byas la
T02D2501:60b-39: / mdun du yang de lta bu nyid ji skad
T02D2501:60b-40: gsungs pa'i gdan la bzhugs shing ji skad gsungs pa'i
T02D2501:61a-1: bar yun ring du bltar snang zhing /
T02D2501:61a-2: rang gi rigs dang rjes su mthun par bltas pa
T02D2501:61a-3: tsam gyis kun mthun pa bzhin rjes su zhen pas
T02D2501:61a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byed pa rnams kyi skabs su /
T02D2501:61a-7: phyag rgya chen por byas nas ni //
T02D2501:61a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing //
T02D2501:61a-9: bsgrubs na myur du 'grub pa ni //
T02D2501:61a-10: sangs rgyas byang chub brtan pa yang //
T02D2501:61a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la yang /
T02D2501:61a-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che //
T02D2501:61a-14: bcings nas yongs su bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:61a-15: mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom //
T02D2501:61a-19: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su //
T02D2501:61a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2501:61a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni //
T02D2501:61a-25: chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas su //
T02D2501:61a-27: 'jig rten mgon yang bsgoms na ni //
T02D2501:61a-30: rin po che'i rigs la ni /
T02D2501:61a-31: snying po bzlas brjod byed pa rnams la dgongs nas /
T02D2501:61a-32: las kyi phyag rgya mnyam gzhag nas //
T02D2501:61a-33: rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2501:61a-34: rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2501:61a-37: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs la dgongs pa 'grub par shog cig ces bsngags nas /
T02D2501:61a-38: sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i yid kyi bsam pa rjes su dran par bya'o //
T02D2501:61a-39: dbugs slar bsdu ba'i tshul gyis dbang po'i tshogs mtha' dag nang du phyogs par byas la /
T02D2501:61a-40: ji skad du gsungs pa'i rigs dang rjes su mthun
T02D2501:61a-41: pa'i tshig gis bzlas brjod bya ba'i snying po'i don
T02D2501:61a-42: bdag la bsgom zhing de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2501:61a-43: la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rigs kyi lha
T02D2501:61a-44: rnams las gang 'dod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o
T02D2501:61b-0: // yang na dran pa dang @61b srog gi rjes
T02D2501:61b-1: su 'brang ba'i yang phyi rol du btang bas mdun
T02D2501:61b-2: na bzhugs pa'i rang gi lha'i gzugs ji skad du
T02D2501:61b-3: gsungs pa'i rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshig gis
T02D2501:61b-4: lta bas brtag cing dbugs dbyung ba'i mtha'i bar du
T02D2501:61b-6: yang dbugs slar bsdu ba'i tshul gyi yid nang du phyogs par byas pas /
T02D2501:61b-7: srog dang dbang po rgyu ba bkag ste /
T02D2501:61b-8: ji srid 'dod par bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur
T02D2501:61b-9: pa'i rang gi lha'i gzugs la dmigs shing bzlas brjod
T02D2501:61b-10: bya ba'i snying po brjod par bya'o //
T02D2501:61b-11: yang na tshul 'dis rang gi lha'i sku la brtag
T02D2501:61b-12: cing dbugs 'byin pa dang rdub [*rngub?] pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2501:61b-13: ji srid 'dod pa'i bar bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:61b-14: de'i don yang snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang

T02D2501:65a-15: po la chos thams cad ma skyes par ston cing
T02D2501:65a-16: brjod par bya ba'i don ston pa ste /
T02D2501:65a-18: ma skyes pa'i phyir aa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:65a-19: de bas na yi ge thams cad rnam par bsgom
T02D2501:65a-20: pa zhes bya ba 'dis de lta bu'i yi ge
T02D2501:65a-21: aa'i don la 'jug pas bzlas brjod du bya ba'i
T02D2501:65a-22: yi ge rnams snang ba med par bya bar gsungs
T02D2501:65a-24: bzlas brjod du bya ba'i yi ge rnams chos bdag
T02D2501:65a-25: med par bsgrub pa'i rigs pa bsgom zhing gzhig pa
T02D2501:65a-26: dang / mi snang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2501:65a-27: de bzhin du yi ge aa'i don la 'jug par
T02D2501:65a-28: bzlas brjod du bya ba'i yi ge snang ba med
T02D2501:65a-29: par bya ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
T02D2501:65a-30: bdag dang lha'i snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag las kyang de bzhin du bzlog par bya ste /
T02D2501:65a-31: de brtan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi kha nas
T02D2501:65a-32: gzhan gyi khar bsgoms nas zhes bya ba gsungs pa
T02D2501:65a-33: ste / 'dir kha ni 'jug pa dang sgo zhes bya bar don gcig go //
T02D2501:65a-34: de bas na rang gi kha ni rang 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2501:65a-36: yi ge aa'i 'jug pas bdag 'jug cing snang ba med par bya'o //
T02D2501:65a-38: ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid bdag 'jug pa
T02D2501:65a-39: zhes bya bar rang gi kha nas gi lha la
T02D2501:65a-40: sogs pas snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa yang yi
T02D2501:65a-41: ge aa las 'jug pa nyid kyis med par bya
T02D2501:65a-42: bar bstan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi kha zhes gsungs so
T02D2501:65b-1: gzhan dag gi kha bas na gzhan gyi kha ste /
T02D2501:65b-2: gzhan gyi 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2501:65b-5: aa'i don gyis bdag rnam par bsgom pa'i de ma
T02D2501:65b-6: thag tu rang gi lhar snang ba yang med par
T02D2501:65b-7: bya'o // zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02D2501:65b-8: 'di ni re zhig snying po bzlas brjod byed pa'i shes rab kyi lung ngo //
T02D2501:65b-9: yang na kha zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems
T02D2501:65b-10: dpa' la sogs pa mnyes par bya ba'i lha rnams
T02D2501:65b-11: kyi rnam par grol ba'i sgo phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D2501:65b-12: rang bzhin du gyur pa yin par skabs 'dir bzung
T02D2501:65b-13: ngo // de yang sgrub pa po bdag dang mi
T02D2501:65b-14: gnyis pa'i rnal 'byor du bsams pa dam tshig sems
T02D2501:65b-15: dpa'i gzugs dang phyi rol du bsams pa ye shes
T02D2501:65b-16: sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D2501:65b-18: bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur pa'i dam tshig sems dpar snang bar bsam ste /
T02D2501:65b-19: mdun du bsams pa ye shes kyi sems dpar snang
T02D2501:65b-20: bar byin gyis brlab pa yang gsal bar bya'o zhes
T02D2501:65b-22: phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang /
T02D2501:65b-23: rig sngags bzlas brjod byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin
T02D2501:65b-24: du bdag dang lha dang bzlas brjod du bya ba'i
T02D2501:65b-25: yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin gsal ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2501:65b-26: shes rab kyi sgo rtogs pa'i don de nyid do
T02D2501:65b-27: // khyad par du ni snying po'i shes rab kyi lung ni /
T02D2501:65b-28: aa ni don gyi bdag dang lha dang bzlas brjod
T02D2501:65b-29: du bya ba'i yi ge rnams bsgom par bshad pa
T02D2501:65b-30: dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra'i bye brag kyang
T02D2501:65b-31: rjes su ma smos pas ji ltar don 'di dag
T02D2501:65b-32: blos bshigs [*bshegs?] na rnam pa med cing nang stong
T02D2501:65b-33: pa yin pa de bzhin du 'di dag kyang stong
T02D2501:65b-34: dang / ste / de lta bu'i rtog pa la
T02D2501:65b-35: 'jug pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcig nas gcig tu
T02D2501:65b-37: aa la sogs pa ji ltar gsungs pa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa /
T02D2501:65b-38: 'bar ba'i me rjes su byung nas dngos po rnam
T02D2501:65b-39: par dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma zhi bas
T02D2501:65b-40: de lta bus 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyi dbang
T02D2501:65b-41: du byas te / rnam par rtog pa dang bcas
T02D2501:65b-42: pa'i shes rab nyid gtsor gsungs par shes par bya'o
T02D2501:66a-0: du byas te / // phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags rnams bsgrub pa'i shes @66a * //
T02D2501:66a-1: rab kyi lung la ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig

T02D2501:66a-3: nas / rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir zhi gnas
T02D2501:66a-4: lhag pa nyid du bstan to zhes slob dpon rnams
T02D2501:66a-5: nas / kyis bshad do // de bzhin du yang
T02D2501:66a-6: phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags bzlas brjod
T02D2501:66a-7: byed pa'i skabs su shes rab kyi lung yang 'di
T02D2501:66a-8: nas / kyis bshad do // ste / shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba //
T02D2501:66a-9: ting nge 'dzin zhes grags pa ste //
T02D2501:66a-10: de yis phyag rgya bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:66a-12: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba //
T02D2501:66a-14: de yis bsgoms na myur ba ru //
T02D2501:66a-17: phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i shes rab kyi lung gis tshigs
T02D2501:66a-18: bcad 'di la yang des par 'bigs par tshig gi

T02D2501:66a-20: mos pa rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par
T02D2501:66a-21: bstan pa'o // phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i shes rab de yang /
T02D2501:66a-22: de las gzhan pa'i shes rab kyis lung gsum las khyad par du bstan te /
T02D2501:66a-24: chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid don dam pa la dmigs pa'o//
T02D2501:66a-25: de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni de kho na nyid ma gtogs par dmigs pas /
T02D2501:66a-26: chos thams cad bdag med pa'i rigs pa dang /
T02D2501:66a-28: de lta bas na phyag rgya bzlas brjod byed pas /
T02D2501:66a-29: ji skad du gsungs pa'i rim gyis bdag dang gzhan
T02D2501:66a-30: dang bzlas brjod bya ba'i yi ge rnams bdag med
T02D2501:66a-32: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pas rab
T02D2501:66a-33: tu rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par rtogs pa bkag
T02D2501:66a-34: la / thig le zad gcig mnyam par gzhag ste gnas nas /
T02D2501:66a-35: ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bzlas brjod bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2501:66a-36: gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i shes rab kyi lung gi tshigs
T02D2501:66a-37: bcad la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i tshig gi
T02D2501:66a-38: bye brag las gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i shes rab kyi
T02D2501:66a-39: don ni 'di ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2501:66b-0: 'di lta ste bdag dang lha gnyis @66b bdag med par mos pa lngar byas te /
T02D2501:66b-1: gsang sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra rnam par rtog pa
T02D2501:66b-2: gcig nas gcig tu gzugs la sogs pa snang ba'i
T02D2501:66b-3: rnam par rtog pa med par yun ring du rtse
T02D2501:66b-5: ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bzlas brjod ji srid 'dod par de bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2501:66b-6: gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i shes rab bzhin du rig sngags bsgrub pa rnams kyang bshad pas na /
T02D2501:66b-7: de'i mtshan nyid 'dir khyad par du ma bstan te /
T02D2501:66b-9: gsang sngags rig sngags bye brag rnams //
T02D2501:66b-10: bye brag yod pa ma yin te //
T02D2501:66b-11: shes rab bsgom pa nyid kyis su //
T02D2501:66b-14: rig sngags dang gsang sngags gnyis kyi bye brag phan
T02D2501:66b-15: tshun tha dad par ji ltar snang ba ni chos
T02D2501:66b-16: thams cad ngo bo nyid med par dpyad pa'i rigs
T02D2501:66b-17: pas / tha dad pa med par rig pa dang /
T02D2501:66b-18: rnam par mi rtog par mos pas 'di dag gcig
T02D2501:66b-19: tu mngon du bya bar gzhan dag gis bshad do
T02D2501:66b-20: // 'di ni 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus
T02D2501:66b-21: pa'i tshul las gsungs pa'i snying po la sogs pa
T02D2501:66b-22: bsgrub pa'i shes rab kyi lung las bshad pa'o //
T02D2501:66b-23: mtshan ma med pa'i ting re 'dzin gyi bzlas brjod 'di yang gzhan dag las don cher bstan te /
T02D2501:66b-25: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2501:66b-26: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D2501:66b-27: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2501:66b-28: thams cad myur du 'grub par bya'o //
T02D2501:66b-29: don yod par ni grub pa'i mchog / gdug pa thams cad nges gnon mdzes //
T02D2501:66b-30: sngag bsngal kun sel dpal dang ldan //
T02D2501:66b-32: de bas mi 'grub ci yang med //
T02D2501:66b-33: dngos grub las rnams ci bde bar //
T02D2501:66b-34: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub /
T02D2501:66b-37: rdo rje mo'i rgyud las ni rim pa bzhin du
T02D2501:66b-38: yang don dam pa'i shes rab kyi man ngag dag
T02D2501:66b-39: snang ste / de las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la /
T02D2501:67a-0: shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyis bzlas brjod @67a * //
T02D2501:67a-1: kyi cho ga gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:67a-2: sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag byin gyis brlabs nas /

T02D2501:67a-4: snying gar yang bzlas brjod du bya ba'i yi ge
T02D2501:67a-5: rnams bsams la / ji ltar bsams pa 'di dag thams cad bdag med par mos par bya ste /
T02D2501:67a-6: gzugs la sogs pa so sor snang ba med par
T02D2501:67a-7: yid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ji skad du gsungs
T02D2501:67a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pas //
T02D2501:67a-11: sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis gnas //
T02D2501:67a-13: sangs rgyas sku ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:67a-14: sangs rgyas de yi snying gar ni //
T02D2501:67a-15: rig sngags yi ge rnam par bsgom //
T02D2501:67a-16: rang gi lus ni bdag med par //

T02D2501:67a-18: sangs rgyas de yi sku gang yin //

T02D2501:67a-20: sangs rgyas gzugs 'di ci zhig yin //
T02D2501:67a-21: de yi rang bzhin yod ma yin //
T02D2501:67a-22: gang zag ces bya'i sangs rgyas med //
T02D2501:67a-23: phung po dang ni khams ma yin //
T02D2501:67a-24: gzungs dang 'dzin pa sangs rgyas med //
T02D2501:67a-25: sangs rgyas med pa'ang ma yin te //
T02D2501:67a-26: pha rol phyin drug sa bon yin //
T02D2501:67a-27: shes rab kyis ni rnam par spyangs //
T02D2501:67a-28: kun gzhi'i gnas min rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2501:67a-29: de nyid byang chub bdag med 'dzin //
T02D2501:67a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na //

T02D2501:67a-33: rab tu dga' ba sgrub par byed //
T02D2501:67a-35: / rdo rje'i rigs la yang rdo rje 'dzin par bdag byin gyis brlabs la mdun du yang /
T02D2501:67a-36: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs bsams la /
T02D2501:67a-37: de'i dbus su bzlas brjod du bya ba'i yi ge rnam par brtag ste /
T02D2501:67a-39: ngo bo nyid med par mos pas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:67a-41: de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa //
T02D2501:67a-42: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bya //
T02D2501:67a-44: rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:67a-45: rdo rje de yi dbus su ni //
T02D2501:67a-46: rig sngags yi ge rnam par bsgom //
T02D2501:67a-47: rdo rje de yang dngos med pa'i //
T02D2501:67b-0: byang chub @67b sems kyi 'bras bu yin //
T02D2501:67b-1: de ci rdo rje zhes bya'am //
T02D2501:67b-2: de nyid gang yin mi 'gyur ba //
T02D2501:67b-3: de ci de nyid ces brjod dam //
T02D2501:67b-4: gang stong chos nyid ces su brjod //
T02D2501:67b-5: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kun //
T02D2501:67b-6: stong pa'i rnam par bsgom pa ste //
T02D2501:67b-7: gzugs ni rdul du rnam gshigs [*gshegs?] na //
T02D2501:67b-8: rdul zhes bya ba yod ma yin //
T02D2501:67b-9: gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad de //
T02D2501:67b-10: de yang rdo rje zhes su bya //
T02D2501:67b-12: rab tu dga' ba myur du 'grub //
T02D2501:67b-14: rin po che'i rigs la bzlas brjod byed pas ni
T02D2501:67b-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen du bdag mos
T02D2501:67b-16: pa bya ste / nam mkha' la rig sngags kyi yi ge rnams bsgom zhing /
T02D2501:67b-17: de bzhin du chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mos par bya ste /
T02D2501:67b-18: rang gi lha'i chos kyi sku la dmigs pa'i sems
T02D2501:67b-19: kyi bzlas brjod kyi rnal 'byor la 'jug par bya
T02D2501:67b-21: de nas rin chen rigs bzlas pa //
T02D2501:67b-22: bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen du //
T02D2501:67b-24: stong pa'i rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D2501:67b-25: nam mkha' de la rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2501:67b-26: rig sngags yi ge bsam par bya //
T02D2501:67b-27: chos rnams dngos med ces bya ba //
T02D2501:67b-28: stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya ;
T02D2501:67b-29: / phyi dang nang du rnam brtags pa'i //
T02D2501:67b-30: gzugs ni re zhig ma skyes te /
T02D2501:67b-31: gang na gzugs ni yod min pa //
T02D2501:67b-32: de la mig ces ji skad brjod //
T02D2501:67b-33: gzugs dang mig ni med pas na //
T02D2501:67b-34: rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2501:67b-35: ji ltar mig la de bzhin kun //
T02D2501:67b-36: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs ba'i //
T02D2501:67b-38: rab tu dga' ba bsgrub pa'i mchog / ces bya ba'o //
T02D2501:67b-39: de bzhin du padma'i rigs la yang 'jig rten gyi
T02D2501:67b-40: dbang phyug tu bdag rnam par bsams la mdun du
T02D2501:67b-41: yang padma'i phyag rgya nam mkha'i khams khyab par bsams
T02D2501:67b-42: te / de la yang bzlas brjod bya ba'i yi ge rnam par bsgom pa byas la /
T02D2501:67b-43: de bzhin du stong pa nyid du mos pas chos thams cad rang bzhin med par bsams te /
T02D2501:67b-44: de la yang bzlas brjod bya ba'i yi ge rnam par bsgom pa byas la /
T02D2501:68a-0: de bzhin du stong pa nyid du mos pas chos thams cad rang @68a * //
T02D2501:68a-1: bzhin med par bsams te bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:68a-3: de nas padma'i rigs bzlas pa //
T02D2501:68a-4: bdag nyid padma'i sems dpar bya //
T02D2501:68a-6: padma'i gzugs su rnam bar bsgom //
T02D2501:68a-7: padma dag chen de la ni //
T02D2501:68a-8: rig sngags yi ge rnam par bsgom //
T02D2501:68a-9: padma de las mkhas pa yis //
T02D2501:68a-10: chos kyi snying po rnam par bsam //
T02D2501:68a-11: padma chu yis mi chags shing //
T02D2501:68a-12: 'dam gyis nyes pas mi gos pa //
T02D2501:68a-13: de bzhin chos kun dag pa ste //
T02D2501:68a-14: chos dbyings gdod nas ma skyes pa'o //
T02D2501:68a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying 'di ci //
T02D2501:68a-16: gang 'di stong pa'i chos nyid de //
T02D2501:68a-17: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos kun gyi //
T02D2501:68a-18: chos nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
T02D2501:68a-20: rnal 'byor chen po dka' thub che //
T02D2501:68a-21: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa //
T02D2501:68a-22: padma nges bar bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:68a-24: de ltar dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang dmigs pa
T02D2501:68a-25: med pa'i sbyor ba gang yang rung ba'i rim gyis
T02D2501:68a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi char
T02D2501:68a-27: gyi snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang
T02D2501:68a-28: / rig sngags rnams kyi bzlas brjod las 'byung ba'i
T02D2501:68a-29: dngos grub 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du snying po

T02D2501:68a-33: sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir bsgom pa byas nas phyag
T02D2501:68a-34: rgya chen po la sogs bzhi ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2501:68a-35: du dgrol ba'i rim pa 'dis bya'o //
T02D2501:68a-36: de la rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:68a-37: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas bzlas brjod la
T02D2501:68a-38: sogs pa la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs
T02D2501:68a-39: la ji ltar bsams bzhin spyan drangs pa'i rang gi
T02D2501:68a-40: lha la sogs pa'i 'khor yang dran pa'i spyod yul
T02D2501:68a-41: du yud tsam byas te legs par byin gyis rlob
T02D2501:68a-42: pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2501:68a-43: la snying po 'di yi ge brgya pa sngar gsung
T02D2501:68a-45: ji skad du nam phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs g-yel bar gyur tam //
T02D2501:68b-0: bdag nyid stong par gyur @68b pa de'i tshe /
T02D2501:68b-1: brtan par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo
T02D2501:68b-2: rje sems dpa' la yi ge brgya pa'i snying pos
T02D2501:68b-3: bskul bar bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs so //

T02D2501:68b-5: rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi rnams
