T02D2501:68b-11: sam bsams te dgrol ba'i bsam pas de'i sbyor ba
T02D2501:68b-12: btang la / de dag 'byung ba'i phyag rgya la sogs pa bcing ngam bsam mo //
T02D2501:68b-13: de bzhin du ji ltar bcings pa'i phyag rgya rnams thams cad so sor dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2501:68b-14: de la chos kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i gnas ni
T02D2501:68b-15: rang gi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnas
T02D2501:68b-16: pa'o // las kyi phyag rgya'i ni rdo rje khu
T02D2501:68b-17: tshur sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o
T02D2501:68b-18: pa'o // // dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad ni rdo rje bcings pa las so //
T02D2501:68b-19: phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje la sogs pa
T02D2501:68b-20: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2501:68b-22: rdo rje'i phyag rgya yang phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i snying po'i yi ge'i sgra las so //
T02D2501:68b-23: de yang zla ba las so //
T02D2501:68b-24: de yang bdag med par mos pa las so //
T02D2501:68b-25: de yang rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya las so //
T02D2501:68b-26: de yang rdo rje bcings pa dral ba'i phyag rgya las so //
T02D2501:68b-27: rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yang rdo rje bcings pa las so //
T02D2501:68b-28: de yang rdo rje thal mo las so //
T02D2501:68b-29: rdo rje thal mo yang rnam par smin pa'i lus su mos pa ste /
T02D2501:68b-30: de ltar ji ltar bcings pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba'i
T02D2501:68b-31: rim gyis bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur pa'i dam
T02D2501:68b-33: ye shes kyi sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa btang ste /
T02D2501:68b-34: snying po 'di brjod cing snying gar rdo rje rin
T02D2501:68b-35: chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa
T02D2501:68b-36: bcings la dpral bar gtugs te /
T02D2501:68b-37: rdo rje khu chur gnyis kyi mdzub mo'i rtse mos
T02D2501:68b-38: mgo bo la phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul du bya'o
T02D2501:68b-40: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa /
T02D2501:68b-41: de'i 'og tu sarva mu tra mi tri dhi ku ru ba ra ka ba tsa na bam /
T02D2501:69a-0: @69a * // zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di brjod cing snga ma bzhin du go cha bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2501:69a-1: go cha'i mtha' gnyis rna ba gnyis kyi steng du phyung ste /
T02D2501:69a-2: dar sna dpyang ba'i tshul du lag pa gnyis brkyang la dbab po //
T02D2501:69a-3: dbang bskur ba'i snying po dang /
T02D2501:69a-4: go cha'i snying po gnyis rgyu na gcig tu rgyud 'dir bshad de /
T02D2501:69a-5: tha mi dad par 'dra bar snang mod kyi /
T02D2501:69a-6: 'on kyang spyor ba'i tshe 'di gnyis tha dad pa
T02D2501:69a-7: nyid du ji skad du gsungs pa'i rim gyis rnam
T02D2501:69a-9: 'di ltar yang theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i bye brag gi gzhung las bshad pa /
T02D2501:69a-10: phyag rgya thams cad bkrol nas su //
T02D2501:69a-11: bdag ni mngon par dbang bskur la //
T02D2501:69a-12: mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis kyis ni //
T02D2501:69a-13: phreng ba bzhi 'am yang na gsum //
T02D2501:69a-14: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa /
T02D2501:69a-15: shes rab can gyis go cha bcing //
T02D2501:69a-16: bdag nyid mthu dang ldan par bya //
T02D2501:69a-17: phyag rgya thams cad brtan bya ba //
T02D2501:69a-18: snying po yang ni 'di yis so //
T02D2501:69a-19: bar ka ba tse na ba //
T02D2501:69a-20: de nas thal mo mnyam par brdab pa'i sbyor bas nying po 'di brjod cing mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2501:69a-23: thal mo mnyam par brdab pa'i phyag rgya yang /
T02D2501:69a-24: lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las smad phye la /
T02D2501:69a-25: mgo mi dbye bas thal mo mnyam par brdab pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2501:69a-26: yang na phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i dbang bskur ba'i mtha'i bar du byas nas //
T02D2501:69a-27: go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing bar ma byas par bdag bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang /
T02D2501:69a-28: ji ltar bcings pa'i phyag rgya thams cad yang bdag
T02D2501:69a-29: la brtan par bya ba'i bsam pas yi ge brgya
T02D2501:69a-30: pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
T02D2501:69a-31: sems dpa' lan gcig brjod de snga ma bzhin du
T02D2501:69a-32: mnyes par bya ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02D2501:69a-33: phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa 'di dag thams
T02D2501:69a-34: cad kyi don yang rgyud las gzhung 'dis bstan par
T02D2501:69a-36: de nas phyag rgya thams cad spyi'i dgrol bar cho ga rgyas par bshad da /
T02D2501:69a-37: de la dang po nyid du gang nas 'byung ba'i de nyid du snying po 'dis dgrol lo //
T02D2501:69a-38: badzra mu: / de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi
T02D2501:69b-0: phyag rgya snying ga nas byung ba dbang bskur @69b
T02D2501:69b-1: ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i dbang bskur te /
T02D2501:69b-2: mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bskor zhing bcings pa de bzhin du go cha bcing ngo //
T02D2501:69b-3: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa /
T02D2501:69b-4: sarba mu tra me tri drishti ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na bam /
T02D2501:69b-5: de nas yang go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcings pa
T02D2501:69b-6: dgrol la thal mo mnyam par brdabs te snying po
T02D2501:69b-9: cho ga 'dis phyag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang /
T02D2501:69b-11: mnyes par byas na rdo rje ltar bur 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:69b-12: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' yang /
T02D2501:69b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' lan gcig bzlas //
T02D2501:69b-14: ji ltar 'dod par bde ba'i bdag / bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur ba //
T02D2501:69b-15: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no //
T02D2501:69b-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor
T02D2501:69b-18: ji ltar spyan drangs shing mdun du bsams pa rnams
T02D2501:69b-19: kyang rjes su dran par bya ste /
T02D2501:69b-20: de bzhin du mchod pa gsang ba brjod de /
T02D2501:69b-21: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi dang /
T02D2501:69b-22: bdug pa la sogs pa mchod pa bzhi byas nas mngon par bstod de /
T02D2501:69b-24: bsgom pa la sogs pa ji ltar byas pa las
T02D2501:69b-25: byung ba'i dge ba'i las 'di dag yongs su bsngo
T02D2501:69b-27: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dge ba'i
T02D2501:69b-28: rtsa ba ji ltar bgyis pa 'dis bdag sangs rgyas
T02D2501:69b-29: su gyur nas / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar gyi'o //
T02D2501:69b-30: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D2501:69b-31: rgyas kyi go 'phang de ma thob kyi bar du
T02D2501:69b-32: yang de 'thob pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bdag gi
T02D2501:69b-33: lus dang longs spyod dang rigs dang rus phun sum
T02D2501:69b-34: tshogs par shog shig ces bya ba 'am /
T02D2501:69b-35: de las gzhan du'ang ci nus par rang gi bsod nams de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D2501:69b-36: de nas ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa pa
T02D2501:69b-37: 'di 'khor gsum yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2501:69b-38: / byang chub kyi sems rin po che mngon du
T02D2501:69b-39: bya bas bdag brgyan la ting nge 'dzi las langs
T02D2501:69b-40: / te / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2501:69b-41: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams slar gshegs
T02D2501:70a-1: rdo rje sems ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2501:70a-2: kha gyen du bstan te bkrol la snying po 'di brjod do //
T02D2501:70a-3: aom kri to ba sarba satv'arth'a /
T02D2501:70a-4: sidddi d'd t'a y'a th'a nu ga / gatstsha dhva na buddha byi sha yan /
T02D2501:70a-5: pu na r'a ga ma n'a ya du /
T02D2501:70a-6: aom badzra satva mu: / de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2501:70a-7: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang
T02D2501:70a-8: bcas pa rnams rnam par bkod pa dang ldan pa
T02D2501:70a-9: ji ltar bsams pa rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po
T02D2501:70a-10: la sogs pa thams cad dgrol ba'i rim pa dang
T02D2501:70a-11: / ji ltar spyan drangs pa'i lha rnams slar gshegs su gsol ba bstan pa'o //
T02D2501:70a-12: rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa la bzlas brjod byed
T02D2501:70a-13: pa rnams kyi phyag rgya dgrol ba'i rim pa dang
T02D2501:70a-14: / lha rnams slar gshegs su gsol ba yang 'di nyid de /
T02D2501:70a-15: de dag gi khyad par gyi cho ga ni de'i
T02D2501:70a-16: rnal 'byor byed pa rnams kyis rgyud nyid las shes
T02D2501:70a-17: par bya'o // de nas bdag dang bdag gi gnas
T02D2501:70a-18: dang khang pa dang yul la sogs pa dngos po
T02D2501:70a-19: ji ltar gnas pa rnams sgyu ma la sogs par
T02D2501:70a-20: snang ba bzhin du snang bar yang dag par brtag
T02D2501:70a-21: par bya'o // ste / rang gi rigs dang mthun
T02D2501:70a-22: par bsrung ba'i sbyor bas bzlas brjod la sogs pa'i
T02D2501:70a-23: par bya'o // ste / tshe / dgos pa'i yo
T02D2501:70a-24: byad rnams bsrung ba'i nan tan byas te langs la
T02D2501:70a-25: rtag tu rang gi lha'i dam tshigs sems dpa'i nga
T02D2501:70a-26: rgyal nyid du gnas par bya'o //
T02D2501:70a-27: skabs skabs su yang zab cing rgya che ba'i mdo ste dang /
T02D2501:70a-28: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul bklag pa la sogs
T02D2501:70a-29: pa lha la sogs pa la chos sbyin par bsams
T02D2501:70a-31: mi 'dod pas ni bya ba gzhan du nyung du byas te /
T02D2501:70a-32: spyod lam thams cad du rang gi lha'i dam tshig
T02D2501:70a-33: sems dpa' bdag tu brtag pa la 'bad pa nyid
T02D2501:70a-34: du bya'o // zan za ba na yang rigs pa
T02D2501:70a-35: las byung ba'i kha zas ma smad cing mi 'gal
T02D2501:70a-36: du bya'o // ba blangs la / yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D2501:70a-37: yon tan gyi khyad par du 'gyur ba yang 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D2501:70a-38: kha zas 'di nyes pa med cing yon tan phun
T02D2501:70a-39: sum tshogs pa mang po'i tshogs grub par gyur cig
T02D2501:70a-40: ces brjod dam ba sams [*sems] te /
T02D2501:70b-0: @70b rang gi lce la rdo rje bsams shing chos kyi phyag rgya 'di nyid brjod par bya'o //
T02D2501:70b-3: 'di gnyis las dang pos ni thams cad dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:70b-4: de'i 'og mas ni yon tan thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:70b-5: rgyud gzhan dag las ni cho ga 'di dag rnam pa gzhan du gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:70b-6: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2501:70b-7: nam mkha'i la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D2501:70b-8: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2501:70b-9: thams cad bza' ba nyid du bya'o //
T02D2501:70b-10: thams cad nam mkha' sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:70b-11: thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing //
T02D2501:70b-12: rdo rje phyag rgya rnams kyis btab //
T02D2501:70b-13: nges pa nyid du bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2501:70b-14: 'dod pa kun gyis longs spyod rnams //
T02D2501:70b-15: ji ltar 'dod par spyod cing ni //
T02D2501:70b-16: thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:70b-19: de ltar mngon pa'i sngags pa'am /
T02D2501:70b-20: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis mngon par 'dus
T02D2501:70b-21: byas pa'i kha zas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2501:70b-22: dang / de'i rigs la sogs par gtogs pa'i lha'i
T02D2501:70b-23: tshogs rnams la ci 'byor pa'i phud gsol te sems
T02D2501:70b-24: can rnams la yang ci nus par bgos la rang
T02D2501:70b-26: de'i bdag po'i rnal 'byor du gnas te /
T02D2501:70b-28: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya'o snyam du bsams te /
T02D2501:70b-29: rigs pa dang rang par bzla'o //
T02D2501:70b-30: de ltar byas na lha tshim par byas pa'i don chen po gzhan yang byas par gyur ro //
T02D2501:70b-31: de nas sngar bshad pa'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis ngal bso ste /
T02D2501:70b-32: nyi ma gung dang phyi dro dang /
T02D2501:70b-33: nam phyed kyi dus na yang de bzhin du bzlas
T02D2501:70b-34: brjod la sogs pa snga phyi dus su bya ba
T02D2501:70b-35: rnams la spro ba bskyed cing /
T02D2501:70b-38: rnam par rtogs pa ngan pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa yongs su spangs te legs par bya'o //
T02D2501:70b-39: de nas de bzhin du btang ste snga ma bzhin
T02D2501:70b-40: du bya ba thams cad la lha'i dam tshig sems
T02D2501:70b-41: dpa' nyid du nga rgyal ma btang ba nyid du
T02D2501:70b-45: rig sngags thams cad kyi bzlas brjod bstan pa bsdus pa'o//
T02D2501:71a-0: @71a * // de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i tshe nyid ni
T02D2501:71a-1: ye shes babs pa'i mngon rtags kyi mtshan nyid thob
T02D2501:71a-2: kyang de dngos grub ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D2501:71a-3: cho ga 'dis re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
T02D2501:71a-4: po'am / de'i rigs dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D2501:71a-5: sogs pa sems dpa' chen po gang yang rung ba'i
T02D2501:71a-6: snying po gang mnyes par bya bar bsams pa de
T02D2501:71a-7: nyid nyin re snga dro dang phyi dro dang nyi
T02D2501:71a-9: nam phyed kyi dus su dus re rer brgya rtsa
T02D2501:71a-10: brgyad du bzlas brjod du bya bas dus bzhir ji
T02D2501:71a-11: skad du gsungs pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs kyi
T02D2501:71a-12: bar du sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D2501:71a-13: phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i rgyud las de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:71a-14: pa'i rigs kyi snying po thams cad sngon du bsnyen
T02D2501:71a-15: pa'i bzlas brjod bya ba'i skabs su /
T02D2501:71a-16: de la 'dir na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
T02D2501:71a-17: yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba
T02D2501:71a-18: nas brtsams te ; zla ba bzhir dus bzhir snying
T02D2501:71a-19: po'i don gyis bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku mdun
T02D2501:71a-20: du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgom zhing ji ltar 'dod
T02D2501:71a-21: par byed pas brgyas rtsa brgyad du rdo rje'i tshig
T02D2501:71a-22: gis bzlas brjod byas nas myur du 'grub po zhes
T02D2501:71a-23: nas brtsams te ; gsungs pa'o // de ltar sngon
T02D2501:71a-24: du bsnyen pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D2501:71a-25: kyi snying po rnams gang yang rung ba bzlas pa
T02D2501:71a-26: las byung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2501:71a-27: bam las rnams byed 'dod pa des yang rang gi
T02D2501:71a-28: lha'i ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar 'og nas
T02D2501:71a-29: 'byung ba'i tshogs sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ri
T02D2501:71a-30: mo'i sku gzugs nyid kyi spyan sngar ji lta ba
T02D2501:71a-32: de la re zhig dngos grub mchog bsgrub par 'dod
T02D2501:71a-33: pas rang gi lha'i ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan
T02D2501:71a-34: sngar snga ma bzhin du dus bzhir brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2501:71a-35: bzlas brjod byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis zla ba bzhir
T02D2501:71a-37: de nas nyi ma bzang po la rab tu shis
T02D2501:71a-38: shing dben pa'i phyogs su rang gi rigs dang mthun
T02D2501:71a-39: par gnas la sogs pa bsrung bar bya ste sngar
T02D2501:71a-40: bshad pa'i rim pas rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems
T02D2501:71a-41: dpa' bdag tu bsgrub par byas nas mchod pa la
T02D2501:71b-0: sogs pa legs par byas @71b nas /
T02D2501:71b-1: de bzhin du rang gi rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid dang /
T02D2501:71b-2: lta ba'i spyod pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2501:71b-3: mngon du bya ste de 'dod pa bsngags pa byas
T02D2501:71b-4: la srod kyi dus nas brtsams te /
T02D2501:71b-5: mtshan thog thag tu yid rtse gcig par byas la
T02D2501:71b-6: ci ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub grub par yang dang
T02D2501:71b-7: yang du sems kyis rnam par brtag cing bzlas brjod
T02D2501:71b-8: bya'o // de nas nang par de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2501:71b-9: la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid mnyes par byas pa'i lha'i
T02D2501:71b-10: gzugs kyi rang bzhin grub pa 'thob po //
T02D2501:71b-11: ji skad du phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i rgyud las
T02D2501:71b-12: ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga'i 'og tu de
T02D2501:71b-13: nas ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas
T02D2501:71b-14: te / ci lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi
T02D2501:71b-15: rnal 'byor zla bzhi'i bar du bya zhes gsungs so
T02D2501:71b-17: na 'dod pa ste rang gi lha nyid la bya'o
T02D2501:71b-18: te / // // de yang ci skad du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ma'i rgyud las /
T02D2501:71b-20: 'dod pa kun du bzang po yis //
T02D2501:71b-21: sems can kun la bde ba sbyin //
T02D2501:71b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2501:71b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni 'dir phal
T02D2501:71b-26: cher nye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig ste de bas
T02D2501:71b-27: na rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa mnyes par
T02D2501:71b-28: byas pa'i sems dpa' gzhan rnams la yang snyeg par
T02D2501:71b-29: bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de'i rigs
T02D2501:71b-30: kyi lha'i 'khor rnams kyi phyag rgya chen pos byin
T02D2501:71b-32: mnyes par bya ba'i mgon po gang 'dod pa gcig
T02D2501:71b-33: gis phyag rgya bsgom pa goms pa las ci ltar
T02D2501:71b-35: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dngos grub 'dir bshad par bya ste /
T02D2501:71b-36: de las phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa las byung
T02D2501:71b-37: ba'i nor bsgrub par 'dod pa des dang po nyid
T02D2501:71b-38: du sngon gyi dus su bya ba'i cho ga ye
T02D2501:71b-39: shes kyi sems dpa' 'bab pa'i mtha'i bar du byas
T02D2501:71b-40: nas / aartha siddhi zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod
T02D2501:71b-41: cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i rang gi lha'i gzugs dang
T02D2501:72a-2: ci srid nor bsam pa de ma rtsal bar gnas
T02D2501:72a-3: 'byung ba po med par 'byung ba de srid kyi
T02D2501:72a-5: de nas mtshan ma byung nas snga ma bzhin du
T02D2501:72a-6: mtshan gcig rang gi phyag rgya goms par bya ste
T02D2501:72a-7: / nor bsgrub pa'i snying po yid la 'don cing gnas so //
T02D2501:72a-8: de nas rnag gi lha byon nas ci ltar bsams pa'i nor kun stsal to //
T02D2501:72a-10: di la re zhig nor bsgrub par 'dod pas snying po 'dis grub par bya ste /
T02D2501:72a-12: aarta siddhi zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya 'dis nor 'byin par byed do zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:72a-13: de nas rdo rje'i dngos grub bstan par bya ste /
T02D2501:72a-14: de bzhin du sngon du byas pa'i cho ga thams
T02D2501:72a-15: cad byas la badzra siddhi zhes bya ba'i snying po
T02D2501:72a-16: 'dis snga ma bzhin du ci ltar mos pa'i rang
T02D2501:72a-17: gi lha'i phyag mtshan ma byung gi bar du bsgoms
T02D2501:72a-18: nas nub gcig snyoms par zhugs te 'dug na rang
T02D2501:72a-19: gi lha byon nas ci ltar 'dod pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2501:72a-21: ji skad du de nas rdo rje dngos grub 'dod na snying po 'dis bsgrub po //
T02D2501:72a-22: de la snying po ni 'di'o badzra siddhi 'dis ji
T02D2501:72a-23: ltar 'dod pa'i rdo rje grub par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2501:72a-24: gsungs so // de bzhin du badzra bhid ta dhya
T02D2501:72a-25: ra zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis mtshan gcig gis
T02D2501:72a-26: gsungs so // mthar bsgrub na / rang gi lha
T02D2501:72a-27: de bzhin du rig sngags 'dzin pa grub par 'dod
T02D2501:72a-28: pa'i khyad par gang yin pa de 'dir bstan par
T02D2501:72a-29: gsungs so // mthar bsgrub na / bya'o // de
T02D2501:72a-30: la chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa byams pa
T02D2501:72a-31: la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yang rung
T02D2501:72a-32: ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2501:72a-33: rang gi lha'i snying po bzlas brjod byed par 'dod
T02D2501:72a-34: pa gang yin pa des dang por re zhig sngon
T02D2501:72a-35: gyi dus su bya ba rnams byas nas /
T02D2501:72a-36: byams pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gang 'dod pa mngon du byas te /
T02D2501:72a-37: rang gi lha'i snying po zla ba bzhir de bzhin du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:72a-38: tha mar ting nge 'dzin de nyid la mnyam par bzhag nas rang gi lha'i gzugs su byas te /
T02D2501:72a-39: ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas brjod byed cing mtshan thog thag tu 'dug par bya'o //
T02D2501:72a-40: de nas nang par ji ltar 'dod pa'i ting nge
T02D2501:72b-0: 'dzin @72b ni dngos grub rnams mngon du phyogs par
T02D2501:72b-2: de nas ting nge 'dzin grub par 'dod na /
T02D2501:72b-3: des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te /
T02D2501:72b-4: ting nge 'dzin ni gang 'dod pa de'i snying po
T02D2501:72b-5: rnal 'byor gyis zla ba bzhi'i bar du goms par
T02D2501:72b-6: bya'o // de nas tha mar mtshan thog thag tu
T02D2501:72b-7: skyil mo krung ma bshigs [*bshegs?] par mnyam par gzhag
T02D2501:72b-9: de nas nang par ji ltar bsgom pa'i ting nge
T02D2501:72b-10: 'dzin gyis dngos grub myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2501:72b-11: // de nas ting nge 'dzin de'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:72b-12: gsang ba dang dbab pa dang las kyi bye brag ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2501:72b-13: snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig tu yang /
T02D2501:72b-14: ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bsnyen pa byas la /
T02D2501:72b-15: tha mar mtshan thog thag tu de bzhin du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:72b-16: de nas ji ltar rigs pa go cha dang /
T02D2501:72b-17: dbyug pa dang sku pa dang /
T02D2501:72b-19: yungs kar la sogs pa la lan gcig bzlas pas /
T02D2501:72b-22: khye'u dang bu mo rnams dang /
T02D2501:72b-24: yul dang yul 'khor la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod par bsrung nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:72b-25: skyes pa la sogs pas reg pa dang /
T02D2501:72b-26: ma reg pa yang rung ste /
T02D2501:72b-27: rtsed mo la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir tsandan dri
T02D2501:72b-28: zhim po'i bdug pa lan cig bzlas pas 'bab par
T02D2501:72b-29: 'gyur ro // rdo rje dang lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yang lag pas bcings pa'am /
T02D2501:72b-30: lugs ma byas pa yang rung de bzhin du phab
T02D2501:72b-31: na ji ltar 'dod par gdon la sogs pa'i las
T02D2501:72b-32: rnams byed do // bum pa'i snod la sogs pa
T02D2501:72b-33: la yang phab na rdzas stor ba de'i gnas su
T02D2501:72b-36: de bzhin zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs te /
T02D2501:72b-37: de nas tha mar mtshan thog thag de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na /
T02D2501:72b-38: de nas las 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
T02D2501:72b-40: lan cig brjod pas bdag dang gzhan dang grong dang
T02D2501:72b-41: grong khyer dag go cha bcings pa la sogs pas
T02D2501:73a-0: dbab pa ni tsandan dri zhim pos reg pa dang ma @73a * //
T02D2501:73a-17: khu tshur gyi phyag rgya la sogs pa rdo rje
T02D2501:73a-18: thams cad lan cig bzlas brjod byas pas 'bab par
T02D2501:73a-20: sgyu ma'i las bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i khyad par ni
T02D2501:73a-21: de bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar
T02D2501:73a-22: zla ba gcig gi sngon du bsnyen pa byas te
T02D2501:73a-23: / rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho gas rma bya'i mjug ma la bsgrub po //
T02D2501:73a-24: de la 'di ni rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga ste /
T02D2501:73a-25: sgyu ma'i las kyang rma bya'i mjug ma sbams pa'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la /
T02D2501:73a-26: de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgyas rma bya'i mjug ma de mnan la /
T02D2501:73a-27: de la phyag rgya thams cad babs kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:73a-28: de nas de la gzugs sna tshogs la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:73a-29: de phyin chad mjug ma des gzugs thams cad rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du ston to //
T02D2501:73a-30: mjug ma de nyid bskor bas bdag nyid kyi gzugs thams cad ston to //
T02D2501:73a-31: mjug ma de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa'i las thams cad ston to //
T02D2501:73a-32: mjug ma de nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2501:73a-33: sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku rnams kyang ston to
T02D2501:73a-34: // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su de
T02D2501:73a-35: bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bdud sde dang
T02D2501:73a-37: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa yang ston pa
T02D2501:73a-38: nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs
T02D2501:73a-39: rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid ston pa'i bar du ston
T02D2501:73a-41: dbang du bya'i sbyor ba'i khyad par ni de bzhin
T02D2501:73a-42: du ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba
T02D2501:73a-43: gcig tu rnag gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2501:73a-44: bcings te bzlas brjod byas la /
T02D2501:73a-45: tha mar de bzhin du phyag rgya bcing ba bya ste /
T02D2501:73a-46: mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod byas la phyag rgya 'bar bar gyur na /
T02D2501:73b-0: phyag rgya de @73b bcings la sems can gang sems
T02D2501:73b-1: la bsam shing rjes su chags pas bzlas brjod byas
T02D2501:73b-4: dbang du bya bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2501:73b-5: thams cad kyi rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D2501:73b-6: ta / de bzhin du mtshan thog thag tu phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:73b-7: de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2501:73b-8: pa thams cad kyang rjes su chags par 'gyur na
T02D2501:73b-9: / sems can gzhan lta ci smos zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2501:73b-10: 'jig rten pa'i rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i khyad par yang /
T02D2501:73b-11: ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar yang sngon du bsnyen pa'i phyir /
T02D2501:73b-12: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2501:73b-13: stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod byas pas /
T02D2501:73b-14: zla ba gcig gi sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
T02D2501:73b-15: tha mar de bzhin du mtshan mo phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:73b-16: nam phyag rgya 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D2501:73b-17: de bcings pas 'jig rten ba'i lha la sogs pa'i gzugs su snang ba'i dngos grub rnams dang /
T02D2501:73b-18: de las gzhan pa'i rig sngags 'chang la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams las /
T02D2501:73b-19: gang yang rung ba gcig ji ltar 'dod par 'grub po //
T02D2501:73b-21: de nas 'dig rten pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par 'dod pa des /
T02D2501:73b-22: dang po nyid du stong rtsa brgyad nyid bzlas brjod
T02D2501:73b-23: bya ba zla ba gcig gi bar du de bzhin
T02D2501:73b-25: de nas tha mar phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2501:73b-26: de bzhin du mtshan thog thag tu phyag rgya 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2501:73b-27: de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pas 'jig rten gyi
T02D2501:73b-28: dngos grub rnams rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub rnams
T02D2501:73b-29: las gang yang rung ba gcig 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2501:73b-30: zhes / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so zhes bya ba bshad pa'o //
T02D2501:73b-31: 'di rnams ni re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2501:73b-32: cad kyi snying po rnams bzlas brjod bya ba'i skabs
T02D2501:73b-33: su gsungs pa'i dngos grub khyad par can rnams 'dir
T02D2501:74a-1: gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba rnams kyi /
T02D2501:74a-2: snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig
T02D2501:74a-3: sngags rnams bzlas brjod bya ba'i skabs su dngos grub
T02D2501:74a-4: gzhan rnams spyir bstan pa gang yin pa rnams ni
T02D2501:74a-5: 'dir ma bshad pas rgyud las shes par bya'o //
T02D2501:74a-6: de nas snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags
T02D2501:74a-7: dang rig sngags grub pa rnams ji srid par 'das
T02D2501:74a-9: ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rnams shes pa'i sbyor ba 'byung ste /
T02D2501:74a-10: de la re zhig snying po grub pa 'das pa
T02D2501:74a-11: la sogs pa'i dngos po shes pa'i cho ga ni
T02D2501:74a-13: snying po yongs su bzlas nas su //
T02D2501:74a-14: bdag gam gzhan gyis zhes bya ba //
T02D2501:74a-16: de ni mthong zhing thos par 'gyur //
T02D2501:74a-17: phyag rgya'i lha ni mnyes byas pa //
T02D2501:74a-18: phyag rgya gcig ni bcings nas su //
T02D2501:74a-19: yid la cho ga bzhin byas nas /
T02D2501:74a-20: 'jig rten rnams la brtags na ni /
T02D2501:74a-21: gong ma bzhin du shes par 'gyur //
T02D2501:74a-23: gsang sngags grub pa'i ye shes 'byung ba ni //
T02D2501:74a-24: gsang sngags lan cig brjod na ni //
T02D2501:74a-25: rang gi lce yis smra ba yang //
T02D2501:74a-27: de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur //
T02D2501:74a-29: rig sngags kyi shes pa bsgrub pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D2501:74a-30: rig sngags lan cig brjod na ni //
T02D2501:74a-31: de yis yid kyis rig pa ni //
T02D2501:74a-33: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig bzhin no //
T02D2501:74a-35: snying po la sogs pa bzlas brjod byas pa las byung ba'i dngos grub bsdus pa'o //
T02D2501:74a-36: 'dir yang rang gi sems kyi rtog pa bkru ba sngar bya ste /
T02D2501:74a-37: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa rtag tu
T02D2501:74a-38: nang gi bsam pa dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas phyi
T02D2501:74a-39: rol gyi gtsang sbra spyad pa dang /
T02D2501:74a-40: bsdam pa la sogs pa gcig kho nar bya dgos
T02D2501:74a-41: pa ma yin pas rgyud 'di la de bya ba'i
T02D2501:74a-42: cho ga dngos su ma bstan te /
T02D2501:74a-43: de bas na de dag la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
T02D2501:74a-44: de la ma zhen par khrus la sogs pa bya ba ni //
T02D2501:74a-45: de lta bu'i 'jig rten dang rjes su mthun par bya ba dang /
T02D2501:74a-46: rang gi lus la phan pa dang rjes su mthun par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D2501:74b-0: de yang sngar @74b bshad zin to //
T02D2501:74b-1: de bas ni dgongs pa 'di ni rdo rje rtse mo las gsal bar bstan pa ste /
T02D2501:74b-3: mi dge rnams bcu spangs nas su //
T02D2501:74b-4: dge ba bcu la bsnyen byas nas //
T02D2501:74b-5: sems can kun la phan sems pa //
T02D2501:74b-6: de ni nang gi khrus zhes bya //
T02D2501:74b-7: bdag nyid phyag rgyas btab nas ni ;
T02D2501:74b-8: / phyag rgya thams cad dgrol bar bya //
T02D2501:74b-9: bdag nyid bkru ba'i phyi ru ni //
T02D2501:74b-10: rnal 'byor khrus zhes bstan pa yin //
T02D2501:74b-11: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa 'brel ba'i lus //
T02D2501:74b-12: chu yi khrus zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2501:74b-13: las 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khrus //
T02D2501:74b-14: rdo rje slob dpon rnams la bshad //
T02D2501:74b-16: de la khrus byed par 'dod pas rigs kyi bye
T02D2501:74b-17: brag gi srung ba sngar gsungs pas bdag bsrung ngo
T02D2501:74b-18: // yang na thams cad bsrung bar 'dod pas /
T02D2501:74b-19: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor yid la bya ste /
T02D2501:74b-20: khrus la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi mtshan nyid kyi
T02D2501:74b-21: gtsang sbra bya bar rgyud 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2501:74b-23: de las gzhan pa'i khrus la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:74b-24: de bas na rang gi rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i srung ba'am //
T02D2501:74b-25: rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis bsrung ba bya ste /
T02D2501:74b-26: phyi rol gyi khrus la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
T02D2501:74b-27: gtsang sbra thams cad ji ltar 'dod par bya'o zhes
T02D2501:74b-29: rdo rje rtse mo las ni rnal 'byor pa thams
T02D2501:74b-30: cad kyi spyi'i phyi rol gyi khrus gyi cho ga
T02D2501:74b-33: rang gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ji ltar byas pa mngon du bya ste /
T02D2501:74b-34: rang gi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2501:74b-35: aom tum zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'bru gnyis po'i
T02D2501:74b-36: go cha 'di yan lag thams cad du bkod de
T02D2501:74b-37: h'um zhes bya ba rdo rje gnod spyin gyi snying
T02D2501:74b-38: po'am / aa zhes bya ba mi 'chi ba thab
T02D2501:74b-39: sbyor gyi snying po 'di gnyis yid la bya ste
T02D2501:74b-40: po'am / / de nas aom dhu bi ka ya du pi pra dzva la ni s'va h'a /
T02D2501:74b-41: zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags zlos shing de'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2501:74b-42: bdag rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis gzi can du gyur par yid kyis mngon par brtag go //
T02D2501:74b-43: de la 'di ni rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2501:75a-1: khu tshur bcings la g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang g-yon pa'i mdzub mo rtse sbyar /
T02D2501:75a-3: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo rtse sbyar te /
T02D2501:75a-4: mthe'u chung gnyis rtse can du byas la bzlog ste
T02D2501:75a-5: sbyar ba ni rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste
T02D2501:75a-7: de nas aom bhu ra dzva la s'va h'a zhes
T02D2501:75a-8: bya ba'i sngags 'dis sa gtsang ma la nyi shu
T02D2501:75a-9: rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags la chu dogs gtsang ma'i
T02D2501:75a-10: phyogs su cha gsum du bgos te bzhag la /
T02D2501:75a-11: de nas de bzhin du rnag gi lha'i dam tshig sems dpa' bdag rjes su bsams te /
T02D2501:75a-12: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid khro bo'i lta bas kun
T02D2501:75a-13: du bltas pas chu'i nang gi bgegs rnams bsal la
T02D2501:75a-14: / de bzhin du rdo rje lta bar blta bas
T02D2501:75a-15: khor khor yug tu rdo rje dang 'dra bar bgegs
T02D2501:75a-16: mang po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par chu la
T02D2501:75a-18: sa'i cha gcig gis ro smad bkrus la /
T02D2501:75a-19: cha gnyis pas mgo man chad lus thams cad bkrus te /
T02D2501:75a-20: dam pa'i spyod pa'i cho gas mi sma bar ji ltar 'dod pa'i khrus byas nas /
T02D2501:75a-21: sa'i cha gsum pas lag pa bkrus la aom na
T02D2501:75a-22: ma zhes bya ba rdo rje glu'i snying pos kyang
T02D2501:75a-24: yang dam tshig sems dpa' yang yid la byas la
T02D2501:75a-25: sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas rdo rje rin po che'i
T02D2501:75a-26: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i chus bdag gi spyi bor
T02D2501:75a-27: dbang bskur la / lha la yang chab gsol te
T02D2501:75a-28: gnas bsrung ba ji ltar byas pa bkrol la chu'i
T02D2501:75a-30: ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos gtsang ma'am /
T02D2501:75a-31: rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog sngar bshad pa yang rung /
T02D2501:75a-32: 'phags pa mi 'chi thab sbyor gyi snying pos smad
T02D2501:75a-33: g-yogs dang stod g-yogs la bzlas brjod bya ste gsol
T02D2501:75a-34: la / gzi brjod phung po bzlas brjod byas pa'i
T02D2501:75a-35: ras kyi kyang bdag gi mgo la ze'u kar bcing
T02D2501:75a-36: la / bar bya'o // de la 'di ni gzi brjid phur po'i sngags so //
T02D2501:75a-37: aom na massarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha te dzo r'a shi /
T02D2501:75a-39: murdha ni h'um h'um dzva la dzva la dha kadha ka /
T02D2501:75a-40: bi dha ka bi dha ka / bi dha ra bi dha ra /
T02D2501:75a-42: khrus kyi rim pa 'di dag thams cad kyang /
T02D2501:75a-43: rdo rje rtse mo las gzung 'dis khyad par du bstan te /
T02D2501:75b-0: 'di ltar @75b bdag ni dang por go cha bgo //
T02D2501:75b-1: khro bo 'ang rjes su dran par bya //
T02D2501:75b-2: yi ge 'bru gnyis cho ga mchog / phung po thams cad 'jig pa'o //
T02D2501:75b-3: rdo rje gnod sbyin drag chen dang //
T02D2501:75b-4: khro bo mi 'chi thabs sbyor ro //
T02D2501:75b-5: aom tum go cha'i mchog / aom badzra yaksha a'a /
T02D2501:75b-8: rdo rje 'bar ba brjod dka' ba /
T02D2501:75b-10: rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2501:75b-11: aom dhu pi dhu pi k'a ya dhu pi pra dzva la ni s'va h'a /
T02D2501:75b-12: sa la nyi shu rtsa gcig tu //
T02D2501:75b-13: rig sngags mngon par bsngags pa yi / sa des bdag nyid bkru ba ni //
T02D2501:75b-14: ro stod ro smad rked pa'o //
T02D2501:75b-15: aom bhu ra dzva la s'va h'a /
T02D2501:75b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bstan to //
T02D2501:75b-17: khrus la sogs pa gtsang sbra'i cho ga bsdus pa'o //
T02D2501:75b-18: de nas de ltar rgyun mi 'chad par rang gi
T02D2501:75b-19: lha mnyes par byed pa la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2501:75b-20: pa des sngar gsungs pa'i dam tshig bsrung ba bya
T02D2501:75b-21: ste / rang gi lha'i bden pa dang /
T02D2501:75b-22: chos dang las dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa sgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o //
T02D2501:75b-23: de la de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2501:75b-24: kyi bye brag gis bden pa rjes su gzung ba'i
T02D2501:75b-25: mtshan nyid 'di ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2501:75b-28: mna' 'dor ba la rang gi lha rjes su dran par byas la /
T02D2501:75b-29: gcig tu gzhol bha bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2501:75b-30: de rjes su dran pa'i yon tan nyid kyis mna' bor te /
T02D2501:75b-31: bden pa yongs su bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2501:75b-32: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa yongs su bsrung ba'i rgyud do //
T02D2501:75b-33: bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi //
T02D2501:75b-34: tshig gi su ni mna' 'dor ba //
T02D2501:75b-35: bden pa chen po bsrungs na ni //
T02D2501:75b-39: de bzhin gshegs ba bzlas brjod byed pas mna'i skabs su bab na /
T02D2501:75b-41: bden pa nges par bdag gis dngos po 'di bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2501:75b-43: dam tshig la ni mna' 'dor ba //
T02D2501:75b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las 'byung //
T02D2501:75b-45: rdo rje bden pa bsrungs na ni //
T02D2501:76a-2: dam tshig mna' 'dor zhes bya ba de'i don ni 'di ste /
T02D2501:76a-3: gal te bdag 'dir ltar mi byed na rdo rje
T02D2501:76a-4: sems dpa' la sogs pa dang dam tshig rnams bslus
T02D2501:76a-5: par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2501:76a-6: de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la /
T02D2501:76a-8: rab tu 'da' ba dka' ba ste //
T02D2501:76a-9: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02D2501:76a-10: bden pa 'di ni bsrung bar bya //
T02D2501:76a-11: rdo rje 'dzin ma ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor
T02D2501:76a-12: lo thams cad spyi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan
T02D2501:76a-13: pa'o // padma'i rigs kyi bden pa ni //
T02D2501:76a-15: padma'i rigs chen las byung ba'o //
T02D2501:76a-16: gal te grub pa'i mchog 'dod na //
T02D2501:76a-17: padma'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya //
T02D2501:76a-19: gal te bdag nyid ltar mi byed na dam pa'i
T02D2501:76a-20: chos bdag nyid bslus par gyur cig ces bya ba
T02D2501:76a-21: las sogs pa'o // nor bu'i rigs la ni //
T02D2501:76a-22: sangs rgyas mchod pa mna' 'dor ba //
T02D2501:76a-23: rab tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste //
T02D2501:76a-24: bden pa dam pa bsrungs na ni //
T02D2501:76a-25: de ni dbang bskur thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:76a-27: sangs rgyas mchod pa zhes bya ba de'i don ni
T02D2501:76a-28: gal te bdag 'di ltar mi byed na sangs rgyas
T02D2501:76a-29: rnams kyi mchod pa gang yin pa thams cad bdag
T02D2501:76a-30: gis bshigs [*bshegs?] par gyur cig ces bya ba ste
T02D2501:76a-31: / de ni mna' 'dor ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2501:76a-32: de de ltar dam tshig legs par rig cing de bsrung ba la 'bad par gyur pa /
T02D2501:76a-33: mnyes par bya ba'i lha'i rjes su mthun par chos
T02D2501:76a-34: dang las dang chos nyid dang rjes su chags pa
T02D2501:76a-35: dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa legs par
T02D2501:76a-36: shes par byas nas ji ltar rigs par bsrung bar
T02D2501:76a-37: bya'o // de la re zhig rigs bzhi'i lha thams
T02D2501:76a-38: cad kyi snying po rnams ji ltar srid par bzlas
T02D2501:76a-40: bsgom pa la mngon par brtson pa snying po bsgrub
T02D2501:76a-41: pa rnam gnyis kyi chos dang las la sogs pa
T02D2501:76a-42: bsdu bar bya'o // de la legs par spyod pas bskyed pa /
T02D2501:76a-43: yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mthu rgya chen po ni chos so //
T02D2501:76a-45: chos bshad pa dag la yang de ltar brtags pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2501:76b-0: de la skabs @76b 'dir ni bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos nyid gzung ste /
T02D2501:76b-1: rigs so so'i rang gi rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:76b-2: de la brjod pa yang bzlas brjod byed pa dang
T02D2501:76b-3: bsgom pa dang bsgrub pa'i dus na de mngon par
T02D2501:76b-4: bstan pa'i don rtogs pas rang gi rgyud la 'phel
T02D2501:76b-6: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byed pa dang /
T02D2501:76b-7: bsgom pa la brtson pas chos kyi tshig brjod pa de'i don chud pas 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D2501:76b-8: sangs rgyas chos zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2501:76b-9: de ltar chos nyid yi ge brjod //
T02D2501:76b-10: sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag rgya che //
T02D2501:76b-11: ye shes kyi ni tshul mchog go //
T02D2501:76b-13: sangs rgyas chos zhes bya ba 'di'i don chud pa ni /
T02D2501:76b-15: slob pa dang ni mi slob pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni sangs rgyas te /
T02D2501:76b-16: chos kyang de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2501:76b-17: de bas na sangs rgyas gang yin pa de nyid
T02D2501:76b-18: chos so zhes bye brag med par chud par bya
T02D2501:76b-19: ste / chos kyi tshig brjod par bya'o //
T02D2501:76b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la /
T02D2501:76b-21: chags las dga' pa'i chos med de //
T02D2501:76b-22: bde ba thams cad rab tu stsol //
T02D2501:76b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni //
T02D2501:76b-24: chos 'di grub par byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba ste /
T02D2501:76b-25: 'dir chags pa las dag pa med do zhes bya
T02D2501:76b-26: ba ni bshad pa'i chos kyi tshig de brjod pa
T02D2501:76b-28: sems can smin par bya ba dang dgrol bar bya
T02D2501:76b-29: ba la chags pa dang byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D2501:76b-30: rang bzhin la chags pa las rab tu dag pa'i
T02D2501:76b-31: chos gzhan med do zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2501:76b-33: sangs rgyas bka' ni srung ba dang //
T02D2501:76b-34: de bzhin sems can bskyab pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:76b-35: khros pas kun du gdug pa rnams //
T02D2501:76b-36: bsad kyang dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:76b-37: zhes bya ba 'di brjod cing 'di ltar yid la bya'o//
T02D2501:76b-38: sangs rgyas kyi bka' la sogs pa dang /
T02D2501:76b-39: sems can 'dul ba'i las byed pa na de'i kha
T02D2501:76b-40: na mtho ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba ni
T02D2501:76b-41: sman pa la sogs pa bzhin du snying rje'i dbang
T02D2501:76b-42: gis zhugs pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
T02D2501:76b-43: de bzhin du padma'i rigs la yang /
T02D2501:77a-2: de bzhin chags pa nyes med do //
T02D2501:77a-3: de skad smra zhing mi bya ba //
T02D2501:77a-4: byed kyang sdig pas mi gos so //
T02D2501:77a-6: 'dir padma chu yis mi chags pa //
T02D2501:77a-7: de bzhin chags pa nyes med do //
T02D2501:77a-8: zhes bya ba'i chos tshig brjod pa na 'di ltar yid la bya'o //
T02D2501:77a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems can smin par bya ba dang /
T02D2501:77a-10: dgrol bar bya ba la chags pa ni 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos te /
T02D2501:77a-11: shes rab dang thabs kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:77a-12: de skad smra zhing mi bya ba zhes bya ba ni sems can smin par bya ba dang /
T02D2501:77a-14: rjes su mthun pa'i chags pa la sogs pa'i spyod
T02D2501:77a-15: pa ston pa kyang sems shin tu rnam par dag
T02D2501:77a-16: pa'i phyir sdig pas mi gos so zhes bya bar
T02D2501:77a-17: dgongs pa'o // nor bu'i rigs la ni /
T02D2501:77a-18: sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med ces //
T02D2501:77a-19: sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni //
T02D2501:77a-20: nor bu'i rigs chen chos yin te //
T02D2501:77a-21: myur du 'grub par byed pa yin //
T02D2501:77a-23: sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med do //
T02D2501:77a-24: zhes bya ba'i mdo'i tshig klog cing 'di ltar yid la bsgom mo //
T02D2501:77a-25: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub
T02D2501:77a-26: sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung ste
T02D2501:77a-27: / de bas na bdag cag gis ci nus su sbyin pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2501:77a-28: las kyang phan par bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2501:77a-29: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i snying
T02D2501:77a-30: po mnyes par byed pa'i bye brag las rnam pa
T02D2501:77a-31: lnga ste / de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi las ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:77a-32: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2501:77a-33: byang chub sems dpa' nyid 'grub par //
T02D2501:77a-34: ji ltar bar ni 'dul ba nyid //
T02D2501:77a-35: las kyi phyag rgya rab tu ster //
T02D2501:77a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mnyes par byed par byed pa'i las ni 'di'o //
T02D2501:77a-38: mchod pa rnam pa bzhi rnams kyi //
T02D2501:77a-39: sbyor ba rnam bzhis rnam pa bzhis //
T02D2501:77a-40: dus bzhin ru ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:77a-41: las rnams byed cing bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:77a-42: 'di'i don yang byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba
T02D2501:77a-43: la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i mchod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam
T02D2501:77b-0: pa bcu drug de bzhin gshegs @77b pa'i rigs kyi
T02D2501:77b-1: las kyi dkyil 'khor du brtag par bya'o //
T02D2501:77b-2: 'di dgrol ba ni 'dir gzhung mang du 'gyur du dogs pas ma bkrol lo //
T02D2501:77b-4: sems can gdug pa gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:77b-5: de dang de yi las bsgrubs na //
T02D2501:77b-7: min na grub pa gong ma bzhin //
T02D2501:77b-11: de bzhin gdug pa rnams 'dul ba //
T02D2501:77b-13: sangs rgyas grub pa rab stsol ba //
T02D2501:77b-16: sangs rgyas rnams dang lus can la //
T02D2501:77b-17: dbang bskur de bzhin sbyin pa dang //
T02D2501:77b-18: re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa //
T02D2501:77b-21: dam tshig dang chos dang las de rnams kyang bsrung ba dang /
T02D2501:77b-23: bsgrub pa rnams kyi khyad par du dam tshig la
T02D2501:77b-24: sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub mchog rnams myur du
T02D2501:77b-26: lha rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par ni chos nyid de /
T02D2501:77b-27: de yang phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2501:77b-28: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgyar sbyor ba gtsor gyur pa las shes par bya ste /
T02D2501:77b-29: gang gi phyir phyag rgya la la lha'i khyad par
T02D2501:77b-30: kha cig la dngos po'i ngo bo nyid kyi gtso
T02D2501:77b-31: bor grub par byed par bstan te /
T02D2501:77b-32: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2501:77b-33: de'i rigs dag la ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2501:77b-34: de las gzhan pa gsum ni rigs gsum la go rims bzhin te de ltar rnam pa lnga'o//
T02D2501:77b-35: de la 'di ni re zhig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de //
T02D2501:77b-36: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni //
T02D2501:77b-37: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid yin //
T02D2501:77b-38: sangs rgyas kyi ni sangs rgyas 'di //
T02D2501:77b-39: gzhan las sangs rgyas mi rnyed do //
T02D2501:77b-41: 'dir yang rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje bsgom zhing /
T02D2501:77b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas dngos grub bam //
T02D2501:77b-43: las rnams bya'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2501:77b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la yang //
T02D2501:77b-45: phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing ni //
T02D2501:78a-2: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi //
T02D2501:78a-3: dngos grub mchog sbyin chos nyid yin //
T02D2501:78a-6: phyag rgya dam tshig mchog rnams kyis //
T02D2501:78a-7: las rnams kun ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:78a-8: phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:78a-12: chos kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis /
T02D2501:78a-13: chos kyi phyag rgya brjod par bya //
T02D2501:78a-14: 'di yis chos rnams sgrub pa ni //
T02D2501:78a-15: rdo rje chos kyi chos nyid do //
T02D2501:78a-18: las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2501:78a-19: las kyi phyag rgya snying gar gnas //
T02D2501:78a-20: chos nyid 'di nyid bsgom byas na //
T02D2501:78a-23: chos nyid kyi byed brag lnga po de rnams sbyor ba yang /
T02D2501:78a-25: rang gi lha'i dngos grub dang /
T02D2501:78a-26: las thams cad bsgrub pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2501:78a-28: dbang du bya ba ni rang gi lha rab tu dgyes par bya ba dang /
T02D2501:78a-29: dbang du gyur par bya ba'o //
T02D2501:78a-30: gnyis ka la yang rigs kyi bye brag las rnam pa lnga lnga ste /
T02D2501:78a-31: de la 'di ni re zhig rjes su chags pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D2501:78a-32: de la yang dang por de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su chags par bya ba ste /
T02D2501:78a-33: sems can don ni rab byed cing //
T02D2501:78a-34: bdag nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod //
T02D2501:78a-35: sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur nas //
T02D2501:78a-36: sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bar bya //
T02D2501:78a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni //
T02D2501:78a-39: ji lta'i yul dang ldan gyur nas //
T02D2501:78a-40: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2501:78a-41: de nyid bskul bas myur ba ru //
T02D2501:78a-42: rjes su chags nas rab tu 'grub //
T02D2501:78a-44: yul zhes bya ba yang rdo rje l'a s+ye la
T02D2501:78a-45: sogs pa byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba la
T02D2501:78a-48: sangs rgyas bka' bzhin bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2501:78a-49: gdug pa rnams la drag spyod pas //
T02D2501:78a-50: khros pas sems can spyad phyir te //
T02D2501:78a-54: chags la blta zhing byams pa dang //
T02D2501:78b-0: snying rje dang ni @78b chos smra ba //
T02D2501:78b-1: mi 'jigs thams cad sbyin pa ste /
T02D2501:78b-2: padma'i sems dpa' chags par byed //
T02D2501:78b-5: dbang bskur rab tu sbyin pa dang //
T02D2501:78b-6: nor tshogs rab tu sbyin pa ste //
T02D2501:78b-7: sangs rgyas sems can don la sbyor //
T02D2501:78b-8: de ni nor bu'i chags pa'o //
T02D2501:78b-10: de la rigs bzhi'i lha rnams dbang du bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad de //
T02D2501:78b-11: de la yang dang po re zhig / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D2501:78b-12: chags pa smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2501:78b-13: rnam par dag pa bde mchog stsol //
T02D2501:78b-14: de bzhin sems can don la sbyor //
T02D2501:78b-15: 'di ni sangs rgyas rjes su chags //
T02D2501:78b-17: 'dir yang chags pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems nyid la gsungs so //
T02D2501:78b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la /
T02D2501:78b-19: rab tu dga' khyod ces smra zhing //
T02D2501:78b-20: 'dod pa bde ba'i bdag nyid bstan //
T02D2501:78b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya //
T02D2501:78b-22: de nyid bskul bas dbang du byas //
T02D2501:78b-24: 'dir 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub la
T02D2501:78b-25: 'jug pa'i sems kyi mtshan nyid byang chub kyi sems
T02D2501:78b-26: la bya ste / de yang byang chub mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:78b-27: rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang de nyid la bya ste /
T02D2501:78b-28: byang chub kyi yul la legs par dga' bas na
T02D2501:78b-29: rab tu dga' ba zhes rgyud nas bshad pa'i phyir
T02D2501:78b-30: ro // rdo rje'i rigs kyi ni /
T02D2501:78b-31: sems can dga' phyir sangs rgyas bka' //
T02D2501:78b-32: lus can rnams kyang mi 'jigs phyir //
T02D2501:78b-33: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D2501:78b-37: chags pa dag pa brtag pa ni //
T02D2501:78b-39: chags sam chags par byed pa yang //
T02D2501:78b-40: gdul ba'i don du dbang byed pa'o //
T02D2501:78b-43: sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir //
T02D2501:78b-44: rdo rje rin chen nyin re bzhin //
T02D2501:78b-45: spyi bor bzhag ste dbang bskur nas //
T02D2501:78b-46: sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya //
T02D2501:78b-48: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub dang 'gal ba'i las
T02D2501:78b-49: kyi lhag ma ma lus pas rigs bzhi char la
T02D2501:79a-3: rig sngags la sogs pa rnams legs par mang du bzlas brjod byas pa dang /
T02D2501:79a-4: bsgom pa'i sbyor ba dag gis sems can gyis don dang /
T02D2501:79a-5: sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba la sogs pa sbyar ba'i mthu bdag la yod par ma mthong na /
T02D2501:79a-6: de'i phyir drag shul gyis bsgrub pa'i phyir rnal 'byor
T02D2501:79a-7: rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi 'khor lo las gsungs
T02D2501:79a-8: pa'i cho gas / rang gi lha la drag shul
T02D2501:79a-9: spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar 'dod par 'grub ba'i
T02D2501:79a-10: thabs su gyur pa'i las grub pa rnal 'byor pas
T02D2501:79a-11: bya bar rigs bzhi'i lha bas dpa'i skabs nas de
T02D2501:79a-12: pa'i cho gas / dag bstan to // gsad pa
T02D2501:79a-13: yang 'dir rang gi lha dngos grub ster ba dang
T02D2501:79a-14: 'gal ba'i gnas skabs drag shul spyod pa'i sbyor bas
T02D2501:79a-15: yongs su gtang bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2501:79a-16: de bsgrub ba'i rgyu yang rigs bzhi'i bye brag las bstan te /
T02D2501:79a-17: de la re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i drag shul spyad pa'i rgyu bstan pa /
T02D2501:79a-18: sems can kun don ma mthong zhing //
T02D2501:79a-19: sangs rgyas de nyid mi sbyor ba //
T02D2501:79a-20: lus sam tshig gam yid kyis su //

T02D2501:79a-25: de bzhin sems can mi 'dul dang //
T02D2501:79a-26: bdag nyid sdug bsngal gyur na yang //
T02D2501:79a-27: h'um zhes bya bas gsang par bya //
T02D2501:79a-30: snying rje med cing byams pa med //
T02D2501:79a-31: sems can gdug pa mi sbyor zhing //
T02D2501:79a-32: bdag kyang bslus par gyur na ni //
T02D2501:79a-35: rin po che'i rigs la ni //
T02D2501:79a-36: mi gtong bdag gis don med cing //
T02D2501:79a-37: nor stor ba dang ma rungs dang //
T02D2501:79a-38: sems can rnams ni dbul 'gyur na //
T02D2501:79a-39: bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2501:79a-42: drag shul spyod pa'i sbyor ba 'di yang /
T02D2501:79a-43: rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor drag shul
T02D2501:79a-44: du bsgrub pa'i skabs su gnas par bstan pas de
T02D2501:79a-46: 'di ni re zhig rigs bzhir gsungs pa'i lha rnams
T02D2501:79a-47: kyi drag shul gyis sgrub pa'i sbyor ba dang rdo
T02D2501:79b-0: rje rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil @79b 'khor du gsungs
T02D2501:79b-1: pa'i yid la byas nas drag shul spyad pa'i mtshan
T02D2501:79b-2: nyid lha rnams bsad pa bshad pa ste /
T02D2501:79b-4: dmigs su med pa'i sbyor bas kyang //
T02D2501:79b-5: mi 'dod pa yi las spyangs pa'o //
T02D2501:79b-6: drag shul spyad pa byas nas ni //
T02D2501:79b-7: dngos grub 'thob pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:79b-9: sangs rgyas bsad pa'i rnal 'byor can //
T02D2501:79b-10: de rnams rab tu gdon pa'i phyir //
T02D2501:79b-11: nged rnams dngos grub myur du stsol //
T02D2501:79b-14: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rang gi lha
T02D2501:79b-15: rnams rnam pa med par rjes su dran pa'i sgo
T02D2501:79b-16: nas bsgom pa dang de bzhin du bdag dang chos
T02D2501:79b-17: thams cad dmigs su med par bsgoms pas dngos grub
T02D2501:79b-18: kyi gegs su gyur pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa
T02D2501:79b-19: med par gyur na ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub
T02D2501:79b-21: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos
T02D2501:79b-22: de rnams la de dngos grub myur du stsol to
T02D2501:79b-23: zhes gsungs so // des 'di skad du gsungs par gyur te /
T02D2501:79b-24: gang gi tshe gsang sngags legs par mnyes par byas
T02D2501:79b-25: kyang rnal 'byor pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub
T02D2501:79b-26: thob par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D2501:79b-27: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2501:79b-28: bzlas brjod kyi sbyor ba'i sngon rol dang /
T02D2501:79b-29: phyis rang gi lha'i chos kyi sku la lhag par dmigs par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2501:79b-30: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la sogs
T02D2501:79b-31: pa'i bye brag las kyang rab mchog pa'i bsod nams
T02D2501:79b-32: dang ye shes kyi tshogs la sogs pa'i don /
T02D2501:79b-33: snying po la sogs pa'i lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i rgyu rnams bstan te /
T02D2501:79b-34: de dag kyang sngags pas shes par bya'o //
T02D2501:79b-35: gang gi phyir de rnams shes nas de brtsams na
T02D2501:79b-36: de dag 'phel bar byas pas ring por mi thogs
T02D2501:79b-38: de bas na snying po la sogs pa'i ngo bo
T02D2501:79b-39: nyid kyi khyad bar yongs su shes par bya ba'i
T02D2501:79b-40: phyir de rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o //
T02D2501:79b-41: de'i phyir yang de dag gi rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D2501:79b-42: lha'i mtshan nyid re zhig 'dir dang por bstan to
T02D2501:80a-2: mchog gi mthu dang ldan pa sems dpa'i khyad par ni lha ste /
T02D2501:80a-4: de gnyis las sems dpa'i khyad par ni ye shes khyad par can dang /
T02D2501:80a-5: mchog gi mthu'i mtshan nyid dag gis de las gzhan
T02D2501:80a-6: ba'i sems can rnams las lhag par bstan pas na
T02D2501:80a-8: de yang yongs su dag pa dang de las gzhan pa ste rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D2501:80a-9: de la don dam par rtogs pas nyes pa'i dri ma dang bral ba ni yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D2501:80a-10: dri ma dang ma bral ba ni de las gzhan pa'o //
T02D2501:80a-11: de la rab mchog por yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de /
T02D2501:80a-12: de bas na de rtag par thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu grags so //
T02D2501:80a-13: rab mchog por ma yin par dag pa dang ldan pa ni rgyal ba'i sras dang /
T02D2501:80a-16: 'jig rten pa'i lha'i chogs khyad par can thams cad ni yongs su ma dag ba ste /
T02D2501:80a-17: de dag kyang brgya byin dang khyab 'jug pa dang lha chen po zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2501:80a-18: de dang 'brel pa'i lha'i khyad par gzhan rnams so //
T02D2501:80a-19: lha'i bye brag khyad par 'di rnams thams cad la
T02D2501:80a-20: yang dngos dang sprul pa'i bye brag las rnam pa
T02D2501:80a-21: gnyis te / de ltar bye brag rnam pa du
T02D2501:80a-22: mar gyur pa'i sems dpa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid
T02D2501:80a-23: gnyis te / ni 'di lta'o // de dag nyid
T02D2501:80a-24: kyi mchog gi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa gang
T02D2501:80a-25: yin pa ni don dam pa ste /
T02D2501:80a-26: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mchog dam pa'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:80a-27: yang na don 'di don thams cad pas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir don dam pa'o //
T02D2501:80a-28: yang na nyes pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2501:80a-29: bla na med pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug
T02D2501:80a-30: gi mtshan nyid don dam pa'i dgos pa khyad par
T02D2501:80a-31: can thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir don dam pa zhes
T02D2501:80a-32: gsungs so // de nyid don dam pa'i bden pa zhes kyang grags te /
T02D2501:80a-33: de rtag tu thams cad la mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2501:80a-34: de'i mtshan nyid kyang rigs kyi bu don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na /
T02D2501:80b-0: gang la sems kyang mi rgyun @80b de la yi
T02D2501:80b-1: ge rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs so
T02D2501:80b-2: // sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas shing bla
T02D2501:80b-3: na med pa'i rgya chen po mang po'i tshogs mtha'
T02D2501:80b-4: dag gi gzhir dus thams cad du gnas pas na
T02D2501:80b-5: // / chos kyi sku zhes kyang theg pa chen po rnams las phal cher grags te /
T02D2501:80b-6: chos nyid kyi sku bas na /
T02D2501:80b-7: de chos kyi sku zhes bya'o //
T02D2501:80b-8: de ni chos kyi sku don dam pa ste /
T02D2501:80b-9: 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i bde ba thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa dang /
T02D2501:80b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mang po rtogs pa'i
T02D2501:80b-11: chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi sku'i gzhi zhes bya ba'i
T02D2501:80b-12: bar du ste / de bas na chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2501:80b-13: de bzhin du rgyud gzhan dag las ni de bzhin
T02D2501:80b-14: gshegs pa zhes bya ba yang grags te ji ltar
T02D2501:80b-15: / 'du shes tsam ni spangs pa yis //
T02D2501:80b-16: rang bzhin bstan du med pa ste //
T02D2501:80b-17: ye shes kyis ni rang rig pa //
T02D2501:80b-18: de dag de bzhin gshegs zhes gsungs //

T02D2501:80b-21: de la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D2501:80b-22: yul du dus thams cad du de bzhin du rtogs
T02D2501:80b-23: pas na / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsungs so //
T02D2501:80b-24: yang na blo yongs su dag pa rnams kyis rtag
T02D2501:80b-25: tu de bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir de skad ces
T02D2501:80b-26: bya'o // 'di ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab mchog
T02D2501:80b-27: chen por rnam par dag pa brnyes pa rnams dang
T02D2501:80b-28: bya'o // / de dag nyid kyis bla na med
T02D2501:80b-29: pa chen po'i rgyur mngon du mthong ba tsam gyis
T02D2501:80b-30: 'gyur bar lhag par bstan pa'i phyir lha zhes bya'o
T02D2501:80b-31: bya'o // / ; / don dam pa'i lha'i rang
T02D2501:80b-32: bzhin de dang tha mi dad par spyod pas sems
T02D2501:80b-33: dpa'i mtshan nyid kyang lha zhes bya'o //
T02D2501:80b-34: de bas na dngos dang nye bar brtags pa'i mtshan
T02D2501:80b-35: nyid kyi bye brag las kyang lha rnams gnyis su
T02D2501:80b-36: shes par bya'o // yongs su dag pa dang yongs
T02D2501:80b-37: su mdag pa la sogs pa'i lha rab tu dbye
T02D2501:80b-38: ba yongs su bsgrags pa 'di yang de la mkhas

T02D2501:80b-40: gzhung 'dir ni rigs bzhi char yang rnam pa thams
T02D2501:80b-41: cad du yongs su dag pa lha'i khyad par rnams
T02D2501:81a-0: bsdus pa ste / de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa @81a * //

T02D2501:81a-2: pa rnams las gyur pa'i rang bzhin no zhes kyang
T02D2501:81a-3: sngar bshad do // de bas na de ltar yang

T02D2501:81a-5: sogs pa'i yon tan las nye bar brtags pa'i lha
T02D2501:81a-6: rab tu dbye ba rnams ni dkyil 'khor chen po

T02D2501:81a-15: gyi tshul du gnas pa yang de nyid de gsang
T02D2501:81a-16: bar gsungs so ; bya'o // sngags zhes bya'o //
T02D2501:81a-17: las kyi dkyil 'khor du kun du bkod pa bstan
T02D2501:81a-18: pa yang de dag nyid de /
T02D2501:81a-19: rig sngags zhes bya bar gsungs so //
T02D2501:81a-20: snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nges pa'i
T02D2501:81a-21: tshig ni rgyud phyi ma las bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2501:81a-23: 'di ltar snying po'i nges pa'i tshig bshad pa'i rgyud kyi skabs su /

T02D2501:81a-26: ting 'dzin sgrub pa'i snying la gnas //

T02D2501:81a-29: 'dir snying po zhes bya ba ni yi ge rnam
T02D2501:81a-30: par rtog pa'i rnam par rab tu goms pa las
T02D2501:81a-31: snying po zhes bya ba'i sems rtogs par 'gyur bas
T02D2501:81a-32: snying po'o // de yang skabs 'dir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa /
T02D2501:81a-34: badzra r'a dza zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming
T02D2501:81a-35: du brjod pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang rdo
T02D2501:81a-36: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po

T02D2501:81a-38: zhes bya'o // snying po de yang dus gcig gnyis
T02D2501:81a-39: shig tu snying po zhes bya ba'i sems rjes su
T02D2501:81a-41: 'di ltar ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i
T02D2501:81a-42: dus dang rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i
T02D2501:81a-43: dus na'o // de bstan pa'i phyir /

T02D2501:81b-1: ting 'dzin grub pa'i snying la gnas //
T02D2501:81b-2: de bas snying po zhes bya'o //
T02D2501:81b-4: snying po la gnas zhes bya ba 'dis kyang gang
T02D2501:81b-5: gi tshe rnal 'byor pa 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2501:81b-6: la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'am /
T02D2501:81b-7: de'i gnas dang tshe dang lus dang kha dog la

T02D2501:81b-11: badzrar'a dz'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po

T02D2501:81b-14: de bas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying
T02D2501:81b-15: po de snying la 'jug pas na snying la gnas
T02D2501:81b-16: pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2501:81b-17: de bzhin du phyag rgya'i nges pa'i tshig bshad pa'i skabs su yang /
T02D2501:81b-18: 'da' ka de bzhin mi shigs pa //
T02D2501:81b-19: rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi rtags //
T02D2501:81b-20: bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i sku//

T02D2501:81b-28: phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod par shes par
T02D2501:81b-29: bya'o // gsang sngags kyi nges pa'i tshig bshad pa'i skabs su yang //
T02D2501:81b-30: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing //
T02D2501:81b-31: shigs par dka' la gsang ba nyid //
T02D2501:81b-32: gsang ba bsgrub phyir sngags pas ni /

T02D2501:81b-35: 'dir yang bsngags shing gsang ba ste /
T02D2501:81b-36: smra bas nges pa'i tshig dang spyar na snying po
T02D2501:81b-37: dang phyag rgya la sogs pa yang de bzhin du

T02D2501:81b-39: bya ba'i glags su 'gyur mod kyi /

T02D2501:81b-43: dgongs te / chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni gtsor gsung

T02D2501:82a-1: su gyur par dgongs pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2501:82a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phrin las kyang /

T02D2501:83b-8: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs pas //

T02D2501:83b-18: thams cad grub par byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2501:83b-20: shes rab kyi thabs dag ni /
T02D2501:83b-21: bzlas brjod kyi skabs nyid du sngar bstan zin to //
T02D2501:83b-22: rig sngags kyi cho ga bshad zin to //
T02D2501:83b-24: rgyud 'dir yang dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi cho ga bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /

T02D2501:83b-27: sngags dang rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba goms pa

T02D2501:83b-31: nyid do // de la gzhung 'di yan chad kyis dngos grub rnam gnyis kyi cho ga bstan to //

T02D2501:83b-33: sreg gi las las byung ba zhi ba la sogs

T02D2501:83b-45: / bar bya'o // pas / tshe ring pa dang /

T02D2501:84a-5: ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ye

T02D2501:84a-7: par gzhag pas ji ltar rigs par de dag gi

T02D2501:84b-47: byang chub sems kyis shin tu brgyan //

T02D2501:85a-3: rdo rje 'dzin pas yongs bzung ba //

T02D2501:85a-14: pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrub pa'i
T02D2501:85a-15: rig sngags rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya bar nges so

T02D2501:85a-18: drag shul spyod pa'i sbyor ba rgyud 'di las gsungs
T02D2501:85a-20: de la sbyin sreg gi yan lag rnams kyis ni lha dang sbyin sreg byed pa dang /

T02D2501:85a-24: rjes su mthun pa'i bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas //

T02D2501:85a-30: zhi ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi tshe /

T02D2501:85b-0: de @85b yang sngar gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po

T02D2501:85b-2: pa bzlas brjod bya ba'i cho gas bdag dang mi

T02D2501:85b-10: de la zhi ba la sogs pa'i spyin sreg gi
T02D2501:85b-11: dgang gzar gyi tshan nyid 'di ni spyi'i rnal 'byor
T02D2501:85b-12: gyi rgyud las gsungs pa ste /
T02D2501:85b-13: 'di ltar yu ba chad pa lnga tsam du bya'o //

T02D2501:85b-15: zabs su sor gcig de'i mchu padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba ste /

T02D2501:85b-33: sen mo'i steng tsam ni mchog go //
